I've tried all the tech support options and nothing has worked; the one I received was a dud. Amazon support was no help; because return window passed on a FAULTY product they shipped me, the burden is now on ME to spend hours on the phone with Google. Completely unacceptable.
title: Absolute Garbage Device

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JustAVoice
content: I set it up in a few minutes and had it up in running in less then 10. Super simple set up, instructions come with little tags for the wires if you need them. Having the ability to adjust the thermostat when I’m not home is a great way to save money on HVAC. I could be cooking and I can turn the fan on with my phone via Siri if it gets hot or turn have it schedule to turn on 10 minutes before I get home. Tech so good, It’s damn near magical.
title: Easy set up, easy life; Science mofos, get it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ronald kurczewski
content: So I had some hesitation  but when I had to keep going up & down stairs to lower the heat earlier this year, I figured I would purchase the nest.  WOW.....I think this may be the best purchase I have done in over 10 years. The nest is so smart that every time you walk by it, or touch it to learn,  view it from your phone, or change the temp. because it is colder today than yesterday.  It learns your habits and programs itself to assist you before you even know you need assistance :)  Sounds crazy right !!!  its true. My system has learned how to read the weather outside, compared to me and my families habits and will adjust itself to keep us warm , at the same time save us money. I highly recommend the Nest Learning Thermostat for Everyone.
title: So easy to install , very smart with learning your "quirks". A MUST HAVE

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J Miller
content: I like these nest thermostats.  I can control them with an app on my iPhone, compare month to month activity and compare to my gas bill.  I get a refund from my utilities provider for purchasing this.  I can adjust the thermostat to exactly the right temps ant the right times and monitor them so I can tweak the system.  I love these!
title: Best smart thermostat I’ve seen.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Anderson
content: This helps us save money in a few major ways. The occupancy detection works well and backs off the temperature setting when we aren't home, even if we forget to manually mark it as away. The learning aspect of it does a really good job of setting the temperature to an appropriate value over time. If it isn't quite what we want, it's easy to adjust by walking up to the unit, by using the app, or using the google assistant. We have two of these total, and they work well together.
title: Absolutely helps us save money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ashley
content: I bought this thermostat primarily because of its ability to work with my Amazon Alexa, and it does not disappoint!  Alexa has also just recently been updated so that you can simply ask her, "Alexa, what's the temperature inside the house?" and it will read the current temperature.  (This seems simplistic, but believe it or not, there used to be no way to do this!)  You can also ask her to set a specific temperature now, whereas in the past you could only say something like "Alexa, turn up the heat," and she would only adjust the temperature by 2 degrees at a time.  This was a little annoying, but a relatively simple fix if you use IFTTT (If This Then That) to create recipes.  I did this to create a recipe for each temperature I would ever need to set Alexa for.  (It sounds more complicated than it was.)  But alas, this is generally not an issue anymore!  I do still use my IFTTT recipe to set my thermostat to Eco before I leave the house.  The thermostat will eventually know I am gone and switch to Eco, but doing this manually will switch the system sooner and save some more money.  I also like the ability to check your usage history.  My father-in-law also has a Nest, and we like to compete to see who can use the least energy.  Lol. Installation is incredibly easy for a layman.  There's an extremely helpful video available through the Nest site (or you can literally search for it on YouTube and it pops right up).  They seriously make it so easy, there's no reason anyone should need a contractor to install it. The initial setup to get Alexa and the Nest connected can be confusing, but don't get discouraged!  Just do a little Googling and there are some helpful tips to get things rolling.  (It's been a few months since I installed the thermostat, so I can't remember specifically the trouble I was having otherwise I would be more specific - sorry!) . Just don't give up or think that you got a bogus thermostat that won't connect to Alexa.  It will work, I promise! Many electric and natural gas utility companies also offer rebates for upgrading to a smart thermostat, so be sure to look into that!  I qualified for a $50 rebate from my gas company.  Many people I know also got a $50 rebate from their electric company, though our electric is through the city we live in and not the utility company directly so we did not qualify :(  Even though the price seems steep initially, with these rebates and the money you'll save long term, you can't really go wrong.  Not to mention the convenience of me being able to yell at Alexa from across the room to adjust the temperature when I don't feel like getting up or grabbing my phone.  Lol.
title: Got Alexa?  You need a Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lloyd G.
content: Would not recommend cost me $800 in system repairs due to bug to not tell the valve on the compressor to open.  Replaced it with another product. HVAV repairman said it has happened to many of their customers.
title: Warning, it has a serious bug will cost you in repairs

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: sipy
content: Everything you would hope for in a smart thermostat, and the care put into its design - both human interaction at the physical (wall unit) an electronic (the app) - are phenomenal. Cudos to Nest!  This device is as elegant, sexy and useful as it is "eco-friendly".  A real money saver in the High Desert where I live, where temperature swings can be as high as 40 degrees, day to night.
title: This 3rd Generation Nest Thermostat Rocks!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rashad
content: Thermostat is well built and works as described. I purchased 3 thermostats, after 7 months, one device stopped connecting to WIFI and to Nest APP. After contacting google nest support, they decided to send me a replacement. My expectation was very high from such product from a great company like google, i did not expect the device to malfunction within 7 months of use.
title: 7 Months later

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tomi Slighter
content: Well packaged and easy to install if you follow the directions.  Take your time and it will look awesome when done.  Very sturdy product and easy to use.  Love the display and functionality.  This was a tough decision for us to make given the expensive nature of this item, but we are very pleased with the outcome and performance.
title: Awesome product......love it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Leah
content: This item had been on mine and my husband's wish list for over a year. We finally decided to buy it as one of our Christmas gifts. It cam in and my husband installed it. The air would come on but not the heat. My husband reached out to 3 Nest geeks that he was willing to pay to get our Nest working and NONE of them reached back out to him. We waited 3 weeks for someone to reach out to us and they never did so we returned it.
title: Disappointed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: E. Kana
content: I can finally change the settings of my home’s AC/HEATER while I’m out or at work.  I have two smol doggos, and it’s hellish during peak hot afternoons.  Since it’s cold when I leave the house, it wouldn’t make sense for me to leave the AC on all day, and even if I want to leave the setting on... I’m trynna safe money and spend more yknow.  Also, having multiple Nest products in the house is nice since it uses only one app :)
title: Controlling the temperature inside your home from outside is p gr8

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Cristina
content: No one should ever purchase this item. I bought two for my new home and in the middle of the night they decided to not work. we woke up to a very hot house in the middle of a NY summer over 85 degrees, at the time my duaughter was only a few months old and could have over heated. I tried to contact NEST about the issue and they could care less. Supposedly NEST runs on WiFi and while searching for WiFi the connection was blown. Very dangerous Situation. Took forever for a refund of the item from Amazon bc they said I had to go through nest first who was no help. Then upon returning both I was recharged for one saying they didn’t get the second that was in the same box. I would never ever recommend this item to anyone. We are now back to the original thermostats and have never had an issue ever again.
title: Stop working middle of night and over heated my house.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J.C. Ross
content: After trying several different smart thermostats (Ecobee and Honeywell) the third time was the charm when j went with the 3rd Gen Nest Thermostat. Simple to set up, intuitive to use, love the whole works with Nest infrastructure. My house is getting smarter all the time. I paired this with two Nest Protects and it all linked up with my Hue lights, my Simplisafe Alarm, my WeMo outlets, and of course Alexa! The auto away feature works in several ways (uses my phone for location to know if I am nearby) or by arming/disarming the SimpliSafe, it tells the thermostat when I am or am not at home and raises/lowers it to energy saving modes when I leave or raises/lowers it to my comfort when I come home. How cool is that? If you're on the fence about going into the Nest or (Works with Nest protocols, do it! By all means, I don't know what took me so long, but wow! Hey Alexa, set Nest to 68 degrees! And Voila! It does it!
title: I finally hit the jackpot!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James Holden
content: The thermostate works great with alexa and makes managing the temperature hip and cool. I'm able to scale the temperature by using alexa voice commands. The setup was done by a technician I hired from best buy so I can't comment on how hard it was to install
title: Works great with Alexa

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sharon Brubaker
content: This is a very easy item to install, as well as the mobile app!  It's great to turn your heat on, off up or down if you're not there. It was purchased for a friend who was traveling to work twice a day once to turn the heat or air on then went back home and came back to work an hour later. Now she can do it from home or anywhere. It will also save her gas and milage on her car!! This was a GREAT buy!!  :-)
title: Great Product!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jkelly
content: I love being able to control the thermostat everywhere. My boyfriend likes to turn the heat up and forgets about it, so this is perfect since it will turn down to my eco setting when we are gone, and I can change the temp from bed if we are too hot/cold. I got it because I thought we didn't have a C (common) wire, but turned out the little blue wire was taped off behind the existing thermostat so we were able to use that. Everything has worked as expected:)
title: Seems to work great!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: K Welch
content: Seller: Endless Technologies Received item intended for pro installers labeled with "Not for retail sale" on packaging. This SKU has no warrantee. After being challenged, rep further tried to double down on the scam and tell me "Nest Pro" was a higher level SKU than "Nest". That is a complete fabrication. "Pro" refers to the fact that it is sold only to professional installers, who are be responsible to provide the warrantee Product itself is not an issue. However, how can be buy here if we can't rely on Amazon to police the sellers?
title: Sellers running Gray Market Scam

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: zerotoone
content: I held out from buying this because I didn't want to deal with the hassle of hiring a tech to install it for me. The $50 rebate offered by the local utility was enough though get me off the fence. Install was a breeze, literally, even though mine was a the "more complicated" dual fuel system that the Nest website even recommended to hire a pro. I called support and sent them a picture of the wiring in my existing unit, and very quickly they sent me back a photo of how each of the wires should go into the Nest. It was that simple and setting it up from there was a breeze. It took less than 30 minutes, and I even got it to pair with Alexa! Highly recommend. Don't delay and get yourself a unit if you're still holding out. So many useful features to mention here but what a keeper!
title: What a keeper!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DMAN
content: I use Alexa Echo’s around the house and it is so very convenient and so cool to control my thermostat from anywhere with my voice! You can set the face of the control panel to show the inside temp, time, or outside temp when you pass by. I have it set to show outside temp. If I want to know the inside temp I can press the control on my wall or ask Alexa. It also tracks my history, learns my patterns, and turns down the heat when I exit my home and back up if it’s the time of day I prefer it warm inside. The settings are endless! I love it!
title: I love my Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Cynthia L Martin
content: I bought the Nest on Black Friday of 2019. I had it installed in my house in February 2020. It is now August and it went dark and I could not change the temperature. I called my internet technician to check it out and he said it was defective. It is August and I cannot have a thermostat not working. He tried but couldn't get it restarted so I had to re-purchase another thermostat from him with a 5 year warranty. I only used Amazon purchased Nest less than 7 months and the return policy says I cannot return it. I don't understand why. If this defective product can be returned someone needs to contact me to tell me how. Very dissatisfied customer!
title: If you buy this make sure you buy the insurance/extra warrenty

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Travis
content: Its expensive but it will help save you money on electricity. The learning feature works really really well, it learns your schedule and adjusts the temperature based on when you are home or not, as well as when the sun is directly facing your house. Its crazy how smart this little dude is. I use it in an apartment just follow the wiring guide and you're good.
title: LOVE IT... it is expensive though, works in apartments

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JerGal
content: Installation: pop off the older thermostat. Take a picture of the wiring connections.  With 2 stages of cooling and heating, there are a good number to remember.  Also, the wire colors may be different from standard, which mine were.  The mounting section was thinner than the one I replaced.  This required me to push the wiring back into the wall and, ultimately, required me to cut the wires down by about an 1 1/2 inches in length. Otherwise, the main unit would not seat correctly. The app setup worked well. Step by step.  Also, linked to Alexi.  All in all, easy Installation. Usage:  temperature setting changeable by turning thermostat directly, Nest app in phone, or through Alexi.
title: Easy Installation.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Spud
content: Bad product!  The first one was broken and needed to be replaced. The second operates the temperature fine but will not control the humidity. It will turn on but, once the target humidity is reached it will not turn off and continues to run wasting copious amounts of water.  Nest tech support was contacted and i was informed that they are experiencing problems with this and there doesn’t appear to be a fix. The tech support has been very unresponsive. Get an Ecobee 4!
title: Bad product! The first one was broken and needed ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JustJoeyW
content: This is an amazing investment. First once set up which any one could do. I was able to install this in 30 minutes or less. Down load the application and get to using. Remember to make a schedule when you’re away so it learns. It learns the temperatures you like. You can add sensors to enhance your comfort. I will say in the long run this unit should save you a lot. I am very happy. Five stars here
title: Amazing learning thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Richard h
content: The unit I received was renewed. It was noticeably scratched on the display screen. It was easy to install, but would not connect to the WiFi. I called Nest technical support and went through trouble shooting. The technician was great and even though the nest I purchased no longer had the manufacturer warranty they were able to send me a new working unit. So, amazon renewed products that’s certified to work was unreliable, nest was great.
title: Could of been better

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Prime 'Dude'
content: We needed a new motor for our AC unit and decided to get this Alexa ready thermostat.  Now I can control early morning heat and afternoon cooling with my voice through the Alexa on my Tablet. Works great, easy to set up and pleased with how easy it is to put everything on a schedule!!! Love is a strong word, but it fits with this device.
title: What a difference it makes!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Seung Taek James Lee
content: I live in 1930 built house. We have pipe heating and the thermostat is in 1st fl and bedroom in 2nd fl. Additionally we had old thermostat, and it was half broken while we were remodeling the house. So. I looked up the installation in youtube to make sure my thermostat is compatible. and it was so I purchase and installation was BREEZE.. done so quick.. out with old and in with new. LOVE THIS. ALL Shall have them..
title: LOVE THIS. ALL Shall have them

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Wright
content: Temperature swings widely in my region and I've previously gone to bed with it being 70 deg F outside and in the house and woken up to it being 30 deg F outside and 60 deg F in the house. I decided on the Nest because of the heat/cool feature that can turn on the heat or AC to keep your house to within 3 deg F. I also have an open floor plan area with high ceilings and like for the HVAC fan to turn on to help circulate that air.  In most other thermostats I found you can turn the fan to Auto, or On only.  The Nest allows you to set up on/off percentages of 0, 25%, 50%, 75% or 100%. Overall I'm very impressed so far and would recommend this product to friends.
title: Nice thermostat with a lot of features.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Bibi
content: So far, after a week of installation I give it 5 stars due to both the product itself, and their excellent customer service. We were unsure about compatibility after we received it, we called CS, and they helped us determine that it was within minutes. The NEST itself is beautiful -- probably sexier than you or I will ever be. As far as value goes, that is to be determined. I've had it only for a week, so not sure how much more efficient it will make my home, although I have a feeling that it will live up to its other reviews. Will update if I ever feel it deserves less than 5 stars.
title: Easy installation, great customer service, sexy product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Cassie
content: It looks a lot nicer than a Normal thermostat and the tech support while I was installing it was incredibly nice and helpful, on Christmas Day! It just seems like a lot of money for a slightly upgraded thermostat. It learns your habits which doesn’t come in handy for a schedule I have, but I recently learned how to turn that off. Still lots to learn, I suppose.
title: Slight upgrade

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dan L.
content: This stupid nest sent us down a wild goose chase thinking our furnace was going out.  It is mostly working for a year, but constantly fumbles with controlling heat.  It won't trigger the furnace and nothing is wrong with our furnace.  Avoid at all costs!!!
title: Waste of money!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shelley Iverson
content: LOVE the Nest!  Nice looking and works wonderfully well.  I enjoy the fact that I am able to control it with my smartphone no matter where I am.  It "learned" the cooling/heating schedule for the house in a week, requiring very little by way of actual adjustments by me.  Installation was fairly easy.  I was able to purchase the Nest on sale at Amazon, and then found $100 rebate from our gas company which brought the total price down to $99!  Recommend that all purchasers check with their gas providers as many/most offer rebates for these types of energy saving devices.  Highly recommend this product.
title: Nest:  GREAT Product!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Eva
content: This thermostat is not compatible with certain brands of furnaces! It burned our mother board on our new Carrier furnace. Seller refused to refund saying the refund period had lapsed,
title: Not compatible

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Doctorii
content: I am so happy with this thing I cant even tell you!  It was super easy to install with the instruction on their website and linked right up with my ECHO in a blink.  I absolutely LOVE being able to tell my Alexa to increase or decrease the heat without getting up or out of bed.  It learned the patterns of our heat use quickly and now does everything on its own so I don't even have to think about it.  I LOVE LOVE LOVE being part of the 21st Century and easy to use high-tech devices like this keep me from feeling like an old codger.
title: GET THIS THERMOSTAT, you WILL NOT be disappointed!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Alain Avakian
content: I have four zones in my house, and during spring/summer, a bird next to my kids' rooms would wake them up at 5:00am.  I had to wake up at 4:30, go to their rooms, and turn on the fan to down out the noise.  No more.  Since I got the Nest, i programmed it to turn on the fan from 5-7am daily in their rooms, and we all sleep well.  Installation was a breeze, I was able to do it myself, following their very simple instructions.  It literally took my no more then 10 minutes per Nest.  Connected it to my WiFi, downloaded the app on my iPhone, and now I can control all the rooms through the app.  I can't understate how useful this product is.  Brilliant design, amazing features, everything is well thought through.  When I bought it, the only thing I wished it had was the ability set the display to show the current temperature when you move near it, and literally 2 weeks after I wished this in an email to Nest, I got an email from them that they made it possible, and an update to all the nests was already done in the background.  Love this company!
title: Brilliant product!  Easy installation, amazing features!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: laura harmon
content: Ordering these saved us a good bit of money and they look just as nice and new as full price ones out of the box would have. They arrived out of the box, in priority mail cardboard mailers, but everything needed was included. They're working great and we're really pleased. We had these installed with our new ac units this past week and love how they integrate with our other smart home products!
title: Great value, arrived as described

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Smartt
content: I have had programmable thermostats for nearly 10 years and I finally decided to switch to a Nest.  It is worth having and saves money when compared to a typical programmable thermostat.  The home/away assist is nice.  However, for me, what is the best feature is how this thermostat has a setting to avoid going into auxiliary mode too often for anyone using a heat pump.  I have three heat pumps and heat a large open ceiling with a 28 foot ceiling.  The nest thermostats I purchased for my units have made a tremendous difference.
title: Worth It

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Azat
content: I liked The design, connection with Google Home devices, smart way of adjusting the temperature (it's a learning thermostat). What I disliked is when connected to temperature sensors it can't heat/cool by average temperature received from all sensors. But at the same it can work based on readings of the specific sensor, so it won't heat your bedroom too much when it's child in living room, when main reasons readings are retrieved from bedroom temperature sensor. Overall I liked it, and I think it's a device worth buying.
title: Beautiful and smart thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Klaudia Saylor
content: We had a Nest in our old place but decided to try the Ecobee in our new one. That was a big mistake! The wiring on the Ecobee is a nightmare, especially if you have an older HVAC system. We returned that "other" device and are happy to be back in the Nest family. Would recommend this device to anyone that is interested in ease of use, saving some energy costs, and having an overall comfortable home.
title: We returned that "other" device and are happy to be back in the Nest family

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sprov
content: Very easy install.  Hooked up four wires, white, green, yellow, and red (old system).  I used the dial to set everything up and it was quick,  so far, all is good. Next, installed the nest app on tablet and again, quick & easy. Plan to do the itfff code to pair with Amazon Echo. **UPDATE** Had the unit about two-three weeks now and simply love it. I really like the "History" feature that allows you to see when you cheated and cranked up the heat. The "Away" feature is really nice because you can have the heat or AC adjusted so you aren't using as much energy.  It kicks back in to where you like it when it senses your presence through motion sensors. Looking forward to seeing the electric and gas bill, should be considerably lower!
title: So far so good

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Caron
content: I am very happy with my Nest Gen 3 and I only had one little issue with the wiring. It would turn on the heater when it was supposed to be cooling and A/C when it was supposed to be heating. But after searching the user friendly online Nest troubleshooter, I was able to figure it out. Having a dual stage heat pump, there was supposed to be a wire in the O/B slot and then in the settings of the Nest itself, I had to switch from Heat Pump with O setting to B setting. As far as the installation, I was most impressed that I did not have to search my garage for supplies to install it. The box includes everything you will need to install the thermostat, down to the correct size screwdriver as well as stickers to label each wire prior to removing them from your old thermostat. I bought this product not only to cut down on energy usage, but I wanted it to work with my Amazon Alexa. After reading some of the reviews, I was a little hesitant though. There were many complaints about Alexa not understanding when asked about the current temperature at the thermostat. I have not had any issues with this at all. My advice is to say "Alexa, what is the temperature in <say the name of the location of your Nest that you chose during setup>" i.e. hallway, living room, bedroom. I am very excited to see what my energy usage is this month compared to last year's energy use.
title: Very Easy to Install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rich Miller
content: We love to save money on our energy bills... this device shows you how much you are saving and helps schedule on times and off times. It is easy to use and works with my wife's tablet or my Apple iPhone 6s+ to change the temperature, turn the fan off/on, and other functions here.
title: We love to save money on our energy bills

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Clinton Ross Clark
content: I’m incredibly disappointed in my Nest. I have had way too many issues with this. It keeps activating my heat pump while the AC is running, which isn’t exactly ideal when it’s 97 outside. I even had a professional come out and verify that it was installed correctly, but I still get random bursts of hot air from the vents while my AC is running. I should have stuck with my cheap thermostat.
title: Disappointed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Christina
content: We had to replace our old one because we moved. It has been helpful to us to save some money when we are gone. The house we moved into has the original equipment from the 80s. It’s been great to be able to see how cold it is at home when we are gone and to hear it up before we get home. Everything is pretty easy to understand and install is pretty easy.
title: Easy install and super useful!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: garyhere
content: this thermostat would not turn on cooling for heat pump. after a $129 service call determined fault was internal to thermostat. returned for refund.
title: defective on delivery

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Bob N
content: Out of all the smart gadgets for the home this perhaps is one that will pay for itself several times over in the coming years. Easy to install and set up and it does the rest from there. The one I purchased had a problem with the base plate heating up so i called tech support at Nest. The tech had me check a couple of things and sent me out a new mounting base, which I received the next day. Installed it and it hasn't missed an beat since then. Great product and great tech support. A definite Win, Win situation.
title: Money saving T-Stat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rebecca Becerra
content: So much wanted to rate this 5 stars, because the Nest design and functionality is 5 stars. However, I rated it 4 stars because once my husband installed it, it didn't work for a week and a half. My husband had to call several times and talk with Nest to figure out why the battery was running down and not charging (make this change, evaluate for 24 hours, call us back). Finally after about the 5th call and being escalated to a senior agent, Nest said that we would need to call an HVAC person to run a Common wire because our current wiring was not providing the Nest enough power to charge. They said they would reimburse the cost of the HVAC person. We got an email with a link to local Nest authorized HVAC people and had someone come out pretty quickly. HVAC guy got the job done and said that this issue happens all the time with Nest Thermostats (but he did say its worth it because the Nest is awesome). Anyway, now everything is working great, but getting there was a bit frustrating. I submitted the HVAC invoice to Nest and haven't yet heard back, though they did say it could take 4-8 weeks for us to get a check in the mail. Hopefully there's no hiccup in the reimbursement process.
title: We got an email with a link to local Nest authorized HVAC people and had someone come out pretty quickly. HVAC guy got the job d

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mia
content: This was one of the worst purchases I’ve made. It’s caused other problems with my HVAC system. I had ongoing problems with temp control and I should have took a lost and replaced it when I was having temperature problems. In the end it’s cost me more money due to the sensitive nature to lighting storms. I would purchase something else.
title: Don’t do it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Matthew M Beegle
content: Doesn't really do much more than you could do with a programmable thermostat.  Mine broke after less than 6 months and when I called them to get a replacement they said they would ship it in 5 to 7 days. How am I supposed to go 5 to 7 days without being able to control my heat or air conditioning when it's 90° out? On top of that they offered me no future discounts or any sort of compensation for the huge amount of time and energy I had to waste on dealing with getting a replacement.
title: DONT WASTE THE MONEY

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Stacey Crawford
content: Very easy to set up and easy to use. Bought this as a Christmas gift and it makes handling the temperature very easy. I no longer have to go downstairs and make adjustments if I’m home for a day off and our schedule kicks in. It learned our schedule pretty fast with only some minor adjustments. Would definitely recommend.
title: Easy setup and easy to use.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tech, Toys, Food & More
content: I was skeptical about the nest thermostat at first. I decided to bite the bullet and purchase it. The installation could not have gone any easier for me. I love the fact that I can control my thermostat while being away from home. What I like best about the nest thermostat is the ability to see my energy savings on the daily weekly monthly level. I look forward to get in the monthly reports from nest. I've had my unit installed and working out for approximately one week. If you're considering buying The nest thermostat I highly recommend that you do. Also, check with your energy provider, they may have a rebate for you. I will be receiving a check for $75 because I purchased a nest thermostat.
title: Fun, interactive, and cost savings.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Chris Marlier
content: If you’re even remotely good at wiring things you can install this. It’s amazing how much better it is than a standard-programmable thermostat. My mother has trouble using the actual device to switch between heat and cool cycles, but you can tell Alexa to change the thermostat mode to heat or to cool and she does it for you.
title: Smart thermostat that will pay for itself if you use eco mode

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Marty Piraino
content: I got  this thermostat after moving from a 1br apartment to a 2br condo I purchased, having moved into a little larger living space I wanted to have more control over the AC and heat (though here in Phoenix Arizona heat is hardly used in the winter). Having another room and about 100sqft more living space I expected my electric bill to be higher, using the home/away assist I just went through the summer here and my largest bill was about $138, in the apartment I had bills sometimes approaching $220+ sometimes. I also got a $75 bill credit from my utility for installing the Nest thermostat. It was a breeze to install, though I did have to contact support and send a pic of the wiring on the old thermostat, they sent me back the wiring diagram and it worked perfectly.
title: Works great

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Roger Mayday
content: I've had this for a year and a half.  The first year we had one schedule and 2 months ago my wife started working full time so we tried to change the schedule.  EVERY WEEK it goes back to the old schedule and I have to log into the Nest app to change it every week!  Even after I change it in the app the next day it changes back  I'm getting rid of this expensive junk and putting in a normal programable thermostat.  It's WAISTING MY MONEY!!!!
title: ITS WAISTING MY MONEY AND CHANGING THE SCHEDULE ON THE APP DOES NOTHING!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: raquel adams
content: Easy enough to install but I didn’t have access to the basement if my apt to turn off power. I had to call someone to come out which was a pain. Install was doable but a little complicated. Love my best though! It’s saved money and I love being able o control it from my phone. I never really even have to set the temp due to the habit tracking creating a schedule based on your activity! The copper color is really nice!
title: Love this thing!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Cc
content: Great when it worked.  Now, 8 months later, had to be replaced. Beware.
title: Nest fails.  Not good!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Arecel
content: I'm really disappointed that this doesn't work with my two wire furnace system.  I went through the compatibility checker and and spoke with support, and ultimately it won't power the unit, even though it says it's compatible.  What a waste of money, and now I'm past my return period.  Really unfair that can't take this back when it feels like false advertising.
title: Doesn't Work!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: David King
content: Nest is removing their “Works with Nest” API in August, and not providing a replacement that is writable meaning I won’t be able to control them using HomeKit/Homebridge. This was a key feature for me, and now that it’s going away I wish I would have purchased the ecobee instead.
title: Removing key features after purchase

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JS
content: Great thermostat. Easy step-by-step installation instructions. Swapping out the old thermostat takes <10 minutes, but be prepared to do a little patchwork on the wall from your old thermostat mounting plate. The Nest has a small footprint, and previous holes tend to show. Well worth the extra few minutes to clean up the wall; the Nest looks much better without the optional baseplate. The device itself and app are both very easy to use. Programming the thermostat only takes a minute, and over time it adds additional adjustments to the schedule based on your habits. The auto-away feature is particularly valuable, as I rarely think to adjust the thermostats on my way out the door.
title: Love it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Yamen
content: It’s great tool to have, but make sure if you need a technical support you need to ask for a supervisor or high advanced tech, otherwise you’ll waste hours on the phone with long time on hold
title: Good tool

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Miki B
content: Going on month 2 of using the Nest and love it!  It "learned" our routine pretty quickly with little input on the app from me and are enjoying having a "smart" HVAC system!  Only downside I can see...is I don't like that it lights up every time you walk past it...it's really bright when it's pitch dark in the house.  Need to see if I can change that, but that is my only complaint.  Would recommend to anyone!
title: Wish we would have done this sooner!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gavn Rey
content: Works great! The only issue I really have with it (and it can be fixed by a simple software update) is that I am also using it to control a whole-house humidifier attached to my furnace.  Previous experience with thermostat/humidistat combinations is with a set humidity level % that can vary slightly with outdoor temperature to keep windows from frosting.  However, Nest uses a system where you can set the number of water drops that apparently sets the humidity range.  And this can only be done by navigating the menu to the "equipment" settings. There is no indication as to the range that the water drops represents, so there will be a little bit of a learning curve on my part because of it. Also had a power brownout once that caused the thermostat to report that it had no power.  Had to remove it from the back plate (not hard to do at all) and just click it back on.  No similar problem since.
title: Works great!  Needs slight software modifications to better control humidifiers.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Luis
content: I just installed this thermostat and is an amazing addition to my IoT, it connected very easily to my Nest Dropcam and to my Google Home. I can ask Google Home to raise, lower temp, ask the temp inside etc. NEST is part of Alphabet which owns Google so they work seemless. The installation is extremely easy, just go to the nest site and check the compatibility of your current thermostat and follow the installation video. The screwdriver is supplied and the screws grip on most drywall so no need to drill. Took me less than 30 min to install with minimal tools.
title: Amazing! Really easy to install.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: buzymomof2
content: We needed to upgrade our thermostat and decided we wanted to get a smart one. We purchased this after doing the research and decided this one was best for us. Install and set up was easy and connecting to the app on our phone is great! Right now we are using the set schedule mode but plan to try the learning mode. Highly recommend!
title: Awesome Thermostat!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jordan
content: It's -20F outside and this thing would not hold the temperature when I leave the house - if I set it manually at 74F it would shut the heat off on its own after I leave, so I come back to a cold house. I changed all possible settings according to Nest and also reading online - the thing simply cannot hold temperature even in extreme weather, it does what it wants and changes temperature settings on its own. Whoever designed and programmed this thing must have done this intentionally to piss people off, no way this is a mistake - I cannot imagine such a dumb person exists on this planet.
title: No way to hold temperature / no manual mode

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: SPAR
content: I bought two of these thermostats for my home and have used them for about 6 weeks. First, they were a breeze to install. Both my units are two-stage systems and the wiring diagrams were clear and easy to understand. After 6 weeks of usage, I believe our awareness of energy usage has increased. I think the home away feature will save us a lot in usage. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the "learning" feature is not quite working right, but hopefully it will truly "learn" over time.
title: Great buy - easy to install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Greenie Weenie
content: I’ve spent six weeks trying to get warrantee service from them. The company said they would mail a replacement two weeks ago. Nothing came now they want me to put a deposit down for a new one but they have yet to send any emails or links to even make that happen. Worst customer service ever. The thermostat worked great for 8 months, but then stopped being able to find or make a WiFi connection.
title: Worst customer service of my life

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: blake
content: So I installed it wrong and couldn't get it to blow hot air. Nest customer support talked to me for over an hour and walked me through what needed to be changed in order to get the thermostat installed and the proper settings adjusted. Was a less than ideal situation, where I was entirely at fault. And they all but bent over backwards to help me get up and running. I'll be a Nest customer for life.
title: great product, great company

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jhoc
content: Wiring instructions were totally unhelpful in figuring out where to connect existing, unlabeled 2 wires from old T-stat. Searched online for 2-wire wiring diagrams, then took a guess at where to connect based on multiple images I sifted through. T-stat eventually powered up, and now works like a charm. Need to be patient in figuring out unlabeled wiring, or fork out some extra cash for a professional install.
title: Instructions not helpful for existing, unlabeled 2-wire system

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ernie
content: Recently I installed this unit in my house, and am in love with it. If you think it is hard to install, it really is not. You can literally know nothing about thermostats, but the included easy to read instructions, as well as the videos on their website make this a piece of cake. Once it was installed, the on screen instructions made the initial setup very easy. The unit properly detected my wiring and started to control my cooling system in no time. Using this to control my house when I'm not home gives me so much piece of mind. If you have any doubts about it, believe me, you won't regret this purchase. The nerd in you, as well as your wallet, will thank you!
title: and am in love with it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: moie
content: The electrician hooked it up for me because he was there doing other work.  I programmed and took it live on line.  I use it to control the temperature on my vacation property.  when I say it is easy to set up, I really mean it.  Follow the instruction (on line) and you will find it easy.  I suggest this product to anyone wanting to control thermostat from a distance.  No more asking anyone to go over to check on my home in the New England winters!
title: Come on winter!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. K.
content: The installation tutorials and instructions in the app were good but incorrect. In the end to got the thermostat to recognize my trane system as a traditional AC : Furnace system required me to use the online chat tech support in order to got a custom wire diagram. The good news is that the chat was easy and helpful. I just wish the original app was a bit smarter. Once installed the system has been very cool and easy to use.
title: Easy to use  install a crap shoot

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mike K.
content: So far, I love it. Installation was a breeze and I like that I can control it from anywhere and will add additional devices as time goes on. For me this was an important feature, living up north and sometimes losing power in the winter, it is peace of mind knowing the house is fine - or not.:)) Very impressed with package content, they have thought of everything and 99% of owners should not have an issue installing or setting it up. Not sure how much energy I will save as my old thermostat could be programmed manually, but I look forward to the monthly energy reports and maybe some fine tuning that could come from this. Would buy again based on my use so far.
title: I love it. Installation was a breeze and I like ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Randy Bretzinger
content: It was very easy to install and I liked how easy it was to set up.  The only reason it didn’t get a 5 star rating is because it worked great for about two weeks, then I started having problems with my  air-conditioner.  It started shutting down even though it hadn’t reached it’s setting yet.  I thought there was something wrong with the air-conditioner so I called for service.  Long story short he couldn’t find anything wrong with the unit then he asked me what kind of thermostat I had. When I told him it was a nest. He said he was having trouble with some nest thermostats.  Even though I had it wired correctly, I only had four wires going to the thermostat. I didn’t have a wire going to common, and the instructions didn’t tell me I needed one so the thermostat was sending the wrong message to the air-conditioner. The technician added the wire to go to common and now it’s working fine.  Instructions should’ve let me know that with some units you may need a common wire. It would’ve saved me $120.
title: Great unit, works best if you have five wires going to your thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Donald Macdonald
content: One of the best WiFi products I've used in a long time. It is wonderful to see oil burner usage daily, turn the heat down while you're away (automatically) and turn to up before you come home from a trip. Elegant and simple to use. Set up was a little tricky until I realized you had to physically turn the thermostat dial to get to different functions. I have their outdoor camera which also works like a charm. A great company with well made functional products.
title: Best WiFi thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: The Wolfen
content: I am very impressed with the Nest thermostat. I find its learning capabilities to be more useful than I originally expected and especially like its connection to the Alexa system. Monitoring and adjusting the temperature of my home is easy and flexible. Connecting two smartphones to the Nest account makes it possible for it to know when no one is home and adjust the temps accordingly. Installation was a breeze. While I am very experienced with thermostat installation, I think anyone will find it a very straightforward process that takes only minutes. After using the system for several weeks now, I have zero complaints and it has exceeded all my expectations. Highly recommended!
title: Nest thermostat is amazingly capable and simple to install!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Moises Cardona
content: Very easy to self-install. Configuring it was easy too. It works as it should and I like the additional energy insights as well as its different configuration options. The unit is very silent, compared to the old thermostat which would make a "click" sound whenever it was activating or deactivating the AC.
title: Very easy to self-install.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: G_G
content: The golden standard for smart thermostats. Compatible with many-many heating and cooling equipment. Very simple to install: just hook the wires from your old thermostat, doesn't matter if those are 2, 3, 4 or whatever you have installed. No need to run extra power line (C wire) or anything weird. Great phone app to control your home temperature from anywhere around the world.
title: Can't get better than this

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: HooveH
content: This product fails in what I believe should be the top priority of a thermostat, to maintain my house close to the temperature that I set.  For example, I set it at 75 degrees.  It turns off the A/C at 74 degrees which is perfect.  But it doesn't turn it back on until it is almost 77 degrees.  This is failure.  I don't care that the system does it to save my A/C from the wear and tear by limiting the number of times my A/C turns on and off.  I don't care that it might save me a bit of money.  The main thing that I want from a thermostat is to KEEP MY HOUSE AT THE TEMPERATURE I SET IT AT.  Saving equipment wear and tear and saving money should be secondary. My house gets too hot when it starts getting close to 77 degrees and it forces me to have to manually adjust the temperature.  I didn't have to do that with the cheap thermostat I had before.  Being able to manually adjust the tolerance of when my A/C turns on should be an option in the settings.  When I researched this problem and saw on the Nest.com forums that people have been complaining about this since 2013, it didn't give me a lot of hope that this problem will be resolved anytime soon.  Looking for alternative thermostats now.
title: Doesn't do main purpose of a thermostat, keep house close to desired temperature

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Clifford Hansen
content: I am no electrician, but within an hour I had installed 2 Nest Thermostats, downloaded the app from iTunes and was on my way to figuring out how to connect it to other apps and playing with it on my iphone. It's super easy to play with and even though I'm only a few days in, when I walked downstairs to make coffee this morning, the Nest had already learned to warm up the downstairs a little before 7AM. It has also already learned to turn the heat down around 10PM upstairs and to energy saving mode downstairs. We live high in the mountains so the relative savings for heating our home by being able to keep the temperature in check is important. I'm psyched to see how it works long term, but I already love the ease of use.
title: It's super easy to play with and even though I'm only ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Alanda Bulger
content: I have had the nest almost a month, and feel I can finally give it a valid review. Installation was a breeze, everything necessary for a clean installation was included (although having a cordless screwdriver helps), including screwdriver and mounting plate.  Programming was a simple and easy process, nest automatically detects your network, then sends an email to complete installation.  The app works great, allowing complete customization and modifications anywhere you have signal. One of the biggest complaints I read was that Nest didn't show the current temp, only what temp it was set to.  This appears to have been corrected as there is a setting for displaying current temp. The app shows usage for the last 10 days, and once the Nest learns your patterns it begins to set the temp automatically.  This feature was particularly helpful for me, I noticed the system was working harder and harder, although the weather hadn't changed significantly.  When I had my A/C system checked, I found my system had a coolant leak!  Once that was repaired, I immediately noticed my system running more efficiently. Overall I am 110% satisfied with Nest, and am seriously considering adding additional Nest products.
title: 110% Satisfied with Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dave in Dallas
content: FOR THE RIGHT SITUATION.....the Nest thermostat is wonderful; a truly great thermostat I REALLY wanted to like this thermostat..... I REALLY NEEDED to like this thermostat because I installed it in another town to control the replacement TRANE HVAC in my wife's elderly parents home. The stress it caused them and me is amazing. (Over the phone, I heard my mother in law cry for the first time in 30 years) I'm an IT professional, and I thought this was going to be my best purchase ever. After 3 frustrating weeks, I reluctantly removed it and installed a $43 non Wi-Fi Honeywell digital thermostat for them that is meeting their needs for now.  (Yes the Honeywell is labeled up 'goof-proofed" and qualifies for a spot on thereifixedit.com) Be aware that the NEST thermostat isn't ideal for occupants with diminished mental and / or motor capacity. (Dementia, Parkinsons, etc) It isn't ideal for occupants who stay at home most of the time and want a thermostat that can do what their old familiar round Honeywell mercury thermostat did but with automated heat/cool functionality and Wi-Fi remote control. It isn't ideal if you  need: 1. HOLD the temp entered - "set it and forget it".... and just Heat when the home gets too cool, and cool when the home gets too warm. Automatically - Without schedules, or manual mode changes. 2. Allow easy temperature changes... Bath time - manually turn the temperature up - even though it's already 76 degrees in the house and without caring whether the heat mode or cool mode is currently active in Nest "Heat/Cool Mode setting". 3. SIMPLIFIED DISPLAY - turn the dial right to cool the room, turn it left to warm the room without having to switch modes and without accidentally activating an unwanted menu routine that they don't understand and can't figure out how to exit from. (The Heat/Cool range display is confusing even for the rep to explain on the phone) 4. FULL functionality from the app - see EXACTLY what is displayed on the Nest screen and  perform a soft reset remotely to correct the problem in #3 above if necessary. 5. Lock out all but the most basic functions - See #3 again and would require a true automatic mode #1. I spent hours on the phone with the fantastic customer support team at Nest. (call during normal business hours if you want the best chance for On-Shore support). The reps are courteous, empathetic, and a pleasure to work with, but they can't change the basic functionality programmed into the unit. Since I work with software developers, I know every one of the items above can be addressed in the NEST software IF they care to do so. When they are addressed, I'll buy one for myself, but this gen 3 unit is going on Craigslist. I hope this is helpful....
title: Not ideal for occupants with mildly diminished mental capacity.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jason Lowe
content: Very solid build quality and good design.. Only thing to remember is that this is round and your old one is prob. square so you will have holes and painting to do prior to mounting... unless you use the included square wall plate which I don't think looks very good... If you want a square piece of plastic on the wall get a different thermostat... Works very well and setup was very easy... I would like it to show the current temp in the room vs what you see is what it is set too. There should be a way to see both and not disrupt the look of the thermostat.
title: Good, could use a small update..

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Courtney B.
content: I'd give these 5 stars but they don't hold a charge at all. They are supposed to charge themselves (without a C wire) when the fan is running but ours won't. Nest thought it might be our router/wifi that was draining it but it's been off for 2 days and there has been no change. I guess it's time to hook up the C wire, because I do love the thermostats. ***update*** After installing the C wire, it has been working great. Over the last month, we have saved a lot of money. Living in Arizona, our AC runs a lot and this has really helped to regulate it. I still can't give it 5 stars though, since we had to install a C wire, even though it states that it is not at all necessary.
title: because I do love the thermostats

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mustafa Shah
content: We recently installed a new Central air conditioning in our house  So we purchased a Nest via  Amazon after checking the compatibility,on Nest website , had it professionally installed by  the HVAC tech,  worked for a few mins and now constantly giving an Error Message E 103 Calling Nest support is a waste of time they make you wait on the phone for 30 mins we have ordered another unit to see if it works in our dual zone home otherwise it will be returned sadly we really wanted this to work it looks pretty cool with a lot of functions
title: worked for a few mins and now constantly giving an Error Message E 103 Calling Nest support is a waste of time they make you wait on the phone ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: grizzle
content: I like this product but the company tries too hard to be different, which is clearly evident in the packaging. The screws and mounting hardware are all loose in the box, but sandwiched into holding places between fancy molded inserts that are difficult to remove from the box. You have to turn the box over to get the inserts out, so the screws wind up falling out too, and potentially getting lost. Functional Design 101: IT'S PRETTY BUT NOT PRACTICAL. Just put the screws in a little baggie and skip the fancy molded inserts.
title: Smart Thermostat. Dumb Packaging.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DaCreature
content: I was hesitate to purchase this due to the price.  I decided to pull the trigger and get it.  I do not regret it.  The nest allows me to put set it as away so I can have a range of low and high that it will stay in when I am out of the house.  I am able to program the temperature that I want in the future. This allows me to wake up to a little warmer house that when I sleep.  The phone app allows me to control the thermostat from anywhere that I have Internet connection.  This device allows me to be more comfortable in my house and has also saved me money on my electricity bill.
title: Amazing product.  Enhance comfort and save money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Julia Tochilovsky
content: Better off with $10 dumb thermostat. Mine worked for a while then both died and now I have spent hours and hours on the phone with the nice Nest techs trying to troubleshoot, had one t-stat and both bases replaced, all to no avail! It's just nuts! Can't return them can't sell them since I don't know if they are functional. STAY AWAY!
title: Garbage

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mark Poole
content: After working for a couple of weeks, it seemed to stop cooperating with our furnace. It would say it was heating to target temperature but indicate 2+ hours to do so. Then the furnace would shut down before getting there, and start up again later. Temperature would never reach target. We tried resetting the device and erasing the schedule it had created. This I suppose could be troubleshooted. But then there’s the lack of Apple HomeKit and Siri support as well. I ripped it out today and replaced it with an ecobee4 thermostat which, in addition to being MUCH simpler to configure, supports HomeKit out of the box (bye bye Nest app) AND has Amazon Alexa built in.
title: Stopped working after a few weeks; does not work with Siri

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Evelyn Lugo
content: I purchased in June and hired an HVAC professional to install. After several calls to Nest support, it was determined that we had a faulty plate so we attempted to install the 2nd and again after several calls and a couple of hours, determined that that one wouldn't hold its charge long enough to install. In both cases, the window to return them had lapsed so I am out of $400 plus and then had to buy a regular thermostat to boot! Lesson here, do not buy this product until you are ready to install it!
title: I bought two and neither worked!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Laurinda
content: Everything about this thermostat has been a piece of cake. It took literally five minutes to install since we didn’t have any wall damage or paint to fix from the old thermostat. It’s been really nice to control the thermostat from my phone. No more getting out of bed when I forget to turn the AC on at night or shut it off when I start work. Working from home, it’s great as well since I can’t always leave my desk and will occasionally get hot.
title: It’s been really nice to control the thermostat from my phone

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: mb
content: I’ve own 2 Nest thermostats. Started with V.1. Installed for 4 years. I just purchased V.3 to get the sensor functionality. I don’t have a C wire and no problems. However I take it off the wall every 4 months or so and charge the battery.  Works flawlessly. The only reason I upgraded was for the sensor.  Otherwise, V.1 is solid.
title: C wire

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shirley A Keller
content: We bought the Nest to control our furnace while out of area for a few weeks. While we were in Florida I received a notification that my Nest Thermostat was not working. I contacted my son to check on our home. He tried to fix the thermostat and did some trouble shooting with google ,but was not able to get it to function. The temperature outside was 1 degree. After a few hours of phone calls and research I called a heating service and had to replace the Nest with a Honeywell thermostat.  What a waste of money. Purchased in October and off the system in January. No recourse or refund to my $218 Nest purchase.
title: The Nest is a waste of money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Robert Geller
content: When Google changed the "Away" mode to "Eco" , it was never changed on the Alexa interface.  Therefore you cannot open your windows with a voice command. If I  tried "set AC to 80 degrees", it will be overridden by the next schedule setting. I use Logitech Harmony as a workaround.  But with that interface going away, Nest/Alexa integration is not useful for anyone who likes to open windows.
title: Beware of Eco for Alexa integration if you open windows

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Roni Adams
content: Wanted this for a long time.  While I turn the heat down when I leave for work, I never could figure out how to program it to come on before I get home from work. Now I don't have to worry about it.  I turn the heat down and then before I leave work I open the app on my phone and turn the heater on.  I come home to a warm house!  This also learns my patterns so it raises the heat when it knows I usually do and it lowers it every night at the same time when I go to bed.  I love this thermostat!
title: Every bit as good as I thought it would be

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sundar Ramadoss
content: I bought two Nest 3rd Gen thermostats from Amazon on thanksgiving sale and have been very satisfied since installing them in Dec 2015. The thermostat is really smart and does what it says it will do. Had to go thru an installation issue ( Nest support really sucks - they go thru standard questions, ask you to send photos on the wiring etc., but no useful outcome ). As mentioned by one reviewer earlier, one of my Nest won't stop heating even after reaching the set temperature. After hiring a HVAC technician to rule out any issues with the HVAC unit, the technician actually found shorted wires behind the wall where you install the Nest thermostat unit. I came to know that it is a standard practice to clip the thermostat wires against the wall frame to prevent them from slipping down inside the wall. In my case they clipped it so hard that the insulation on the individual colored wires came off and were shorted. Since I ran a separate C wire, it also turned on the heat whenever the unit tried to charge itself resulting in Nest complaining over voltage. After cutting the wires just below where they were clipped and connecting them to Nest again resolved the issue. Hope it helps somebody save a technician visit. However one benefit I actually had with the technician visit is that he found out that my Lennox HVAC unit is a two stage system, but was wired as a single stage unit.  He tested the second stage and connected the wire ( I had extra unused wires running from the unit to the thermostat mount ) to turn it on. Nest supports two stage units and it is working like charm ever since.
title: Nest works...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: guitarchick
content: We really enjoy our thermostat. I wasn’t convinced I wanted one but when our last one died and our gas and electric companies were offering rebates, we thought we’d give it a try. We enjoy the energy usage reports, the night light and leaf functions, and the ability to adjust the temperature from our phones. Sometimes it does seem the thermostat is a little too “smart” and anticipates temperatures we may not want on that particular day at that particular time, but that’s a minor inconvenience. Overall, it’s been an excellent product.
title: Great investment, easy to install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Matt Agnello
content: I was really excited to get a Nest thermostat for a condo my wife and I just moved into. However, after installing the Nest, we started to see strange behavior, like the heat never turning off. I was on the phone with Nest for hours diagnosing the problem to no avail. We had an HVAC tech come and look at it, and he couldn't figure it out. We got a replacement from Nest that had the same problem. We even had a Nest Pro come by to take a look, and he couldn't figure it out. We ended up getting a third replacement, and that didn't function either. It's possible there's a problem with our HVAC unit, but I find it hard to believe that no tech was able to identify what that problem was or how to fix it, and a regular thermostat works just fine with it. The only conclusion I can draw is the Nest is doing something weird with my particular HVAC package unit, but Nest is unable to figure out what that is. Since I bought Nest to *save* time and attention, I was unhappy that I had to spend so much on it. Since it's past the return date, I'm planning on selling mine. I'm sure Nest will probably work for most people; the interface and app are great, and it works great as a smart thermostat when it does work. But beware of it not working. It's possible the problem will be entirely opaque and will eat up a lot of your time and attention.
title: Didn't work with my HVAC unit for no apparent reason

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Fred Deitz
content: Got the new 3rd generation Nest "Learning" Thermostat recently. I put "learning" in quotes as so far it has not demonstrated any learning features. The so-called "Early On" feature has only worked one day so far, and that apparently was a fluke as it hasn't worked since. Looking at the online support forum a lot of people are having this problem. I contacted Nest customer support and they stated "a few people" were having the problem (!!) and it would be fixed in an upcoming software release coming out in January! So, this thermostat doesn't do what a thermostat I had in my former house 10 years ago did fine, bring on the heat or air conditioning at some time before the scheduled time, so it reaches the desired scheduled temp at that time. At this point, it is NOT a learning thermostat, and I am rather disappointed that what is a basic function is reported not to be working by many users online! I hope it will start learning and doing "Early On", as without that, it is definitely NOT worth $249!
title: Disappointed "learning" features are not currently working!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Bernard Clarke
content: My nest worked for the first 4-5 months. Then it started go offline. It also wold turn itself on and off when ever it felt like it. It would freeze while the AC unit was operating. It would take forever to try to reset the nest so I could shut off the ac. We woke up freezing at 4 am.  Contacted nest customer support.  They walked me through steps for 5 hours with no solution. It took over 2 weeks to try to get help. They still never helped. I finally contacted Amazon and Amazon gave me a refund. Buyer beware. Terrible customer service. I wasn’t asking for a refund through nest. I would have been okay trying to get a replacement for the one I already had but I was never offered a replacement from best not a refund. Thank Goodness for Amazon Prime
title: Poor customer service

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Robert M. Becker
content: I LOVE this thing.  I paired it up with my Amazon Echo, and I can control everything just by talking to it.  It was easy to install, too.  The directions that came with it were very easy to understand.  It's great to be able to turn off the heat or AC while you're not home, and then turn it on over the Internet when you're a couple minutes away from home again.  It's not cheap, but I think it'll easily pay for itself in about a year.  I have nothing bad to say about it.
title: I LOVE this thing

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Patrick.S
content: I wanted to get a smart thermostat for awhile because traditional thermostats are hard to program. The black Friday deal was definitely a steal. Now i can control the temperature right from my phone and I can program it with such ease. Since I only had it for a month, not sure how much money I'm actually saving, but just the ease of use alone i think its well worth the investment.
title: Loving it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shawn Nunnally
content: I really love having smart devices in my home.  I got this and was able to get it installed at my previous home but after contacting support and having to make some wiring changes that didn't seem to be in the manual.  Moved houses and took this with me.  Again, ran into wiring issues which needed help from customer support again.  After it is setup and working the way you are hoping it will then everything is great.
title: Great.....after you get it setup properly

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: oscar oswaldo farje orna
content: I had bad luck with it before I got it working.
