My came defective from the factory and the tech support took forever to pass me to a really technician even he needed a supervisor help to troubleshoot it. I got the new one and had the same problem "the device and the tech support" even tho I asked to pass me directly with the technician I wsten time with the operator asking me the same questions over and over even tho I told the technician I'm a Industrial electrician and installed another unit at another property already. No problems after at all after I got the 3rd unit
title: Sent me a defective unit twice, after that no problems with it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Flower
content: Bought this in March of 2019. Started out great with no issues, but ever since google bought nest, I have had nothing but problems. I have gone through 3 thermostats and still no resolution as it appears to be a software issue and not a hardware issue. It will say it is heating, but heat will not turn on until I physically reset the unit or switch it from heat mode, to cool/off, and then back to heat.  It will also heat my house 1-2 and something 3 degree warmer than I have it set to before turning the heat off.  I am now done dealing with it and am trying to get my money back to buy something else.
title: Software bugs galore.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: N. Riaz
content: Beautiful, I had someone install it. The clip broke on it pretty easily so we had issues recharging it. It’s impossible to get tech support on it. I would not buy again. Make sure you get the common wire installed even if they say you don’t need it. Eventually it will cause issues. My nest broke down after 2 years.
title: Try something different

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: LS30024
content: you need a c-wire (they at least should tell you that). overpriced, returned them and bough the Sensi wifi , now on sale for $79 each, works great!!
title: Horrible

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Geordie W. Korper
content: The premise is good but the implementation has a number of major problems. The auto-scheduling seems to basically cause random temperature swings of 10 degrees or more causing my wife to curse repeatedly at it. What is way worse though is that its vampire charging was causing my oil furnace to come on while it was set to 58 degrees and it was 87 degrees out. It looks like it used up 20 gallons of fuel that way.
title: The premise is good but the implementation has a number of major problems

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ToddMc
content: Great Thermostat.  Nice features.  Not compatible out of the box with my old, two-wire gas house furnace.  I had to search the internet for solutions, and then purchased a "Honeywell R8845U-1003 Relay Switch" to act as a controller interface between the Nest Thermostat and my furnace.  Works fine now, but the documentation that Nest provided didn't really explain this very well.
title: Great Thermostat - but I needed to add a relay switch to get it to work with my furnace.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: C Carlson
content: I really wanted to love this. There is no option override. So it always overrides you. Understand the idea is to recognize patterns but it can’t get mine down and it’s alway turning my air up and I don’t  want it up. Also, we just installed a whole new system -trane 5 ton for a hefty cost and believe this could be a lemon thermostat. We’ve had the installer back here twice and finally switched the *new* nest out with literally a $25 Honeywell and it ran fine. So I’m out a few hundred bucks in this. Hasn’t even been 8 months.
title: Doest allow you to override. Ever.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Carolyn Collins-woodhouse
content: Love this thermostat, so easy to install. The only issue I had was that my home has on O/B wire which caused the thermostat to turn on the heat. I spoke with the customer service team who advised me to rewire putting the O/B wire into the W1 location. It’s been perfect!!!
title: Love this thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kelle Allen
content: This product was too easy to install. They send every thing you need to install yourself, including a screwdriver and labels for the wires. I appreciate them including the mounting plates to cover up old holes and damage from the old thermostat's installation. It's super simple to setup and connect to Alexa. It has already started learning my habits after 3 days. It's worth the price tag. I also love that it connects with the Philips Hue smart bulbs as I am forgetful and the Nest will turn lights off when it senses you are not home... and it will turn lights on in the evening to make it appear you are home.
title: Super easy and simple to install and set up

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: KSS62
content: I first purchased a Honeywell programmable thermostat with Wi-Fi connectivity for our application. We had great difficulty getting the thermostat to connect to our Wi-Fi, even though there were other devices successfully connected within a few feet of the thermostat. We even installed a wireless access point near the thermostat to boost the Wi-Fi signal. We could get it to connect, but if for any reason it disconnected from Wi-Fi, it would never automatically reconnect. What's the point of having a remote access thermostat if it won't stay connected to Wi-Fi? Honeywell customer service was rude, and useless. I decided to throw the Honeywell thermostat in the trash, and purchased this Nest Wi-Fi programmable thermostat. It connected on the first try to Wi-Fi, and stays connected. We interrupted the Wi-Fi signal to see if it would reconnect automatically, and it does without delay or without issue! It's a far superior product when compared to other choices you may have.
title: Strong Wi-FI connectivity, Easy to install/operate, Reliable!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Douglas Bullett
content: I wanted a wifi thermostat for my second home  so I could monitor temperature and adjust remotely.  The thermostat indicates that it is connected to wifi but the Nest app indicates that it is disconnected, and they will not sync.  The instructions state that the thermostat will continue to search for and reconnect to wifi but this is not working for me.  Because of this the Nest thermostat is not fulfilling my need.
title: Did not fulfill my need

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andrea
content: I stalked Nest for months before purchasing. Once I had it installed, it has worked sooo well. I was especially (and pleasantly) surprised when it notified me I needed to change my filter-which was much sooner than I'm used to so I thought there was something wrong. Nope! My old thermostat was just subpar. I just wish gadgets weren't so expensive given the fact that they outdate so quickly.
title: I'd buy another...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pooh Beau
content: Works beautifully for 6 months, then it stopped working comopletely.  It won't charge, won't connect to wifi.  And kept heater on no matter temperature setting.  Had to remove the unit completely from the wall.  See pics for the eroor messages.  Not happy to have to deal with this.  BUY BEWARE!!!
title: This unit stopped working after 12 months

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gumbo Jag
content: Brilliant device.  After a week or so of setting and resetting the temp to our comfort level, this device began setting itself to that pattern.  It also resets to eco mode when we are not home, which causes it to not turn on unless there are extreme temperatures.  When we were out of town for days, the unit would only run a few minutes a day, if at all.  I will buy another for downstairs, and I recommend this to anyone who wishes eliminate wasted operation for their heating and cooling system.
title: Brilliant device. After a week or so of setting ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nick
content: Only issues I had was my system not having a common wire for power issues. The first day the thermostat would not stay connected to the wifi because lack of power. I found  a few work around, but it's working now without the common wire. It said it would charge briefly when the heat is running so maybe it's only working now because my system is on 2 to 4 hours a day.
title: Overall satisfied.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nikki D
content: Everyone knows the nest is the best on the market, and with good reason. We were hesitant to spend so much on a thermostat, but it's worth every penny. You won't regret it! It's easy to install and set up, it's user friendly, and you can change the temperature remotely using an app on your phone. My husband and I love that we can set it to the perfect temperature while were in the car heading back from a weekend away. It's so nice to be able to save money by having the temperature on eco mode while were away, and still be able to come home to a comfy home! Also...we just purchased a google home and are looking forward to being able to just tell google to change the temperature in the house!
title: Worth every expensive penny!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: M. Myers
content: The Nest smart thermostat is one of the best investments I have made in a long time! I can even change the settings by telling Alexa to "set temperature at 67 degrees", turn the heat up in the morning before I even get out of bed and it also senses when I'm not at home! Great device and well worth the money plus I'm getting a $75 rebate from my utility company! Can't beat that!
title: This device will help you save $$$

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: david Coen
content: Easy, fast installation. The learning aspect of the thermostat is excellent and it looks great. I like the fact that there’s a motion sensor that lights it up when you walk past, bold numbers!
title: Best Thermostat ever!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Richard Behun
content: Very easy to install, took me less than one-hour.  Very easy to program (on the unit is okay, but on a PC or the app is very easy and very useful).  I like the feature where it will go to Eco mode when no one is home. I love the display where I set it to show the current weather (cloudy or rain or snow etc) and outdoor temp with temp predictions for three time periods in the near future.  That is very helpful. The unit looks great .. modern but not out of place even in a contemporary setting.
title: Outstanding thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dynastyeric
content: This is so easy to program and it is Alexa friendly. I also use my dish voice remote to adjust the temperature at night. I like the fact that I can use my phone or Alexa to adjust the temp while away so the house is nice and cozy when we get home. Spend the money and get this thing, it's worth every penny.
title: I kick myself for not getting this sooner

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lisa Bowser
content: I love my nest! So easy to install and use! I recommend watching a few videos before you try to install yours. Then when you take off your old thermostat before you disconnect anything take a picture for reference. You will then hook up your nest exactly the same way! It’s great and a great value.
title: Wonderful purchase!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Thomas
content: The product does not work in Europe although, during the setup, one can specify all European countries as the location for the device. That is not only not helpful, but is also misleading and cost me fees of three different installers.
title: Misleading Installation Instructions

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: W. W. Y.
content: The installation was easy, I did it by following instructions, and then the trouble started. I couldn't turn the damn fan off. After calling Nest, they sent me another one (free shipping both ways) because they thought it was a faulty base. I shipped back the old and bam, done. And then the fan still wouldn't turn off. A two hour call (I called during a busy period so there was a lot of waiting) with exceptional customer service and I needed a professional to install a common wire. Nest reimbursed me the $200 for the install. They want you to use their product, they want their product to do right by you. Amazing customer service from their senior agent. It's a steep price when there are cheaper alternatives, but would they have been this determined to get it working?
title: Best Customer Service, Great Thermostat too.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: PVI
content: A little bit to install, but once it’s done it’s done. It’s worth it to have the ability to check the heat when I’m not home to make sure the house is heated. Very easy to use and see the large numbers. But it wants to always economize by turning down the heat automatically as it senses movement in the room and records “low activity” in the room
title: Easy to use once set up, price should justify heat savings

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jazmine9009
content: Stopped working it’s permanently in delay mode... Haven’t even had it a full year... All my family members have them and they work fine... Should have bought it from Costco or Best buy
title: Piece of crap

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JBW
content: if you answer the questions.  BUT  When it arrives & you go thru another set of questions, more in depth, it tells me not compatible!  If it can't work with my simple heat pump, it ain't very smart after all. I really wanted it to integrate with my NEST Smoke/CO smart detectors!
title: NEST website says yes,

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S. W. Cantrell
content: I really like the Nest thermostat.  It was easy to install, easy to use and works great.  What makes me mad is that I bought it based on Nest's website ad that I could save $125 from Edison and So Cal Gas Company.  After buying and installing, I go to sign up for the rebate and am told that I don't qualify because I have no A/C.  No where in their marketing did it say that I had to have a connected A/C.  I can't even get the Gas company rebate even though I have a gas heater and there are no A/C units that run on natural gas.  Nest should have clearly stated that there were minimum configurations etc. required to qualify.
title: More than a little ticked off...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joshua Steven Neff
content: So now twice in a week this disconnected itself from wifi and the software app on my phone refuses to admit the thermostat is connected to wifi, even though the thermostat says it is. For $250 it didn't even last a year and the support is god awful horrible run around in circles for 45 minutes to an hour to solve the first time. And currently I can't make the app believe the thermostat is connected to the wifi.
title: Seems to be dying less than 8 months in.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: riggingdiva
content: Bought and installed two this past Saturday. One in the main living area, one in the master bedroom. I watched a YouTube video before I opened the boxes and they were very helpful to get the process straight before beginning. (I did not take the time to repair and repaint the surface behind the old thermostat - that will happen next weekend.) The units installed quickly and easily - very well thought out and designed process. Easy set up of app on my phone and I am looking forward to having my house heated and air conditioned to my exact schedule now that I can control remotely. The units are very sleek to look at and my only real suggestion is that - if you are installing in your bedroom  - make sure you turn off the Farsight motion detector feature - other wise the unit will turn on when you pass by for nighttime bathroom runs. It does turn off again after less than a minute, but it is easily changed to display on click only in the setting.
title: Two Nests  - One Big Improvement for Energy Saving

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Alan Snell
content: Instructions with product and the various You-Tube videos (both from NEST and 3rd parties) were quite helpful to view before installing. Worked well instantly and no problems since installing. I love the ability to monitor when away from home. The "learning" portion during the first two weeks seemed confusing to us when NEST would lower our home temps around 9pm and raise during late morning hours.
title: Easy to install, works perfectly

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: John Smith, Esq.
content: Even though my heating/cooling system is compatible with Nest, and even though according to Nest's instructions I would not require a professional installation, I ended up having problems installing this myself. I called Nest and they told me that I needed to have a wire relay installed. I had to call a repairman who charged me $245 for the installation. I had to call a few HVAC companies before I found someone who could do the work. So the point is that you shouldn't expect an easy installation in all cases. There is a good chance that you will have to spend serious money getting this thing installed. Update: So after the expensive installation, I am now having a very difficult time getting this thing to connect to wi- fi and simply to work. This thing is an expensive and time consuming nightmare. After $245 in installation cost plus all this problems, I am sending this back (if I can. I didn’t spend my Sunday reading the fine print.)
title: Required Professional Installation costing me $245 on top of the cost of the Nest.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: rjb
content: Worked perfectly for 9 months with my AC and forced hot air heating system then Inexplicably ceased automatically running the system fan when heating.  System fan could to be manually run from the thermostat unit or app.  Checked the wiring and completely reset unit to no avail.  I have used and installed many thermostats in my life-none more expensive- yet none of my previous units failed.
title: Malfunctioned after 9 months

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ESM
content: It dies if it has to turn on too often. The self-charging battery is a joke. It doesn't actually "learn" anything - if it is hot it ups your temperature slowly, while if it is cold it drops the temperature slowly. Pretty much every selling point of this thing is a lie - don't believe the paid and curated reviews below. Choose something else
title: Nest? Not really.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: WWIII
content: I wanted one of these for some time. I use a price checking app, and when the price dropped to my target I purchased. Originally I planned to install myself, but ultimately chose to have this installed by one of Google's certified installers. I am glad I had a professional installation. I have a dual fuel heat pump and I was not comfortable with the instructions for my system. One item to not for any isulation is to ensure you trim the wires and strip appropriately to ensure there is appropriate good contact with the nest device. The installer had to remove wires and reinstall to eliminate errors during setup. Product works great, and as expected.
title: Great product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ACP1125
content: Pros: Easily adjustable, interface is common sense and user friendly. The app connects seamlessly with Alexa and your phone, which allows you to adjust the thermostat even when you're not in it's proximity. Much better looking on the wall than standard thermostats. Cons: Lights up when you walk in front of it, which can be nice, however it would be nice if it would auto dim at night because it really is bright, especially if you have an AC thermostat in your bedroom. Would be nice if it provided the capability of locking it from being changed, as its so user friendly that a guest or child can easily change the temperature pretty drastically and potentially cause issues for your AC unit.
title: Great device with some minor flaws, I bought a second one and love it!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Denise H. Williams
content: Installation was  a snap. Once powered up, the Nest thermostat walks you through the setup process. Spin the outer ring of the thermostat to scroll through setup selections and then press the lower portion of the thermostat to confirm your selection. Don't worry too much if you make an incorrect selection, it's easy to go back and reselect. I also like the fact that I can control the thermostat remotely via phone. Took me longer to find the corresponding circuit breakers for each of the 2 thermostats!
title: Installation and setup was  a snap

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gh
content: It took me a while to get one. I didn't want to pay $250, so I waited for it to be on sale and use energy rebates. The nest was super easy to install. The hole where my old wiring came from was a little out of the way form the center mount of the nest, but it was ok. It would be awesome if maybe the nest had a little more spacing from the wall. Since I didn't want to clip wire and just used what I already had, the wire length was a little too long, and so they had to be pressed back. One it got started, the nest was easy to set up. The app is pretty simple, but serves the purpose. It's great that I could see whats going on the on the house, or even have the ability to change things if I'm out and want things to get cooler or warmer when I get home.
title: Amazing

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: robert mecalis
content: Like it a lot, I live in a two-story home with two separate heating and air-conditioning units one for upstairs one for downstairs and this makes it so much easier to adjust the temperature. It’s really been a good product I highly recommend it. Easy to install and great  technical support .
title: Wonderful product.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Chicagorex
content: I finally had the opportunity to install a Nest in a house that we just moved into.  This is a beautiful product and the installation could not have gone better.  I ordered the trim kit with this product.  My old thermostat was mounted in an electrical box.  I used the mounting bracket in combination with the trim kit.  It's rare that a home project proceeds perfectly, but this one was perfect and fun to install.  I now understand why everyone raves about this product.  Nest is a beautiful product.  I highly recommend.
title: Absolutely flawless product and installation procedure!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Bruce Bubacz
content: The enclosed instructions are very well done. Just take your time and follow each step. Keep track of the wiring on the thermostat you are replacing, the installation instructions include labels but it might be a bit tricky to identify the wiring on the old thermostat. A photo pf the old system is a good idea, as is suggested in the instructions. The Nest works very well and is intuitive to set up. Product is excellent, other things (like loading the phone app and tying to Alexa) not so much. Highly recommend this thermostat.
title: Installation is straight forward

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mike169
content: My other thermostat finally gave up.  A good friend of mine recommended the NEST Thermostat so I bought one.  I couldn't be happier!  It offers so much as far as setting go and if I forget to change a setting I can do it from wherever I am using my phone.  It also looks great!  Like the high tech piece of equipment it is!
title: Awesome Thermostat!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JT Rex
content: Very easy installation. I love features like detecting high humidity in the house and switching on the air to lower the humidity. Very impressed with the ease of installation, packaging, usability, etc. Make sure you have all the wires to the Nest thermostat fully flattened or the Nest won't properly "click" when you are selecting an option or setting. I needed to make a small adjustment to get mine to seat properly after first installation. I also had one wire come loose during the "flattening" process, but the setup process showed me exactly which wire was not connected - very cool. Reconnected it and it has worked beautifully so far. Added four total Nest protects to go with it, and also looking to add a Rheem water heater that works with Nest.
title: So easy to set up and use - with powerful new features over my previous programmable thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Buys Too Much
content: I LOVE this thermostat! First it is just cool looking and easy enough for my 8 year old to adjust the heat. Second it is a real benefit to be able to change the heat from our phone. When we are in the basement it can be really cold so it is nice to up the heat for a few minutes to heat it up and then turn it off without having to physically go to the thermostat. It was easy to hook up too, which I was able to do with a little help from youtube. GOOD TO KNOW: If your system has no C wire there may be an easy workaround! I was able to utilize one of the other wires not used by switching the location in the furnace, which I learned from this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R039DH7HASg
title: I LOVE this thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: zorito
content: It's so nice-looking and the interface is well-thought out.  Still not sure how well it's "learning" but it seems pretty good. Sometimes it seems to be running a degree or 2 warmer than I would have set it, so I just click it down and all is fine. Very easy to use, with smooth tactical feel.
title: Best thermostat so far

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: valveman
content: After 4 mths. The thermostat died. I did an extensive trouble shoot with Nest support and was unable to revive the unit. A Nest certified HVAC service man who installed unit orginally acknowledged unit was dead, unable to determine the reason. After seeking to return the unit on 3 occasions over the last week I have continued to get the run around refusing to take the return and provide full refund as unit had to be replaced at time of service by another brand. Clearly, Nest does not stand behind their product and customer support is poor. I do not recommend this product or company.
title: Thermostat died, Nest customer service poor

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: The Grim Meeper
content: What more can be said about a Nest thermostat that hasn't been already said.  Simply put it is amazing!  Simple to set up and use and saves you money.  There are others out there that may be just as good, but they don't have the long standing reputation that Nest.
title: Easy to use and saves money!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andre W.
content: I was torn between the Honeywell RTH9580WF and this model. I liked the full display of the Honeywell and its features were good, but when I searched for a comparison between the two the Nest edged the Honeywell out. I am surprised on how simple it is, and the easy of setup and use is spot on. It's a little bigger than I envisioned and that's a good thing. A+ Nest.
title: Very good thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: rosie
content: I just bought my 1st house and wanted to get a Nest because all my friends love theirs. I'm a single female who is kinda handy but have never worked with electricity so I was kind of apprehensive. No reason to be! The instruction booklet is very clear with pictures and gives you suggestions like taking a picture of your existing wire setup before you begin. Setup is just as easy as the Nest walks you through all the settings. I have mine in the dining room which is centrally located in my house. I did balk at the price tag at first but once you experience all the Nest has to offer its well worth the price. And being able to control the temperature from your phone is a great perk too.
title: 1st time home owner

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pandit Jag
content: The first one failed in finding my network after 2 weeks, but tech support was superb and the eventual exchange was stress free. Second one fine.
title: Works great - easy to set up.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rock1
content: So much flexibility in managing heat AND cool in your home.  Product support excellent.  But most important to me at this time is remote access and customization.  This is in my mother's home and she is not able to effectively program her thermostat.  But she is good at fiddling with things and messing it up.  So, I can easily get onto her system and restore / fix what she has done.  And the schedule is also a way to restore things that have been inadvertently altered.  It's made life so much simpler and her home is now more evenly heated / cooled.
title: Remote access is easy and convenient.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joseph
content: What can i say.. its a Nest thermostat... the orginal smart thermostat. This is our 2nd unit since our 1st one we got in 2012 decided to break down. Easy to install...all color coded and easy to read instructions. Control via an app which beat walking up and down to the unit.
title: Its a Nest... ofcourse its good.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Trent S. Aiken
content: The installation was really easy.  The instructions are clear.  If you a handy you can do it yourself.  Setup is also easy to execute with very clear instructions.  The unit is smoothly added to Alexa as well. The copper accent is very nice.  The programable functionality and eco functions for reducing energy use when not home makes this an easy choice.
title: An exceptional choice for a thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: sugarpunch
content: I don't know how I ever lived with a "normal" thermostat. I LOVE this thing. After just a few days, it had learned my habits and schedule and adjusted itself accordingly. In bed and hot in the middle of the night - No problem! Can just turn it down from my phone. Too cold to get out of bed in the morning? Get it nice and toasty before you crawl out. :) It is amazing, and the Eco and Home/Away functions will save SO much energy. I also connected this to my Google Home. Now all I have to do is say, "Hey Google, turn down the heat!" and I'm cool as a cucumber. Very happy with my purchase!
title: LOVE LOVE LOVE

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Eunice
content: the nest came defective.  no batteries, no charger and had to be charged before installing, and it didn't work as it should anyway.  Previously in another house I had had one, but generation 2, and everything was very easy and functional.  New house, new generation 3 thermostat and completely disappointed.
title: Not working

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: A Chammas
content: I've been using there thermostat for less than 3 months and have now been told I need to replace it as it refuses to connect to my wifi network and gives me a W5 error. Amazon don't provide me with an option to return it!!! What a waste of money!!!
title: Product Failure

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeff C
content: The Nest Learning Thermostat has been a great addition for our house.  We first installed it in a weekend property and the install was dead simple.  We were able to have it wired and programmed in about 40 minutes. We are handy people but definitely not professionals. For a property that you only visit on weekends or even if you rent to a tenant, I think the Nest Thermostat is a must have.  In the winter, it is nice to be able to turn the heater on in advance of your arrival so you don't have to wait a few hours for the house to thaw out.  In the summer the opposite is true, to be able to cool the house down before your arrival or even if a heat wave is in the forecast, you can adjust the thermostat accordingly.  For a house that you rent, you can monitor the usage of your tenants if they are short term renters so there are no surprises on your electric bill. The only issue that we have had with it is when Nest rolls out updates for the thermostat.  It will make the Nest Thermostat go offline and if you are not at the property, it can be frustrating trying to figure out whether the Wi-Fi went out or if the Thermostat is updating. Frankly, sometimes it's just nice to sit on your couch and adjust the temperature without having the leave the couch.
title: Nest Thermostat is a great addition to any house

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jane Wiseman
content: After having to spend far more on a complicated smart thermostat for a house I’m selling, I sure do appreciate this one for the place I just bought. It’s easy to use and does the job. My son installed it for me—that wouldn’t have been at all easy. But I didn’t have to deal with that.
title: Love this thing!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: RaiderFan
content: Easy to set up, and easy to use!  One major thought to keep in mind is that, while the Nest does indeed offer an automated learning feature, you do not need to use it if you do not want to.  Rather, if you are an old-fashioned "control freak" like me and you want to explicitly set your schedule by yourself, you are totally free to do that.  You just go into the menu and turn off "Auto-Schedule", and you go into their scheduling facility and you can explicitly define the temperature for as many setpoint times as you like for the whole week.  You can do this using the device user interface, or you can do it on the web interface or the app interface.  I find the web interface to be really easy to use to set a lot of setpoints at once, and to copy whole daily schedules from one day to another.
title: For Us "Control Freaks" It Also Works Great Without The Automated Learning

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joe  R
content: Sweet this thermostat is so cool we’ve had it for about two months now and we all love itSuper easy to use easy to see and we even bought an optional decorative plate and it looks fantastic
title: Fantastic thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: polymesh
content: Very easy to set up and use. Interface is about as friendly as you can get with only 3 controls (turn left, turn right, press) although I think touchscreen might be even better. Perhaps that would be more power consuming defeating the purpose here though. Issues that you don't get with a normal thermostat: 1. I have had it crash on me once, requiring a reboot. 2. It thinks your gone when you aren't. Now, I thought complaints about this were because users did not install the app on their phone (phones which can install the app have GPS and can know when you're home or at least in the area!) but it turns out it still thinks I'm gone if I stay in my office too long, even though the app could easily communicate that I am here to the NEST. Of course I can pull out my phone and tell it I'm here, but that takes effort.
title: Really great, except for a couple things you won't experience with a normal thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Wrxstiftw
content: No deduction in stars for the added generic ugly back plate but everything else is beautiful. Easy install and connection to my network. Also connected it to the family's smart phones. After a month of use our monthly bills have been lowered thanks to its smart/eco modes. I wish I would have purchased this thermostat years ago when I was aware of it. Better late than never.
title: Perfect

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ryan D. Brooks
content: Looks great, love controlling the thermostat from my phone. I travel a lot, so it is nice to be able to keep control of heating costs, especially when there are house guests over that think 80 degrees is a normal temperature in November. I've never tried to install a thermostat before...this was so easy!!! Seriously, a 5 year old could have done this. No need to hire someone, if you have 10 minutes to spare you can do it on your own. Simple, easy, and hopefully as effective as I think it will be. (only gave a 4 because it's only been installed for 2 days...waiting to see it start to track my preferences)
title: Looks great, love controlling the thermostat from my phone

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andrew Cormier
content: I was able to install this myself and fortunately it works. It syncs up with my phone and I was able to schedule the heating based on my needs. I am concerned about the way the company might use my information or the ability of hackers to steal information. However as far as the thermostat goes so far I've been happy with it. It was a lot easier to set up than I thought.
title: Great device, kinda expensive but should payoff longterm.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tommysmallss
content: I have a Samsung S7, Android 8.0, which does not always switch to Away when I leave home.  After many months of experimentation, I learned that you have to switch off 'battery optimization' in the app settings.  Android 8.0 puts apps or components of apps to sleep.  Nest support was absolutely useless in helping me fix this problem.  Useless.  I cannot stress enough that Nest customer service is GARBAGE.  Their support website tells you to make settings changes that are not up to date with the latest Android version.  You would think that Nest and Google would work together perfectly.  Nope. I cannot recommend Nest products because their support was of no help in fixing my issues.  However, I will say that the thermostat and Nest Hello doorbell cam do what they are supposed to do if the Home/Away mode works.  The problem is that Nest thinks it's ok to crowd-source their field testing.  A large company should be able to test their products over a wide range of devices.  The customer should not have to do it for them.
title: Works, but Home/Away assist function does not work reliably.  Nest Support is useless.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: mituva
content: I bought 2 of these to control the 2 AC units in my house.  The one downstairs, furthest away from my router, works fine.  The one upstairs, 10 feet from the modem, continually goes offline.  I have completed all the recommended trouble shooting steps and it has not made a difference.  I'm upset that I spent a lot of money for a product that doesn't work.
title: It won't won't stay on line

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tony C
content: Liked the first one so much I ordered a second to replace my other thermostat upstairs.  With respect to the need for a "C" or Common wire, I do not have a Common wire for either of my two and they both work great.  I have a basic 4 wire system (Green, White, Yellow, Red) and everything is working just fine.  The app that you can download for your phone is great and has just been updated to allow knowing when you are home or away via the location of your phone.  This is a great item that I am sure you will love as well.  Think of it like an iPhone hanging on the wall.
title: Great, I have 2 now

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Paul A.
content: The battery does not hold a charge long enough so recharging is annoying. As such it fails to connect to the net for remote control (fail). Support kept me on phone for an hour asking me to change wiring (hard NO) after paying my electrician $200 to install it. If you use this as a manual thermostat fine. Otherwise get something else.
title: Major FAIL

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Siddhartha Pal
content: Great product, but terrible, terrible customer service. They don't have a concept of how to treat the customer well. I purchased this product, and installed it myself. It failed to work with my HVAC system, although it was not in Nest's incompatibility list. After contacting and following up multiple times, I was given the contacts of Nest Pro professional. I contacted some of them. One was pretty responsive, and he suggested that he would be able to make it work for me. He also suggested that the installation expense is usually reimbursed by Nest in such cases. When contacted (and followed up multiple times) Nest support to confirm it, they asked me to contact their senior engineer. I spoke to him, and he said Nest won't reimburse the installation charges. When asked, he admitted that in some cases, they reimburse, but not in my case. I was not given any explanation why. Overall, it seemed like they were too self-absorbed and do-not-care-about-my-customer type. Very unhappy with the way I was treated, I decided to return. They remained very indifferent to my decision, not even trying a bit to retain their customer. Very blunt people!
title: Great product, but terrible, terrible customer service.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Trahloc
content: I have owned every generation of the nest in there different homes. This is my final nest. Not because it is worse than the previous models but because it is exactly the same. There has be no advancement with the unit. The nest ecosystem is simply worthless. I have given up on Google doing anything innovative with their hardware.
title: Buy any other smart thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kurt Schumacher
content: Update:  contacted Nest and they replaced it free of charge.  Great customer service! This thermostat worked great for about 18 months and then it stopped being able to find any wifi networks.  It appears that the wifi chip burned out on it and now it is pretty much worthless.
title: Great until it stopped working

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Matt S.
content: It was easy to install, just follow the video and it takes you step by step.  Connected to our Google Home and works great.  We will see if it will save us any money.  I do like getting monthly usage reports and the ability to change from our phone or by voice through the Google Home.  It is well built and has some neat features.
title: Works great!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: fernando villaverde
content: I had an older nest thermostat which had a hold feature which is what i wanted as  I'am either in the house all the time or i'am away on business, they did away with the hold feature and now and they have auto schedule if I lower the temperature I come back 1/2 hour later and it has gone back to whatever temperature is in the auto schedule there is no way to manually set a temperature and it stays there.
title: no hold feature

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James D
content: Unit began short cycling and could have damaged my compressor.  Spent hours with Neat tech support, which was wasted time.  Inept case handling and bumbling customer service reps only to have to wait months for a refund through the company after they already have the returned unit.  Do not buy this garbage.
title: Expensive, flashy, garbage.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sarfz
content: I wanted a thermostats I could control from my phone and this did just that. I didn't care for the self learning part as I like to control the temperature in the house but after using this for a month, I love the self learn! This thermostats is smart learning your tendencies and adjusting w/o intervention. For example, I like it cooler during night sleep but warm when I get out of bed in the morning. Thermostat adjusts automatically to crank up the heat before I'm out of bed. Auto away is also great making me not have to lower the temp in the winter when I step out. Thermostats senses it and goes into away mode. Also the $100 rebate from comed makes this a new brainer purchase.
title: Best investment

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ntuck
content: Bought the Nest with high hopes, but after 6 hours on the phone with Nest technicians (who are fabulous by the way), diagnostic testing by our electrician and handyman and suffering through freezing cold nights because it didn't work, I have to throw it away (outside the return period).  Nest to their credit, spent hours on the phone with me and offered to have a technician come out at their expense, but I simply cannot invest any more time in this thing.  If you have a heat pump, think twice about whether this is the product for you - it did not work with ours.  Electrician blaming Nest, Nest blaming electrician.  Who's to know but all was working just fine with our "old fashioned" thermostat.  I'm sorry I ever went down this path.  If you do decide to brave it, suggest you buy directly from Nest so that you can get a refund.
title: Who's to know but all was working just fine with our "old fashioned" thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Richard Rodriguez
content: On top of looking super stylish and having a bunch of smart features, like linking with your smart home and being able to give it commands, this thing has worked so well and I am so pleased with this thermostat. I have no complaints, and am totally on board with this line of smart product.
title: Looks great and functions even better!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: BadWolf
content: Awesome product so far love the fetures it has running my MR COOL universal series heat pump very well. Have no complaint other then I think I spent way to much. But definitely better then anything cheaper. Would have gone with the cheaper nest thermostat but I wanted black instead of white.
title: Good so far

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: KT
content: After installing about a month or so later it lost connection to the internet and we could not get it re-connected.  We went through all of the next help pages and steps.  We've tried on several occasions to either call Nest or Chat, but only to wait for at least an hour on hold with no one answering to help.  Waste of Money. We could have kept our old thermostat. And, the worst customer service and waiting I have ever experienced.
title: Internet Connect dropped and doest work and Horrible customer service

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: REAL REVIEW
content: I bought one of these for my daughter who just moved  into her new home. She was so excited about it.  She called me to tell my thanks and went on for 15 minutes about how easy these are to install that she did it herself.  Plus she was way excited about the fact that she can control it with her phone either from work or the comfort of her bed.  She also raved about the fact that it learns your habits and reprograms itself accordingly.
title: This really will pay for itself in no time at all.  Plus your gas or power company may offer a rebate.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tyler
content: After 10 months of use and no problems, my thermostat suddenly said low battery and then shut off. The only way to get it back running was to remove it from the wall and charge it with a usb style cord for an hour, which would keep the battery charged for about 2 days.  I have chatted with Nest 4 times in the last week to work through the issues and 4 days ago they said they would ship me a replacement and that I would receive it within 2-3 days.  I contact Nest daily and no replacement has shipped yet. This is unacceptable and could cause major problems if a house if left without an operating thermostat for an extended period of time.
title: Low battery, disconnect wifi, no power

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Noodle of Death
content: This has got to be the fanciest IoT thing I have in my entire condo. Installing this device myself was easier than baking a cake and its simple sleek design is exceedingly impressive. The instructions could have provided an index of common heating/cooling systems and their corresponding wiring configurations, but after a bit of trial an error I was saving money comfortably in no time. Totally worth the list price, and possibly more. Of the many things I impulsively buy from Amazon, this has to be one of the biggest bangs for my buck.
title: Easy Installation, Sexy Look, and Efficient Practical Functionality

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pratik
content: Very nice product , it's save money from higher bill of gas & electric , also nice app we can use by phone , also tharmosat have lock facility Wich safe From another person who changed more high or low also before go to home we can set temperature so when we reach to home perfect temperature for home also when we not available at home it's go automatically Eco mode which save our money 👌👍👌
title: Best Tharmosat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Warren Gale
content: Awesome ! Works way better that the old thermostat.  Easy to install. Setup was explained very well and easy to follow. This keeps the temperature in the house more even that any of the others we've had before. I very happy to be able to tell Alexa to adjust the temperature without having to get out of my easy chair. I'm amazed how it learned our needs for different temperatures during the day and at night. I just got a report on how many hours I have been heating the house in November. I can READ the display !!! I kept putting off buying it cause of the price, but I'm glad that I finally did get it.  Don't put it off.
title: Get One!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: raboynton
content: Just to be clear, it’s an awesome product. I now have two. The installation was a little tricky on this one because the thermostat line from the gas stove to the Nest does not supply power. When I called their support for assistance, I was directed to a vendor who wanted to sell me assistance by the hour. Thank God for the internet, as I received the help that I needed there for free. And I bought the supplies I needed from Amazon.
title: Poor Customer Support

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mary D.
content: I've had the Nest about a month and am happy. I ordered the Nest from Amazon but had trouble keeping it charged. I had to charge it daily to keep it running. Customer support worked with me and then replaced the face (with the brains and battery). It's been working well ever since. I suggest if you have problems to call them. Chat didn't work as well for me. In the end they replaced the faulty product.
title: If Not Working Properly, Contact Support

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Luis V.
content: This is a very nice thermostat. The features are incredible no negative to comment about. I ordered the cooper color and with the white plate in the background it makes the color pops nicely. The light is very bright and the readings are very clear. The app works superb. I am glad they I invested my money on this device. Installation was a breeze...
title: Very nice Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tammy
content: I gave this to my husband on Father’s Day and he LOVES IT!!!  He installed it in about 15 minutes with no issues and quickly learned how to operate it from his iPhone.  Also, when we’re away from the house for the day or for several days, he opens the app on his phone and turns on the air before we arrive home so that the house is cooled when we arrive-a fabulous treat and I’m sure a money saver on the utility bill as well!
title: PERFECTLY AMAZING IN EVERY WAY!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: customer aa
content: That is a beautiful design, very easy to install. the app is a little cumbersome but everything works, except the learning part. its artificial intelligence sucks to the point that i am ready to give the dumbest intelligence reward to it. just set it to a temp and go, and you can set it to "away" via the app when you are away from home. I wish it were cleverer though.
title: sleek design works fine if you tell it what to do, too stupid to learn anything

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: InspiredbyDemi
content: This is a great product. When we looked for the "compatibility" test on company's website, it looked like we cannot have it due to our wiring. But I reached out to our HVAC company and they re-wired the system and installed the Nest for about ($130). We love the ability to change temperature without coming out of the bed. We also were able to get a $50 refund from PG&E. Finally, it works well with the Simplisafe alarm. When we set the alarm to away, the temperature adjusts automatically. In sum, it is worth the investment.
title: Pretty happy!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andrew smith
content: The product misleads you. If you have a heat only system and only two wires, this will malfunction and you will need to install a C wire.
title: You will need a C wire

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: A Elayne Severson
content: Once I figured out how to manually set I love the thermostat.  Wish companies would include specific instructions in the package -- I am not too computer saavy so took me a while to figure out how to set. Am sure this thermostat has more features, just haven't figured them out.
title: Nest Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Susan L
content: I read a lot of the reviews and some folks are upset about not knowing the temperature in the room. I'm grateful to not have to worry about the temp in the room. I told Nest what to do when the room hits certain temps and it takes care of it for me. We have Haiku ceiling fans in our house and Nest works seamlessly. The Nest will increase the speed of my ceiling fan before running the air conditioner. The installation was easy, I installed 3 in under an hour. I love the green leaf display that identifies the energy efficient temps. It's the same as money in my pocket. I will be buying the firealarms next.
title: Installed 3 in under and hour

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Michael Henline
content: We've tried to like this thermostat, but it just stinks.  Furnace kicks in when on cool mode only...and not just once or twice in the last couple of years, but frequently.  Biggest gripe is that there is no "hold" mode.  You can't set it and forget it and go on vacation.
title: Not ideal

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: mark bowker
content: I really like this thermostat because i travel often and can check on things while on the road. I have a dual fuel york system that is about 8 years old. I have not figured out how to bypass the controls by nest and manually turn on the propane furnace if i want a lot of heat quickly. I'm very surprised this was not a menu option or at least built into the program by nest if there is a big gap between the current temp and where the thermastat has been set too.  So, if the house is at 60 degrees and you come home and turn it to 72 degrees, it will take many hours for the heat pump to reach 72.  The propane furnace would get you there much quicker.  So, that my only issue at the moment.
title: I really like this thermostat because i travel often and can check ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: cg
content: We had 2 nest, one is at our Home and is okay, but prefer Honeywell TH8321.  Our 2nd home we had the 2nd nest, it caused our heat pump to go out (Huge expense), The repairman recommended Honeywell 8321 (the app is great), which works much better for our system.  Nest customer service was slow but did assist us and returned the thermostat. Update:  nest shuts off sometimes when we’re gone for hours (which is what it should do) but other times when we’re gone a week it thinks we’re are home.  Will never buy another nest thermostat again, I will stick with Honeywell
title: Won’t purchase again will get a Honeywell 8321 (or newer model)

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Troy Stevens
content: I believe that by the Fall of 2019 this will have paid for itself. Not only has it saved me money, I don't have to get out of bed or pause a show to change the temp. All I have to do is open the app. I can also access the app and change the temp before I get home to have the apartment cool down or warm up. The best feature is that you can set it to switch between heat and A/C automatically, which is great during the Spring and Fall when the temps can plunge at night and surge during the day.
title: Best purchase i have made.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Robert Perry
content: Wow, wow, wow. I upgraded to a third generation Nest from the original 1988 thermostat installed when my condo was built. The old thermostat was so frustrating to use whereas the Nest makes using a thermostat a matter of opening the Next app on my iPhone. I make changes, submit them, and the furnace/AC responds accordingly. The Nest app has an option that allows me to make both heating and cooling active which is great for living in the SF/Bay Area. I have the heater set at 70 and the AC at 75. This is thermostat heaven!
title: Thermostat Heaven

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Russ T.
content: This thermostat is easy to install using existing wires and easy to use. Looks very sleek.  I only wished it came with a large round plate rather than the rectangular one. The plate helps keep fingerprints off the painted walls and covers marking of the replaced thermostat.
title: Nice, simple and high tech.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lady Camero
content: I have 2 days with the Thermostat. At the beginning had issues to pair it with the Nest app on my cell phone due to the power being to low and was disconnecting from the WiFi. I had to pull out the thermostat from the base and charge it with a mini usb. After 15 min charging Input it back on the base and I could connect it to my app. After that everything is working fine. I brought somebody from the golden rule to check on my AC before installing it and making sure my AC was compatible.
title: It nice but you need to charge it with usb before installing it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: llu
content: The Nest is amazing, from the packaging, to the ease of use, to the cost savings. Unpacking a nest feels great, you can tell that a lot of love was put into the packaging and that they used high end material. The instructions are very easy to follow and it is really easy from the product description to know if you have a compatible setup for the Nest. I installed it myself and it required nothing more than plugging 4 cables in. The first week that the nest is installed it will self learn your schedule and auto adjust the temperature of the house so you are using your AC/Heating effectively. Now we are saving energy daily.
title: I think it does magic!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Trentz
content: Ok, I've been running this thing for 2 weeks. My boiler is old and so is my air conditioning. I didn't have a C wire. I am not an electrician. I have never installed a thermostat. I killed the main switch and had it installed in a few minutes. One screw seemed loose and I worry one day it will need to be reinforced. Other than that, it was really easy less than 5 minutes and I was up and running. Everything set up smoothly and it learned my routines in a few days. I observed it once go offline and worried it was because I didn't dedicated power to it through a C wire. I decided to change from 5ghz internet to 2.4Ghz and I haven't noticed it go offline again. I will update if ever the C wire gives me a problem. Otherwise, I notice my heater is on less than with the old fashioned thermostat I used to have. I really feel like I am saving money. I like the remote access through the computers and the apps. I have it working with Alexa which basically only lets you raise and lower the temperature but that's exactly why I bought it. I wanted to be able to not have to go downstairs when I feel like I am burning up upstairs. I love my Nest but I might have gone for an ecobee had I known it was owned by Google.
title: Works without the C wire

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DeniseFox
content: A superb product - but you knew that already.  The app can run a little slow when it opens but in fairness, that may be a wifi connectivity issue.  It's a bit expensive but worth it in my opinion.  I own 4 of them (at different locations) and it is great to remotely turn of the systems when guests leave it on.  It will pay for itself in 2 months in energy savings if my guests leave the systems on and obviously prevents wasted energy. I love my Nests.
title: Perfect for remote management of systems

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Island gal
content: Had it less than a week and the weather has been warm so haven't used it yet.  That said I am looking forward to using it.  The person installing it was contracted by Amazon and he was terrific.  He was very patient while I tried to figure out what my password was for my WiFi, helped set up the app on my phone, and saved me money by using the fan third wire at the old thermostat for the installation.  Otherwise a wire would have had to have been brought up from the basement furnace.  Even though this third generation Nest can be installed with only two wires eventually it will burn out the controls.  The fan will still function when the heat is turned on and given the area I live in having a fan move air around when not heating isn't needed and I'd never used that feature.
title: The person installing it was contracted by Amazon and he was terrific. He was very patient while I tried to ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lin Lin
content: It will take some time to install the thermostat because you need to remove the original AC/Heater control. Following instructions on the manual is very important. Before installing, take some time to use the online resource provided by Nest to learn about the cables that you need to connect. The package also provides labels that you can stick to the cable so you know which cable to connect. The most important thing is be sure the electricity going to the AC/Heater control has been shut off. The voltage might not be strong enough to get yourself hurt, but just be safe.
title: Read the manual/instructions

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gary H.
content: With my house being older (new furnace) I was a little worried about wiring. I contacted Nest support via live chat and they were great. Uploaded a photo of my current wiring and within 1 minute they sent a "customized wiring diagram" to my inbox. Since installation I have yet to even touch this thermostat. If I'm away for the day it'll go into eco mode and before I head home I can open the app and have my place warm for my arrival. If you want to use this device to its full extent let it do its job. Teaming it up with the Nest protect CO/smoke detectors makes a great combo. Once set up it works perfectly with Alexa.
title: Impressive

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: waterbabyv
content: So easy to install, even easier to set up and use. I love it! Whether you want to use the 'smart' functions or not, Nest is a great option. I turned off the learning functions because I really just want more of a traditional thermostat that happens to be able to be controlled using other devices. I work from home so all of the programming options don't provide me much value. I installed the unit myself in 25 minutes. It would have taken me less time, but I decided to dig around in my junk drawer for longer screws instead of using the ones that were included.
title: Very easy to install and a great option!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Brad F.
content: Having read good things about the Nest thermostats, I purchased 26 of them (a combination of the T3000ES and the new Nest E) to replace all the thermostats in a large house.  I'm sorry to report that they've been nothing but trouble from start to finish.  They are easy enough to mount and wire, but everything is downhill from there. First of all, Nest puts an arbitrary limit on the number of Nest devices in an account.  This unpublished, hidden limit is 20, so if you have a number of cameras, smoke detectors, etc. you will hit the limit fast.  The first 'fix' Nest provided for this (to tell the app you are a business instead of a residence) failed.  Their only fix was to set up the system as if it were 2 homes, and then constantly switch between them until the end of time.  As I was stuck having already installed them, I had no choice but to accept this hack. Once the therms were all installed, registered, and named with the app, the names started mysteriously disappearing.  eventually all the thermostats  I had conveniently named based upon their locations would lose their names and just display "thermostat" so I had no idea which zones I was activating.  Resetting every thermostat to factory settings and repeating the entire installation process multiple times eventually solved this mystery (not thanks to Nest tech support), but then even stranger things started happening: Once everything SEEMED to be working, I found that if I changed a thermostat setting from the App, the App would indicate that the change had been made, but in fact nothing had changed on the actual thermostat.  This is with perfect wifi (verified 20MB/s with less than 100ms latency, tested right at the thermostat).  Of course, the app reported that it was in contact with the thermostat (within the last minute) and could even read the thermostat's settings -it just never sent the temperature-change command to the thermostat.  Even worse, there is no way the user could know that the change that was submitted via the app was ignored!  Nest's proposed solution: Use the web interface instead of the app! Every day I seem to experience more unusual behavior that can't be explained by nest.  Today, several of my thermostats would not display the current room temperature at all, whereas other identical models, bought the same day and set up the identical way, would.  In other cases, temperature would be displayed, but be totally inaccurate. I also find that Nest's purported 'time to reach target temp' feature is a total fail.  In reality, it has no idea whatsoever how long it has to activate the heater to achieve the desired temperature.  So if you have a slow-moving hydronic system like I have, the Nest overshoots the target temperature by 5-10 degrees.  Thus if you use these thermostats, expect to wake up in a sweat to 80 degree room temperatures.  Or just as bad, pre-heat your vacation home so it is warm when you arrive, only to find out that the heat was never turned on, despite what the app tells you. Personally, I think these products should be recalled, though it I doubt it will happen.  Someday perhaps Nest will work out all the bugs, but I suspect it will require swapping out all of your installed hardware. Caveat Emptor!
title: System so bug-ridden you'll want to rip it out.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lorie
content: We are loving the Nest.  It only took about a week for the Nest to "learn" our living habits.  When we are home and when we are not.  I like being able to see what the temp is outside the home also.  At night when we walk by the Nest it lights up.  If we are gone a day or two we can control the Nest from our phones to either cool down the house or warm it up.
title: Easy to figure out and easy to use.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Fred Booth
content: Purchased from Amazon last week and when I installed it, the selector ring was extremely hard to turn and near impossible to program. I contacted Amazon and there was no replacement in stock. They immediately contacted Nest and they sent a replacement FedEx. Nest Customer Service called me to make sure I got it and had no issues. Excellent customer service by both Amazon and Nest.  The thermostat was also very easy to program (after watching a few videos).
title: Great Customer Service

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Peter
content: I just purchased and installed (myself) three Nest thermostats. I love them! So easy to use, look great, and love being able to manage my different zones from my cell phone. I worked with Nest via chat to determine compatibility before purchasing - they were very helpful and everything went as expected. Very easy to install - but recommend watching the video a couple of times and then following the instructions exactly. I've been pondering this upgrade for several years and am glad to have finally taken the leap!
title: I love them! So easy to use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James Davis
content: the unit is still learning my preferences, the installation was more difficult then indicated at the web site, so I was forced to spend money on a professional installer.
title: Works well

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Hutch
content: I have to change my review now that I've had to use the cool setting.  I purchased it in December and the heat setting worked just fine, but the A/C setting is malfunctioning. I set the target temperature and the AC unit cuts on and then off.  I have no programs set on the calendar to cause it to shut off.  We called a repair service to see if there was a  problem with the A/C and he said no and that it was working fine and that the problem was with the Nest and he then reattached the old thermostat (which I kept) and now the house is cooling properly. This is my second Nest and the first one is working fine, but this second unit is defective, but I didn't find that out until the warmer months.
title: ... my review now that I've had to use the cool setting. I purchased it in December and the ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joshua Bloom
content: I had my doubts about this working with my current HVAC system that is about 20 to 30 years old. But I followed the directions along with a little help from the nest website and I was up and running within 15 minutes. Setup is super easy. I'm very happy how it allows you to test the system before activating it. Overall the setup was super easy. If I were to recommend it to anyone I would say go for it.
title: Easy Setup and Straight Forward Directions

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: corey
content: I've had this hooked up for roughly 10 weeks.  The unit suddenly went offline and showed "low battery".  I've had an open ticket with Nest for three days.  They are investigating and confirming with engineering.  The unit still works like a regular thermostat, once we disconnected it from the internet.  Apparently there is an issue with the wifi card, causing the battery to drain and fail. I've been trying to get this resolved for 72 hours.  Nest is now going to call me back tomorrow.  I would like to give a better review and get this resolved.  At this point I am unimpressed with this not being resolved since this is obviously an issue with the Nest unit.
title: TBD, battery issue............

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lou F
content: I think this is the sixth unit I've purchased only because we've needed that many and each time I needed customer support they are As Good As it gets and beyond or as good as anything I've ever dealt with! bottom line these units are terrific and my family really enjoys them. As far as the unit they are seamless to operate
title: These are THE BOMB.COM!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andrea F.
