title: I can already say that this is much better than the ecobee but still there is few stuff ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: wilson
content: Too many ways for the system to error even with no problems Chat keeps disconnecting, tried it 5 times with some help only to get disconnected this happened until they left for the day. No way to take the picture needed by support and no mention of previous picture setup. Troubleshooting gave the same steps every time (strip reconnect- when disconnected the unit notices and error code changes) but it was working on the older thermostat so clearly a manufacturing issue? If not compatible tell us so we don’t waste time on hold waiting to be told the same thing the online steps did. Wasted my whole Saturday just to return it.
title: Great computer app but bad hvac system ,, random issues with system errors

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Britt T
content: This thermostat is supposed to learn our routine but regularly would switch to its own thing and off of the routines/schedules we thought we had set up in the app. I love that I was at least able to easily change the temp from my phone when it changed to its own thing. Unfortunately now after only a year of owning the Nest thermostat it has crapped out on us making us think that our AC had died so we paid $150 for the HVAC guy to come diagnose the problem ... which ended up just being the Nest thermostat, as soon as we hooked up the old thermostat everything worked perfectly again.
title: No longer working after 1 year...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: pcpeggs
content: I own 2 nests in my home.  One on a classic AC/Gas Furnace, and one on a Heatpump + Electric E/Aux heating. Both units perform very well - keeping me warm or cool as expected.  In short - I do love them.  There are certain nit-picks, but overall, they are a quality product that is a vast upgrade from my classic thermostat. Install: Wiring them was very straight-forward, using the online tool before purchase really gives you a lot of confidence moving forward.  The setup questions were plain language, often times giving you prompts on "most typical" or "I don't know" was also an option.  The unit runs through tests, and all is well! Usage: I leave mine on "Heat/Cool" - Basically, I have set it and forgotten about ever needing to adjust temps.  Its great.  If I had a regular schedule, the "Auto Schedule" feature would be awesome...but alas, I do not, and I resorted to simply programming it in a classic way. Complaints: 1.  In an effort to be as user friendly as possible, Nest has stripped out some core features, and also "Hard Numbers/Facts".  Its main competitor - EcoBee - is a wealth of information.  Giving you all the data you could ever need to make decisions, or simply to see what kind of impact X or Y has on your energy usage.  Nest only has a rudimentary system with minimal info.  This all fits into their design philosophy (which I understand), but I also wish there was an "advanced" tab or something.  I would even be ok if they allowed 3rd party apps to read that info and display it.  Just give us the ability!!! 2.  Basic functionality that you must use a 3rd party app.  One feature "Auto-Away" is more trouble than it is worth in my opinion.  It relies on a motion sensor to determine if you are home or not.  If your thermostat is not in a place you frequently pass by, it thinks you are away, when you are not. To solve that problem, I turned off "Auto-Away" and found an app called "Skylark".  It uses Geo-fencing in your phone, and sets your Nest to "Away" when you leave a defined area, and sets it to "Home" when you come back.  Its a very basic feature that Nest should have long ago implemented. 3.  No "Hold/Run".  This baffles me.  You can certainly adjust the temp at any time - but there is no way to resume your schedule.  You must simply wait it out until the next schedule time comes for it to resume.... crazy.
title: 2 Nests, and love them.  Some basic features have to be farmed out to 3rd parties.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Harvey B. Guindi
content: There are lots of choices now in connected smart thermostats. However the design, interface, simplicity, power and most of all the support from Nest is still lightyears ahead of any other competitor. These guys are focused on these products and now have the power and support of Google behind them. Can't beat it. Sure there are others with more interesting features and I considered the Honeywell for the voice control and the Ecobee for the multi-room setup, but these are not really the features you want or need in a product like this. You want the home report, simple setup, great support, intelligent design, constant upgrade/updates and product quality.
title: There are others with interesting features but what really matters can only be found with Nest

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Amazon hunter
content: I bought this item last January but had it installed only last month because of house renovations and has been giving me problems already. Its been turning my central AC on and off saying Y wire is not connected and has been asking to be charged every 2 days. I called support and was asked to wait for hours without solving the problem. Horrible experience, I should have not replaced my honeywell.
title: Mess Up

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ken G
content: It's very Impressive for technology, it learns, it fails. It’s a furnace guy’s nightmare. I’m not sure if mine worked correctly since I installed it. I have not touched it since it was installed 2 and a ½ years ago… $1700.00 dollars in furnace repairs.. And the furnace repair guys had to use a competitor’s thermostat to get it working properly. My furnace repair company were very frustrated after spending 4 hours working on it. Buyer Beware. The support thru NEST sucks. Voice support could barely speak English—Chat service took over 2 hours to figure out it didn’t work, only to say it’s out of warranty. WTF.
title: Beware

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Psych Associates
content: I use these at my home and office. Great way to save money and control my environment
title: LOVE IT

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Philip
content: I love these things. We have 3 in our house. 2 of them run on the same HVAC system on separate floors and the 3rd is on a separate HVAC system in a single room. These puppies talk to eachother, you can adjust them on your phone, they detect if anyone is in the house and also monitor where you are in the house. So the system will know if I am in that separate room, upstairs, downstairs, ect and make air adjustments to compensate for where you are in the house. These are awesome.
title: I love these things

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Alejandro Cruz
content: Very happy with the nest thermostat, like how it starts learning our schedule for how we like our house temperatures and also the fact that you can pair this with the separate sensors. Knowing what the temperatures are in our daughters rooms is nice especially on the cold nights. A big feature I like also is that you can control the temperature with the nest app on the phone and that it goes to eco mode when you leave home and it turns on when you get back to the house (pending you have the feature enabled) one dislike is that it doesn’t work with Apple HomeKit. It’s not a total deal breaker for me as I can use Alexa or just the app. But if your “needing” Apple home kit you will have to look elsewhere
title: Comfort at your fingertips

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DonorFan
content: I had to return the product after my construction contractor refused to install because it required all new updated wiring. Learned it requires different wiring than the old outdated thermostats. I bought a programmable Honeywell which does not require new wiring and it works fine for my needs.
title: Had to Return it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: brman
content: Cannot say enough about this controller. Easy to set up, control from phone and monitor temp and humidity. I bought this to monitor my summer home while I am away to insure the humidity and temperature is being controlled. Also handy to change from heat to AC in the spring before I go there.
title: Works really great

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: George Eagle
content: Picked this up at $200. My only complaint was that the default Auto-Away setting basically turned off the thermostat in 100-degree summer heat, so getting home from work was unpleasant for a few days until I figured out that setting and turned it off. I'm also surprised that you can't really get detail about the present day -- only the days that are 'complete'. Still, a very attractive upgrade to something that is usually both ugly and highly visible. Picked up a 'Nest Thermostat Wall Plate - Modern Unfinished' to go with it to provide a nice frame.
title: very attractive upgrade

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: John Marshall
content: It works really well as expected and looks great, too. I'm not too convinced if it makes the house more energy efficient. At times it  does the opposite. I also don't like the invasion of privacy. The device records your daily routines and that information can be hacked. Also, it gives the company data about your routine they can exploit for their purposes. In short, devices like this are a double edged short. Do your homework about privacy before purchasing.
title: Solid product, but it could be better.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: cbw30
content: We have a drafty, 1930s craftsman and have just upgraded to the Nest. Being able to control it from work or under the covers at night is such a luxury. I love the eco settings, the monthly report of usage, and the schedule features. Overall, we are very happy with this product!
title: We absolutely love our Nest

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kelsey Carter
content: Does not work without a common wire, and customer support is not responsive even if thermostat is causing damage to your HVAC system and dangerously high temperature in your home. Save yourself the time, money and frustration that this pretty (but not functional) thermostat will cause, and get an Ecobee!
title: Pretty, but not functional. Nest's service is even worse than the thermostat :-(

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: R&S
content: My simple review follows that of many others, it's easy to setup, intuitive and looks good. The home and away functions have saved us about half the runtime on our unit. I was worried the Nest would not be as useful as the honeywell or ecobee, however it is just as full featured, in a smoother looking package. Paired with an extremely stable and reliable app, which adds energy tracking by hour and by day, it's everything I wanted in a new thermostat, without the old boring rectangular thermostat look. The rebate from our energy companies brought the price below that of less featured and less attractive units, be sure to check that out. We liked our first so much (installed 9 months ago), we bought a second one to use upstairs recently.
title: Owned it for 9 months, solid and loved it, bought a second one.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Larry L. Ferris Jr.
content: I mainly bought this so I could use it with my Echo. Initially I had trouble syncing it up but it was actually very easy. I actually tweeted @Amazonhelp and they gave me the easiest setup. As for the Nest itself it is incredibly easy to setup with very clear instructions on how to do it. Get it now so you can get the rebate from your electric company (I received $100 from ComEd,  check yours). Controls are easy, just twist and click or use the app on your smartphone. I would definitely recommend.
title: Worth it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: CANDODAD
content: The thermostat is designed to self destruct in 2-3 years.  Yes, planned obsolesce.  The thermostat has a battery that cannot be replaced.  After the battery is spend and the voltage goes below 3.7 volts, it will not connect to your network and the thermostat will not get software updates.  Safe your cash and wait for the next gen to be released.  Google, "please do no harm".
title: 2 Years and Kaput

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: al espinosa
content: This was an easy install and I love the ability to control it when I am away from home. It integrated with my Alexa system seamlessly. I purchased two, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. I would recommend to anyone who wants hassle free and save on your electric bill.
title: Best Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: M. Ours
content: Just installed my NEST. Easy to install with my exixting wires. Programming is still working on. Heat worked fine now I turned on the air conditioner. Still fine tuning the air. Love how smart it is. It knows when you are home or gone. I also like the daily report what you use.
title: NEST Thermostat 3 Generation

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Temych
content: The first 3 weeks bring nothing but trouble, starting from a requirement to connect common wire (otherwise Nest runs out of battery power in a day), then changing setting for O/B wire(heat when hot, cool when cold).  With a system set in heat+cool mode and house temperature well in middle(72F) of set heat/cool thresholds (67-78F), Nest turns on heating for no apparent reason, bringing the house up to 85F.  I already wiped all learned schedules twice.  Nest support suggests using heat or cool mode only, or using a manually set schedule and removing all integrations (security, Amazon Echo).  I only live in moderate varying temperatures of NW climate (Seattle).  At this time of year(September) the night temperatures can drop to low 50s, I need the system to work autonomously turning heat at night and perhaps AC in the afternoon.  But with a system only heat or only cool mode, I have to manually switch mode every night and morning.  The only "smart" thing remaining on is that I can control it with my phone?  Well with a real smart features turned off, I'm considering returning the product and going back to old reliable Honeywell that worked fine in heat+cool auto mode.
title: Not too bright after all, and have have to keep an eye on it every day

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Donald G. Huggins
content: I recently installed two of the 3rd gens in my home. Installation was easy enough. If you're handy with a screwdriver you're more than capable of installing it. If you're a novice, I would suggest however, that you search YouTube for a basic thermostat install video just to get familiar with hvac basic wiring (optional). Setup is a breeze once you get them installed and they find your wireless network pretty quickly. I love these devices and have started to see the savings in my utilities cost already. They have learned our heating patterns pretty well after only 3 weeks of use. Being able to use your smartphone to control the nests are so convenient too. Well worth the purchase. Only one drawback, I wish they were more compatible with my Amazon Echo.
title: "Nest is the best"

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: D. Wade Mayfield
content: There isn't alot to the installation process.  Download the Nest app and create the account first.  Watch the youtube video and follow it.  It is easy.  Pay close attention to the use of the screws.  You might do  a dry run first.
title: turn off the power to the thermostat.  It will be easier to install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Michael Juhnke
content: I used the 2nd gen in a previous house and am using the 3rd gen now.  Both work well and reliably do what they are designed to do.  The only issue we've had is that we are rarely in the room with the thermostat in our new house so it doesn't work as efficiently as our last one.  Without it sensing our movement, the thermostat doesn't cool the house to the temperature we like.  I figure this issue is more on the user than the device, but programming the thermostat around the issue took longer than it should have. As with the 2nd gen thermostat, installation was easy and the kit they include covers nearly every contingency.
title: Placement is key

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Olivia Ann H.
content: This thermostat is awesome!! It's totally worth spending the extra money to buy a Nest vs. a Honeywell. We have started programming it, and have noticed a drop in our energy bill. It's extremely handy for those instances where you leave the house for the day and realize you didn't adjust the thermostat before leaving!
title: Saves us money!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: RealReviewCalifornia
content: This is higher quality than the Nest E. The bezel is a type of glass and not plastic. The PG&E rebate takes the sting out of the cost. Being able to adjust your temps from anywhere is awesome. Edit 5/14/20 - Do NOT buy this unit. I have had two go bad in a year. They are shipping these with faulty WiFi modules which fail in a few months making remote interface impossible.
title: Do not Buy

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: CGriffin
content: It right up and it works just nice!!!!! I did not feel that it was right for me to comment on Alexa, because we use Google Home.
title: Plugged.....

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Krueger
content: Quit working after 6-7 months. I looked online and did everything. I reset it, I deleted it and added it back to my app, I checked for updates, I plugged it into USB. This this is now just an expensive junk of junk. I'm so disappointed.
title: useless junk

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Spencer Martin
content: This is my second Nest (for two houses) and I couldn't be happier. I love how easy it is to instal and then use. My only problem is how well it learns and I find it difficult to have it maintain a higher temperature when I am out of the house for an extended period of time. I need to do some more research about that, but it is pretty minor. I love being able to edit the temp from upstairs and away from the house without touching the thermostat. The copper look looks pretty cool too. I like it better than the black one I bought for the first house.
title: I like it, I love it, I want some more of it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Artemio Semder
content: I love nest thermostats. We have 3 at one location and 1 on a separate location. I am only giving this 3 stars because you cannot select different locations. This means that the weather displayed on all the thermostats is that of the one location you specified. Please fix this!
title: Great product, app could be improved

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nathan and Jessica Wills
content: Works great so far. I do wish I could manually adjust a few more settings and wish it had a little bit more control of auxiliary devices such as whole house humidifiers. For example you can get Aprilaire humidifiers with automatic humidity control as they detect outdoor air temperature and adjust the humidity level based on that so you don't get condensation. Nest doesn't have an algorithm for that yet, but is easily capable of doing so as it knows the outdoor air temperature from the internet connection.
title: Works great so far

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Michael N
content: Love the design, minimalist style. Very easy to operate and the built quality is solid. The Nest app works well. The customer support is very helpful as I had some questions regarding the installation and smart home integration setup. Good product!
title: Beautiful design, solid built quality

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Glenn Hansen
content: I installed this Nest on a 3 wire Electric forced air furnace. Very easy to install and Nest even provides you with a screw driver! Setup was also very easy. I now have control of Nest from my iPad, iPhone, Harmony remote and Alexa Echo and Dot. Would highly recommend Nest to anyone looking for a programmable and remotely accessed thermostat that even a caveman can install! It already has to be saving us money by shutting off the heat when I leave the house with my phone. I never remember to do that! It has also started learning our habits and adjusting the heat accordingly! Too cool!
title: Staying warm cheaper with Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Consumer Advocate
content: The battery goes dead after two months.  The thermostat ran fine for 60 days then the battery went dead.  I charged it but it would not hold a charge.  No way to replace the battery and technical help only suggested an expensive service call
title: Battery goes dead after 2 months

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shadowbob
content: Nest is the thermostat that saves you electricity by not running your appliances when you are home and need them.  I tried using the auto schedule feature and it consistently ignored my patterns and shifted my presets to higher (cooling) temperatures and later times.  So extreme that the AC would never ever run in my weather. I manually changed them to the proper settings that I actually need and it auto changed them back.  So I disabled leaning.  It constantly shut off my AC anyway because it marks me as away every single hour even when I am home.  I made sure my location settings were working.  Even when I manually tell it I’m home in the app it marks me away again in only an hour.  HOW THE F DID IT THINK I SNUCK PAST ITS MOTION DETECTOR EVERY HOUR IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT.  Could they think maybe an hour without walking by it is a bit too short to assume I’m away... when I’m asleep? So I’m lying awake roasting in the middle of the night.  So I disabled that too.  Now... I have a regular thermostat.  Assuming it’s not still failing somehow.  Dumbest thermostat I have ever owned. Avoid like plague.  Pleass ignore reviews by those who haven’t actually tested the features they are looking at. Update 2020: Even after disabling all learning, home/away, everything, it still tries to raise my temperature and shut off the AC.  I confirmed in the Alexa history that nobody messed with it.  If I wanted to never run the AC I wouldn’t have spent thousands repairing it.  Solution I Googled said to do a factory reset.  Solution dated 2019.  Nest still can’t make a working thermostat that actually turns AC on/off when it’s supposed to.  Don’t fall for the scam nor the reviews that fell for it.  Look for other options.
title: Complete and utter garbage

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: lu
content: Delivered on time in great condition. I have my furnace company install the Nest for me which took 30 minutes. They set it up and showed me how to work. The battery was low so I had to wait for for it to charge.  Then the nest supprort team helped me to install al Wif setting. It was all easy and I would have tryed myself if the home builder had put it low enought for a  5'2" person to put the setting in without a stiff neck. My son has had his fir over 2 years and recommended the Nest to me.
title: My new Nest Thermastat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nermin Suljic
content: I’ve had the thermostat for over two years now. It worked fine and then all of a sudden my AC (equipped with heat pump) stopped cooling. Called the home warranty and $125 later discovered that the thermostat is bad. They put a cheap Honeywell thermostat and now my AC is working again. Very disappointed to say the least! It was probably a software update that messed it up.
title: My AC stopped cooling (bad Nest thermostat)

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JPitt
content: I installed this myself and had no issues, quite simple. I didn't need to contact tech support for anything, it was fairy self explanatory.  Our utility bills have been noticeably lower since we installed the Nest. Could it have to do with a milder winter, possibly. I do think the technology is a large factor in the reduced heating costs. Qualified for a $50 rebate from my provider, so that was a nice reward as well. Amazon also credited me $40 when the price changed after I bought it, super nice surprise!
title: Impressed with results and Amazon

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: brock
content: Can not explain how impressed I am with this product. Everything from the way it was pacakaged to how it’s installed was thought about. I never want to do reviews but this thing needs to be bragged on. From start to finish took me about 20 min and that’s with me talking to the family about how awesome it is. The back plate comes with a level, and it comes with a nice flat/Phillips screwdriver. The device works great, we have had it installed for 8 months now and are enjoying the hot-cold feature right now since we have 50’s inthe morning and 70’s in the afternoons. I recommend this to everyone I can because it is a great buy.
title: It’s great!!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: A. Reiter
content: We love our new Nest Thermostat.  Had to call for technical support during installation which was by far the best support for any device I have ever had!  Got it working and even recently added control ("Alexa, set the heat to 68 degrees") via my Amazon Echo Dot devices.  We can now be out of town and a few hours before we get home we can turn up the heat via the app on our phones!  Highly recommended!
title: We love our new Nest Thermostat.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ialobster
content: Easy to set up with iphone App.  Really a nice travel feature to only heat or cool according to my set preferrence when I am home...and allows me to have an "AWAY mode that.  Huge savings on energy bills.  And 2 days after I ordered it, my local energy company/service offered a $100 rebate.  Double bonus!
title: Recognizes when I am @ home or "AWAY" and control thermostat accordingly

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: N. Abbott
content: The Nest is pretty much everything I expected.  After a short time it 'learned' what our preferred temperatures are and adjusts accordingly.  It knows when we are away from the house and sets the thermostat in ECO mode to save energy.  It's great being able to see the temp  and adjust from any phone.  It's also very useful to see the energy usage history.  With the energy credit offered by my local power company and the 'smartness' of the Nest, it will pay for itself in about a year.
title: Good stuff: Exactly as Expected

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Teri
content: I love the Nest.  My electricity bill went down $30 one month and $40 another.  I had a programmable thermostat before this one but with that one you can only have it on cool or heat, not both and in Houston weather can go from one to the other.  Also with the Nest love that I can program the temperature in the house from my phone so I can cool or heat it up before I get home.  Love the Eco feature - I don't have to remember anything and it automatically saves me money.  I have had the Nest for 1 year and it has already paid for itself from savings
title: Saved me money / paid for itself

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: VinceT
content: I love being able to control my thermostat from anywhere.  We're hot and headed home, tell the A/C to drop an extra degree or disable away because we're on our way back.  Only issue I have is the A/C sometime turns off and back on within a second.  I need to call support on that issue. EDIT: Called support about the issue, they quickly sent me out a replacement.  I'm waiting to see if it happens again, but support was amazing, great job nest!
title: One of the best out there

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Audible Listener
content: I used to have another Thermostat that was controlled by phone.  It was good but lacked some of the integration that the Nest has with an entire home system.  The Nest has been a pleasure to date after you get past some of the interesting quirks like it thought I wasn't home, even though I was. I would highly recommend a Nest to anyone who wants to be able to monitor their home while on the road
title: Definitely recommended

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Liz G.
content: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made. Our old 1960s thermostat is not compatible with a lot of other ones that are on the market now. The nest was belts for thermostats like this only have one single wire for both hot and cold. Unlike any of the other thermostats, I was not forced to run in the tire new wire down my home just to install this. It's very user-friendly, easy set up and smart. Within a week it landed my Waz it's very user-friendly, easy set up and smart. Within a week it learned out schedule and ways. Amazing little unit! I can't want until I get a chance to try some other nest products in the future!
title: Perfect

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: LR
content: I would not even give this one star but I have no choice.  I had a new heater installed in the downstairs where we did not have air conditioning so there was only two wires.  The install said it was ok but wait my heater continued to ramp up and down since it could not get a good signal  from the nest.  I called out heater techs several time until one said it's your Nest.  I looked on line same problems but I have to eat the cost!
title: Nest Bad, No Return!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: PJB
content: I spent a lot of time researching smart thermostats before buying this and feel that I made the right choice with the Nest thermostat.  It was very easy to install and connect to both Alexa and our smartphones.  It was very quick to learn our habits and we rarely have to change the temperature anymore.  The eco mode is really great and it's wonderful to be able to set it to eco and turn that off remotely when on our way home from a trip.
title: Good choice after a LOT of research

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Daniel Cox
content: I purchased this nest to replace the second thermostat in my home. I’d installed a nest in my previous home and replaced the main thermostat when moving here a few months ago. Both of those installations were easy/straightforward, and the devices worked great. I had several issues with this device when installing, with it not securing properly and restarting several times during setup. It made it through three steps before powering off again and has not restarted since attempting the installation. It’s disappointing since the first two worked great.
title: Third Time’s Not the Charm

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Whitney
content: I'm so over this thermostat. It's been 2 weeks of randomly changing the temperature even after I've turned every "smart" setting off. I'm ready to rip this thing off the wall. Wake up in the morning sweating becaue it's turned itself up to 80 degrees, set it high when we leave for the weekend and it's cooling to 70 when we're not even home.
title: I'm so over this thermostat. It's been 2 weeks ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: E.J. Smith
content: I bought 2 of these for my home. Very easy to install/replace existing thermostats ( one digital and one “old school” With the dial). There is an instruction video that walks you through installation. I have two zones - upstairs is AC and heat and downstairs is heat only.  Both tested perfectly.
title: Very easy to install.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Terry
content: Some reviews have criticized the fact that the product prominently displays the temperature at which the thermostat is set.  From what I can tell, in smaller print above the display, is the actual temperature.  Obviously some folks find it annoying.  I don't.  The product is as described, installs easily as they claim and functions well.  I would certainly recommend this product for anyone looking to replace or install a new thermostat.
title: Obviously some folks find it annoying. I don't

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Noel V
content: First one I received was a dud, but Amazons amazing customer service sent me one the same day! With out a doubt one of the best upgrades you do for your home. Fixed previous issues I had with certain rooms gett too hot/cold. Smart feature shut off unit while no one is home and is super easy to adjust using either your phone or Alexa.
title: Smart home must have.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Javi
content: The nest lives up to the hype. Its a great smart thermostat that has learned my pattern very well. The away/eco feature is also great since I don't have to worry about turning off the A/C anymore, it just turns itself off and makes sure it maintains whatever temperature range I set it to for when no one is in the house. My only reason for giving this 4 stars is that there is no Apple HomeKit compatibility so I can't control it with Siri :(. Good thing I recently ordered my Amazon Echo Dot!
title: Its a great smart thermostat that has learned my pattern very well

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Amby
content: Loved this product at my previous home.  I moved and bought one to install there but found out there is a certain wire the thermostat base has to have in order to use it.  So before you spend your money ask your electrician to find out if you have that wire.  I would have to run the wire through the walls etc. and I live in a condo so no can do.  I am looking for an alternative.
title: Check your wires!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: c4v3man
content: Much improved over 1st Gen unit. Wireless radio is more reliable, the display activates extremely early and quickly, as if it knows you want to check the temperature as you walk past. It's just so quick to glance at now with a bright, large display, from even 10' away. The platform is mature and will likely be supported for quite some time.
title: An easy recommendation. Not cheap, but the safe choice.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Karen
content: It was more difficult to install than the directions said.  I didn't have the right kind of wire, so my son had to go into the attic and connect some sort of wire.  Before that, the NEST just ran and ran and ran.  After my genius son fixed it, I love it!  It keeps the house a steady temperature, and it is very easy to see.  I haven't done the online thing, and I don't do the Smart Phone thing.  I just pretty much put it on 72 during the day and 71 at night and I'm a happy camper!
title: Nice new thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Solano
content: Always wanted one of these thermostat. Finally got one since we moved into our new home. Amazing fun to use device. Even linked it to my vivint smart home alarm system. I went ahead and installed with wenstar device to add “C” wire solution. Everything is running smooth and great. Installation of nest was really easy. Took about 10 mins.
title: Awesome device.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JJ Ebb
content: Used one of these at a vacation rental, and I was sold.  Replaced our old outdated Honeywell, was so simple once I confirmed my system was compatible.  Took about 1/2 hour to setup, from start to finish.  Connected to the AP, now I can control my temp from upstairs.  Highly recommend.
title: Love It!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JF
content: Over the past two years, i've purchased a number of next thermostats, protects, and also a doorbell.  In the past month, i've had two problems -- it doesn't go into "away" mode which one of the major value propositions of nest to save money.  I noticed this when I looked up my Lutron lights to automatically turn on when no one is home.  Working with Nest has been a nightmare -- the thermostat people blaming the protect folks, and vice versa. An then I took advantage of a cellphone promotion to get a new phone -- but, it needed a new number.  If you have two factor authentication enabled - Nest has no way of letting you back into your system if you change your number, and don't plug authenticate the new phone number with your old phone (and old phone number).  I've been on the the phone with Nest for well over an hour -- and they claim that this isn't a problem, but I state that i'm locked out.  After going round and round with the tech support -- I ask to speak with someone higher up the food chain, and they can't do that.  I ask for the name and address of the president of the company -- 18 minutes later, they still can't provide.  It's amazing that the banks, brokerage companies and other tech companies can deal with someone changing their phone number -- but, Nest (Google) can't.  Oh yeah, Google can -- as I did it with them.  When a "Sr. tech support agent" got on the line -- i heard him say "is this the guy" - yep -- and then he hung up the phone.  Awful support. Beware, this is a company that doesn't give a crap about customers.
title: WARNING - Don't change your phone number

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jessica Breidert
content: Love, love the Nest thermostat. The convenience of turning the temp up and down with our iphones or asking Alexa to do so, is GREAT! The Nest also, learns the algorithms of when are iPhones are not home. When not at home it turns the thermostat down to eco mode to save money and energy. After the first two weeks of turning up and down the thermostat to our liking during certain times, the Nest now knows that we like it cooler when we sleep and hot when we wake up in the morning! The hubby said, it’s like the Nest knows when we wake up!! IT DOES we trained it that way!! SETUP: was a sinch
title: LOVE LOVE the NEST!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rose
content: I really like the functions on this thermostat. My thermostat upstairs I can see when I go downstairs now. It ‘sees’ me and shows me what it is set at without walking over. Also, when I forget to turn it down and I’m already tucked in, i do it from my phone. It was easy to install and the directions were the best I’ve seen on an electronic device.
title: Just buy it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mark M.
content: I was a little skeptical on how this would work, but I'm very pleased. I work on the road and I can keep track of my house to ensure it's staying cool/warm enough on eco mode. The app is really easy to set up and use from anywhere! I really like the monthly report it sends to show usage.
title: Great thermostat!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S. Taylor
content: Fantastic looking thermostat that is very easy to use. The app is simple and gets the job done. It’s very easy to setup, just be sure to verify the number and types of wires you have to your current system to know the capabilities.
title: Works great!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeannette
content: I had mine for 2 years and it saved me money and then just after the warranty was up I came home from a trip to find out it had stopped working 10 days ago. It sounds like it is the same problem that everyone else has, charge it and it works until the battery dies again. Support told me it was out of warranty and I need a new one but the best they can do is give me 20% off. I think i’ll be exploring my other options.
title: Doesn’t last

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Va Belle
content: MY HVAC guy doesn't really like this, but we sure do. I love the giant temperature display, how easy it is to use.....but not easy to install (at least for the average homeowner (Me!). I have a duel fuel system, which is now being used correctly as the installer had not connected the thermostat correctly. Who knew? So overall this was a smart, albeit rather expensive buy. My HVAC guy tells me it will take some time for the system to "learn" our preferences. Still I"m looking forward to comparing bills in hopes of saving a few dollars.
title: Very nice. Expensive—but a  quality purchase.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jonathan
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Great product, once you start using a smart thermostat you will never go back. Great way to better manage your energy usage and cut down on wasted energy. The build quality is excellent.
title: Great product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dave Moses
content: Beware, I bought the NEST 3rd Gen unit on Septmebet 16th. It is now November 10th and my heater no longer turns on with any thermostat! I have to remove the nest and connect the red and white wires together and then the frnace fires right up. I have had a tech in and he could not find the problem. I will call the tech support number tomorrow but I am very unhappy with this, we have had it less then two months and suddenly I have to turn my gas furnace on and off by connecting a wire! I will update but I have already found others with this problem..
title: All that Glitters is not gold!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sylvana
content: I am very pleased with my Nest. It was SO easy to set up. I watched a video first to become familiar with the process, then proceeded to install. I had no help with the installation - the instructions are very clear. It immediately started up when I turned the system back on. The process of setting up was easy. I logged on to the Nest site and continued the set-up. I have had it for a few days now and it is working perfectly. It looks nice, too! Love the analog clock!  I purchased it to replace an older thermostat, as I wanted to be able to control my heating and air when I am away from home.
title: Happy with my Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andres Maduro
content: A piece of art, well designed, easy to install and use.  The package brings all that is needed to install, even a screw driver and an integrated level. The app works great and is easy to setup.  Also it can be integrated with third party home automation systems like the Wink HUB and others thanks to the open API (Aplication programming interface). The only thing I recommend to the Nest guys is to improve direct communications between the app and the thermostate when you are at home on the same network (LAN).  This is because when you want to control the thermostat from your mobile phone or tablet at home, it connects to the equipment thorugh the Nest servers and requires internet which makes it slow. Hue lights tkae a different approach and when at home, the app connects directly to the lights which make it very fast to control.  With Nest, you have to wait a few seconds before the Nest app can connect to the thermostat, some times even it fails. Another great feature I like is the monthly report you get over email about your past month usage and comparison with your previous month. Despite of this, I give 5 stars as this is the best thermostat on the market. Nest, just keep improving!
title: easy to install and use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gardengro
content: I walk past it and it lights up. I forget to turn it down at night and I can do that from my phone in bed. I leave the house, it can sense I'm not home and turn down the heat or turn the a/c off. I can also do that manually from my phone. I can't rave enough about this thermostat.
title: Best ever!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S. quashnick
content: I replaced an older thermostat with the Nest.  I have some trouble with the wiring.  Initially I wired the Nest the way the old thermostat was wired.  The system did not work as expected.  Nest's online help was not helpful. So after reviewing a system installer's instructions, I wired the system correctly and it works like a dream.  The image shows the stickers labeled as the old thermostat connections.  The image shows the correct connections for a gas heater (no cooling).
title: 5 Wires - red, green, yellow, white, blue

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rob Keller
content: Google disabled IFTTT In august right after my return period ended. Now I need to buy Ecobees to replace my 3 nests. I will never buy google automation products again.
title: Google cancelled IFTTT

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: amydia4
content: I purchased 2 thermostats and installed both of them (with a 2 year old in tote and my husband away) in less than 30 minutes. Install was very easy, not because I know how to install a thermostat but because the instructions and online help were easy to use. Thanks to sloppy HVAC work, I had to use the included optional plate to cover prior holes and it looks okay. I would have preferred to not have had to use them though. I love that I can control both thermostats with the app. I will need more time to determine if we see a decrease in energy.
title: Install was so easy!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jenn
content: We have had this unit for a year, and it has more than paid for itself.  Setup is  ridiculously easy. They provide stickers to mark the wires when you uninstall your old thermostat.  The away feature saves us hundreds of dollars!  If you are the type of person who keeps the thermostat set to off, then no you won't save, but if you want your phone to tell your home to be a certain temp when you are headed home, then this is the device for you.  It looks pretty amazing on the wall as well!
title: Sleek look saves you $$$$

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DT2
content: I really do love my Nest Thermostat but they've missed 2 obvious things.  1st: On the heat/cool mode, the actual temperature is almost impossible to find, if I can find it at all.  It just shows me the range.  Also, love the Auto Away idea, but there should be auto away for short periods of time and auto away vacation mode.  I made the mistake of turning on auto away with very wide temperatures cause we were gone all day.  Came back to a freezing house that took some time to re-heat (and used a lot of energy) doing that. Other than that, it's simple to install and use, sleek and I do love it.
title: I really do love my Nest Thermostat but they've missed 2 obvious things

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Stephanie
content: I love this thermostat so much. It has helped reduce my electric bill with its Eco mode, and due to the fact I can adjust it easily from my phone while I am not at home. You can set up a temperature and fan schedule as well. I have it linked with my google minis, so I can easily change the temperature or turn it off with a few words.
title: Super Nifty

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Howard SF
content: I didn't need this thermostat, and you probably don't either.  For a fraction of the price, a programmable thermostat will do the most important thing -- keep your house as warm or as cool as you desire, on days and at times that you choose.  That said, I love it anyway because it's a terrific piece of technology and looks good as well.  It uses a Bluetooth signal from your phone to know whether you are home or not, and if you're not, it can lower the heat or turn down the air conditioning, thereby saving money.  How cool is that?!  It uses WiFi to show you the current weather, as well as allowing you to control it remotely with your cell phone.  An extravagance perhaps, but a clever one.
title: A terrific -- though pricey -- piece of technology

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tom Geiger
content: life should be measured in terms of "aggrevation factor".  Basically anything over a 7 is really "Aggrevating".  Nest is a 9.  You have to deal with the wiring (we only have heat, you would think it would be easy), then the programing etc.  In our case, it lite up but never turned on the heat. I put our old Honeywell back on.  Put Nest back in the box for another day.
title: life should be measured in terms of "aggrevation factor". ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Carolyn M. Hettrich
content: Worked great in the winter (purchased in November) - but would not work to power air conditioner in the summer due to error in circuit board.  According to our HVAC guy this is a common problem.  Unfortunately it is too late to return it....
title: Worked great in the winter (purchased in November) - but would ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: D. Harris
content: This is our second one, and w as the first thing we bought for our new house along with Nest Smoke/Carbon Monoxide Alarms. They integrate seamlessly into one nice neat app. I can't say enough good things and every chance I get I talk to people about it when they ask. I love that I can set schedules or adjust remotely, especially with our pets in the house. I wish they would jump into the home monitoring market and integrate these with the Amazon Echo because that would be something I would definitely use! They are easy to install; seriously, it took me about 5 minutes this time and the first one maybe 15 minutes. They also make it very easy to setup - it basically walks you through the process and the controls are very intuitive to use. I like that it learns from me. It knows me, it gets me. :) I know it seems expensive when you look at the price but what you get in the way of convenience and monitoring of your energy usage is well worth it tor me. If you want to hear more, feel free to ask a question!
title: Nest is best!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dan Hatch
content: Very disappointing experience with this product. I was excited to get the thermostat and replaced perfectly good Honeywell thermostats in my two homes when the local power companies offered rebates. The product itself works ok. The software is confusing and is constantly switching the thermostats for the two homes so that when we control one it frequently mistakenly controls the other one. The eco setting will not allow a temperature of less than 76C for an away setting which doesn't work very well for one home because the cooling system is somewhat under designed and takes too long to get to a comfortable temperature from 76. Disabling the eco away setting essentially reduces this to a scheduling thermostat and forces you to design the entire schedule yourself. Getting customer support is an effort in frustration and I'm sitting on hold now with both their telephone and online chat support for over two hours. Had a much higher expectation for a company which enjoyed such good buzz for so long.
title: My experience was not positive

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jackbeanstalk
content: nice install -  really nice.  love the  control of the thermostat and the nest app for android.  The only downside is that Alexa is not totally integrated.  For example,  i could like to turn the furnace fan on for two hours but have not found an Alexa way to do that.
title: works great - super easy to install and run

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: desdet
content: Love this thermostat and the ability the monitor our home temperature at any location. Love the great professional look and the different color options for the trim. We are already saving on the utility bills this winter! Installation is easy and App use is a breeze. It is best to have a C (common) wire already in your house, though there are alternatives for those of us who did not have a common wire. Very happy with this purchase.
title: Great thermostat choice!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sandy H.
content: Never worked, out of the box. Had an electrician/HVAC person try it. Other (new) thermostat with Wifi worked immediately out of box. Unfortunately, I waited past the return date to try it and so I'm out $200. Don't wait.
title: Wouldn't hook up to electric

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ZBatia
content: It was easy to install. I have replaced my mulfunctioning thermostat. I had to call to tech support that was extremely helpful because the Nest did not show the right temperature. I did not know that I have to wait for about 2 hrs. Right after that, the Nest began working as expected. I love remote control from my phone, not to mention it looks really sexy on my family room wall.
title: Love it!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Max Too
content: I love my NEST Thermostat. Integrates seamlessly with the App and the rest of my NEST products. I like the weather forecast display. If you are not in a hurry, you should wait until Black Friday to purchase it because they typically offer it for about 40% discount
title: Love this NEST Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James Seavert
content: Nothing better than lying in bed and turning up the heat with your phone. Being retired, I had a problem with the learning mode because of my unusual day to day schedule, so I had to call Nest and disable it.  Great customer service as they patiently walked me through the procedure.
title: Love my new controller.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jnesley
content: I love that I can set the temperature from my phone from anywhere. I also like seeing the usage we have on a month summary. We have saved money because of this device. Very easy to use. We have it set up on an android and an Apple phone
title: Love it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Buckeyegam3r
content: Only have had it for a few days but the install was easy, and the thermostat works.  It needs to learn the size of your home and then it can start estimating how long it will take to cool down (or heat up) to a specific temperature.  Make sure to install the Nest app from the app store because you can let it know your location and it can start switching to Away Mode when you leave the house for work. The Nest Thermostat looks great, and while saving you money  it will impress visitors in your home. Update: 4 years later and I still love it and think it has paid for itself in savings
title: Easy install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: CAH
content: I have had a programmable thermostat for quite a few years.  After seeing a rebate from my gas company, I decided to get one that works well with my Echo system.  It was easy to install.  The instructions took you through all the different wiring configurations to match what you have and the unit fired up and setup very easily.  It's pretty much automatic as it watches your habits and adjust the program to match, but I can still ask Alexa to make changes to the temperature.  Love it
title: Love It - Easy to install and Use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Brian Odell
content: I’ll keep it short... the Nest thermostat is great. It was easy to setup. Easy to use. Tons of nice features. And it definitely seems to be more efficient than any other thermostat that I’ve owned in the past.
title: Turn it up! ... the heat that is.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: John M
content: alot of hype. If you pay attention to the setting on your thermostat, this one won't do better than you; it likely won't do as well, because you might want it cooler or warmer depending on your activities at a specific moment/day. That does not mean you want it that same temp every other day. So I end up changing the temp manually all the time. honestly a big reason why we will keep it is aesthetics; we like the look and the display.
title: this one won't do better than you

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Carlos
content: I absolutely love my nest thermostat. I had some issues getting it to work initially because the cooling function would blow hot air. I eventually figured out that although the wiring diagram had my heater set to (W) it should have gone to O/B. Once I moved the wire to O/B the whole thing worked like a charm. I am looking forward to the rebate I will be getting from my insurance company and my power company.
title: Love this thing!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kathy
content: I love being able to adjust the temperature without getting up.  Its learning capability doesn't help me much because the settings we need are seasonal.  We can set the a/c lower when it's mild outside and higher in the really hot weather.  So by the time it learns, it's not the right setting for our house.  But by being able to adjust it easier manually, we are saving money.
title: Love it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ScottW
content: Nice to be able to start warming the house while you are still driving home. I haven't used the "smart features", Stetting up  Alexa was not intuitive since you had to patch it in though Google home and at that point...ok Google.
title: Works fine....Alexa is a kludge

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nicholas Camacho
content: Tried for about a week and did not notice my AC working any differently.  Matter of fact there were days it would run for much longer.  My guess is it works better in not so hot and humid climates as FL.
title: Needs some work.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: DJ Carden
content: Was simple to install, did it by myself with 0 hvac experience. Didn’t need a service tech was able to complete by myself. Love the app and that I can control house temps on the go. Has saved me money on power bill every month can’t complain.
title: Saved money on power bill, app makes it very useful

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jonathan D. Griffith
content: Package missing 2 components making the warehouse pre-inspected deal useless. Buy new and save the hassle of the exchange.
title: Don't trust the package and inspection comments on warehouse deals.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ValerieD
content: I had a HVAC tech install the thermostat, and I was able to set it up easily after.  I connected to my Amazon Echo and this is my favorite feature.  I will keep the temperature low at night, and in the morning I call out to my Echo from my bed to raise the temperature to make it easier to get up.  I like the feature that it will light up and show me the temperature setting when I walk by it and it's easy to read. I can adjust the thermostat when I'm not home, in case someone forgets to turn off the heat/air when they leave the house.
title: and I was able to set it up easily after. I connected to my Amazon Echo and ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Beverly Weldon
content: So easy. Sent a pic of my old wiring to Nest to check on compatibility. It was and they sent me a customized diagram showing where my old wires (I had 7) went in the Nest. Then sent a generic installation and setup video. Installation and setup on the app took less than 15 minutes. Have had it about a week so it is still learning my preferences. Pleased so far. With my utility's rebates and programs, this will be totally paid for and more by them in 3 years notwithstanding any additional savings I may get in the actual usage of it.
title: Easy installation, great customer support

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: C.A.
content: If I forget to put Away it Automatically changes. The learning is so nice to have. The heat comes on just before we get home and right on time for the morning alarm. Easy to install. We did watch a video to install.
title: Love how it works

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: D. Stamatis
content: This is an almost perfect piece of equipment. I can't think of how to make it any easier to use. Very impressed. Update, after 2 months' use: I only have 2 wires (and no common wire) to my thermostat. Nest said that a common "C" wire is not required. But, what I found is that it ran fine, for a few days, but then my furnace started acting funny, e.g., when Nest was in "heating" mode, my thermostat would sometimes stay off, and just make clicking noises. Other times, the fan would turn on and off, every 2 seconds, over and over and over. After doing a little research on Nest's site, I found a help page that says the above 2 problems are likely caused by an incompatible furnace motherboard. Since the Nest is stealing power from the motherboard, to charge itself, some motherboards start acting strangely. In other words: a common "C" is ABSOLUTELY REQUIRED. I'm annoyed that Nest would say otherwise, without actually asking what kind of furnace I'm using. After all, how ELSE could they tell me, for certain, if a "C" is required? Looks like Nest is hedging their bets. They're just telling everyone that they don't need a "C" wire, and assume that some 80% of people won't need it, it's acceptable (to them) to have the rest of the 20% to install Nest and have endless problems. The only solution is to wire new furnace wire (that includes a common wire). No way to avoid it.
title: It doesn't work without a "C" common wire.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Daiwan Smith
content: Awesome addition to my smart home. It does what is expected and looks beautiful mounted on my wall. Instillation was a breeze. I will have to update my status after a put a month to see if can really see any savings. The on approach wake up display is a nice added touch
title: Should have bought this sooner

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: RP
content: The thermostat itself seems OK but I can't believe that the company does not provide and DOES NOT HAVE an operations manual. Instead, you must hunt through links on their web site to try to find a specific feature or answer to a specific question. If you are off line, you are dead. I called the company to verify. Absurd!
title: OK, BUT COMAPNY HAS NO USER MANUAL!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeffrey Miovech
content: This is pretty neat!  The app is easy to use and rather robust.  If you use the Home/Away and Learning features, make sure you set your Eco Temps.  The default is off, so your temps will drop/climb to uncomfortable levels when you are away.
title: Nice!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Hoppmiester9003
content: Why can't we change the evening timings away from 4-9 PM? This means im locked into one sensor in my house until 9 PM. This is ridiculous and Google's only response is: "we'll take the feedback on board". Keep looking for a real thermostat for a smarthome. This one is not it.
title: Can't change the schedule timings

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jules
content: Easy to install and set up. So far works great! Update: I quickly grew annoyed and tired of the "delay" feature. Cause of this my house does not cool down to what it should. It runs for 2 minutes then delays, repeat, repeat.... I might throw my Nest away over it and go back to a standard thermostat. So frustrating. Any fixes for this???
title: Five Stars

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: BASEL ALDOSERY
content: I'd give it 10 stars if I could, I mean my life has never been better, no more waking up in the middle of the night because I'm hot or cold. I recommend also buying the metal cover and the nest sensors, I got one next to my bed and another next to my computer because when I'm playing games it gets hot but because of the sensor it cools the place.
title: Your LIFE needs this!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pedro
content: I have used the Nest Thermostat only for a short time but I already like it very much. Easy temperature setting, sophisticated controllability through iPhone, very clear temperature display, beautiful appearance. I have three Nests in my home because I have three heating zones. I only use the Nests for heating at this point. Once I develop more experience with these units I'll be able to write a more complete review.
title: Advanced thermostatic control for your home

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Frankc1224
content: This is truly an awesome device, especially if you're at all handy and kind of control freak.  Now I can see the temperature and humidity in my house, even when I'm away and can change it in anticipation of returning home.  It was truly easy to install and the online video directions were excellent. I wanted one of these for a long time and don't know why I waited.
title: Easy to Install and Easy to Use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: sm blonde
content: This thing has a life of its own even when you turn it off of learning mode. It’s great that I can change it from my phone but it’s frustrating that it randomly changes the temperature just because I walked past it.
title: Has a life of its own.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: AshMan
content: Installed this for a Client of mine after we just painted the walls with fresh paint and had all the holes from the old thermostat closed up. this is mounted right on the wall and looks Amazing! so easy to use and took maybe 10 minutes to get installed and all set up. Wiring is so easy if you use the nest website to confirm compatibility! Match the wires to what was connected on your old thermostat and you are good to go!
title: Saves Energy and So Easy to use!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Marc
content: I absolutely love this device. Sorry I didn’t purchase years ago. Very smart and intuitive. Pairs well with Alexa. Can be controlled remotely. Learning my a/c behavior and automatically sets temp when away from home. Excellent device and well worth the money.
title: Great energy saving thermostat.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Wj
content: Installed easily ! This was a breeze and I was very apprehensive on the installation but it went much easier than I thought . The part I would warn everybody about is the installation is fairly quick but you have to repair the wall where the old thermostat was mounted . Had to spackle and paint and wait for that to dry. don't turn off you a/c and disconnect old thermostat till you have wall fixed! I strongly recommend product. My xfinity app brought it right into my security system. Absolutely happy!
title: Awesome Product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jim Richmann
content: Operation is cumbersome and not at all simple.  No operation manual and no support except on an inadequate web site.  I had the NEST professionally installed and the technician told me that I must always tell repairmen servicing the main HVAC unit that the thermostat was a NEST or I could end up damaging either the thermostat or the HVAC unit.  Operation almost mandates the use of the NEST App--which itself only scores 2.4 on the Apple App Store.  The installation manual is complete, but the operation manual is a joke, and is really only an advertisement for other NEST products.  Registration requires a QR code that is on the BACK of the unit.  Wish they'd told me that before the technician mounted it on the wall.  Once I did find out how to turn the thing on, accessing the SETTINGS menu was complex with many, many unexplained options.  I had been under the belief that if I installed the thing and then just turned it to raise or lower the temperature, that after a while it would learn and adjust.  I am very disappointed, especially in the inadequate testing of the product with customers.
title: No Operation Manual and No Phone Support -- Product Seems Untested

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andre Meaux
content: Absolutely love my Nest!! It's awesome.  It does a few things that I didn't even realize it did.  It works with Google Home (obviously, being a Google made product) which is kind of fun because I can say things like "Ok Google, lower the temperature" and the thermostat goes down haha - just fun.  If you're considering a Nest, get one you won't regret it!! If you're considering a Nest-like product, just get the Nest - again, you won't regret it!
title: Nest is Best!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: TheAmazonian
content: I love being able to control the temperature remotely. I could be upstairs in the bedroom and adjust the temp in the middle of the night using my phone. The house does feel more comfortable and less drafty now. The one thing I don't like is the schedule interface. It is a pain to adjust the daily temperature schedule. We also did the installation using Amazon services and I could not be happier. The person who did the work was extremely professional. Amazon also guarantees the work. All in all very happy with the purchase
title: I love being able to control the temperature remotely

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nick C.
content: I have yet to get the app to load down so I can turn on the blue tooth so I can then try to get alex to context.  But it is nice that it has figured out on comes o in the morning to warm the house.  My fault about tech support will get out book again and see if I can get a number for tech support.  Tried tech support with alex and got nothing.  Makes me think maybe google is better.
title: To much work.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: NicoleM
content: I purchased this and installed it myself very easily. My hubby was impressed! The most difficult aspect was that my drywall was a mess behind the old thermostat.  I was able to use the mounting plate that came along with it.  I wanted to use the round decorator version, but the drywall was a mess making it impossible.  It looks great and we are teaching it.  We have the Nest Drop Cam too and love that both products are in the same app.
title: Love it - EASY to install!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Chaz Curtis
content: I got a bum product. The Nest logo at the top of the thermostat is not straight with the rest of the product. Even if I have the level even, and the LCD screen is straight, the logo is off. What crappy QA!
title: Nest logo offset

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Robert Coultas
content: Just installed our new Nest thermostat last week. We have been very happy with the ease of use and with the results so far. There was a small learning curve in using the dial of the Best thermostat to enter all the set up. Though it didn't take too long after we got the hang of it. Replacing it though was easy. Very good instructions in how to take off the old thermostat & how to hook the wires up correctly. Remember to scan the bar code that is on the backside of the thermostat itself. Not the barcode that is on the box. It did confuse us at first but after scanning the correct code the rest of the setup was very easy. We installed the nest app on our computer & on our cell phones. We also paired it to our Amazon echo dot & use the Alexa voice feature to set the temperate as needed.  I would 100% recommend the Nest thermostat. Great product for a great price.
title: We have been very happy with the ease of use and with the results ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lonnie W
