product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ecologist
content: I have installed many devices like this over the years, but none have been so incredibly well thought out in terms of installation, instructions, and more.  The apps can be a bit confusing (I find them poorly organized and not clear at times) but I have installed internet cameras, radios, thermostats, irrigation systems, switches, ice dam breakers, and have been doing so since 2003.  This is by far the best.  I wish other devices were as well designed.
title: Beautifully designed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: C. Gregory
content: I love being able to change the temps and turn on the fan without getting out of bed or off the couch! Possible rebates are listed on Nest's website, just add it to the cart there.  It saved me $100 bucks off the price through my utility company.
title: Cold in the middle of the night?  Change the temps without getting out of bed!  Rebates listed at nest site.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: BKC
content: The WIFI part of it went out first and then no matter how you adjusted the settings it tried running the fan for hours. Give me an old school thermostat any day over this again.
title: Wouldn’t buy again!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dr. Z
content: I know it is expensive but for me it is worth it.  Not only is it just plain cool but my schedule is so erratic that its ability to sense whether I am home or not and shut off the heat is actually saving me money enough to make it worth it. The other 2 features I use is its ability to have the house warm by a certain time instead of go on by a certain time & the ability to control it from your phone to have the house all warmed up before I get home.
title: I love it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Orlando L.Carnet
content: Thermostat is working ok. Only one concern I set thermostat at 72 degrees and in the morning it sets to71.  I loose 1 degree every night.  Do not know why. I have to reach out to nest. I only gave Two stars due to this problem.
title: Easy to set up.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: cgam
content: Be aware!  I'm sure this product performs well however - This does not work with Lenox heating and air units!  It would have been helpful to know before we purchased.  We tried for several weeks, googling and visiting several forums and finally paid our HVAC guy to come out and wire it up.  Check first if it works with your unit.  The newer Lenox HVAC units will evidently only use a proprietary Lenox touch pad thermostat - to the tune of about $1000.00.
title: DOES NOT WORK WITH LENOX HVAC UNITS!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: braden marks
content: Wanted to love this item. Everything functions so smoothly and the screen design is nice. Once I got if hooked up, I noticed it was connected to my WiFi, had a good battery charge from my c wire. When the screen would go black or sleep, my app would say the nest was offline. If I walked up to it the app would then say online again. The nest on app would go offline and online every couple minutes. Spent several hours with nest support and all they could come up with was my router is the cause of the connection issue. Well I have phones, security cameras, doorbells, front door lock, TV's, echo's all connected and 0 issues. I have the gigabyte wifi internet. Just installed an ecobee and 0 issues with my WiFi....
title: Wanted to love this item

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: mike catherincchia
content: The. Coldest day of the year ...it failed....I had to put on my old thermostat to save from freezing and damage .  I received a replacement in a timely fashion but I'm not going back to it to try until spring when it is safe
title: The. Coldest day of the year... ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: TB32
content: Easy to install as long as your previous system is 24v.  I would recommend checking before you order using the online Nest compatibility checker.  Checker will have you input existing connections and then tell you if Nest will work for your system. Also, if Nest thermostat doesn't power up when you apply power, I would recommend using online troubleshooting matrix.  My system's common wire (C) didn't have any voltage coming across and was causing Nest not to power up.  Troubleshooting matrix had me remove it and thermostat powered up fine. Thermostat takes about 30 days to learn your habits.  I will provide update then.
title: Easy to DIY install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Computer Sage
content: I bought this because I didn't think that my LUX one was working too well. I was right! The LUX was about 3 degrees higher that it really was!  I like that I can let Nest do its thing or make it follow what I what.  I use my phone and walk up and turn it to adjust or say AWAY.  It emails me how many leafs I get and I have a lot! I even noticed a little saving on my electric bill so far. Updates itself, it likes 5G wireless!  Cant say enough good things about this! Get yours today!! Save $ and know that NEST is there to help you.
title: Loving NEST!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Glenn
content: Wish it displayed the current room temp instead of displaying the “set” temperature.
title: No current room temp

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Beccah
content: Great product overall! Can set the nest from your smartphone and easily change the temperature even when away from home. Perfect for people on the go or simply to have the convenience of upgraded technology. Nest product also gives feedback on usage and recommendations on where to move your thermostat based on the usage report. Perfect for any household.
title: Highly Recommended Great Product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: D. Little
content: I've found that the Home/Away assist feature is not reliable. After a chat and call with tech support I gather that various features potentially conflict with one another: auto scheduling with home/away assist and geofencing with motion sensing. The only way to ensure that Nest goes into eco mode and stays in eco mode while you're gone is to set it manually. I was also told that the app must be open in the background for Nest to use the phone's location. I found more tech support inspired theories on Reddit, such as that it works best with only one phone.
title: Home/away assist frustration

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: OCD_1
content: I will never go without a nest thermostat again. This one was a gift for my mom. I have two of them in my house and they really do learn your habits and saves you money. I love that you can control it from ANYWHERE
title: Amazing. Definitely recommend

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ami
content: I wanted a new wifi thermostat so I tried the Nest.  It was really easy to install.  It is still learning and I have to give it a chance to learn my schedule. The first day I installed it, the weather was beautiful 80 degrees with a nice breeze, the next day it was raining and cold.  The thermostat turned itself down after a short period of time .. I had to turn it up most of the day.  Now it has been raining 3 days the thermostat is happy at 70 degrees. :)
title: getting to know it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Katie Wargel
content: I loved this product for the first few months. Easy install, easy to use, and liked the app.  In less than 6 months the devices battery would not hold a charge.  Shortly after that, the device would no longer connect to wifi.  We had a professional HVAC company come out to inspect the nest and our system.  The HVAC guy informed us that Nests are very popular, but he sees these and many other issues with them often.  Now having issues with Nest/Google getting a replacement.  $250 later, and switching to Honeywell!
title: Not worth it...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Anthony Suchman
content: Works fine for its primary task -- controlling temperature remotely. But there are a couple of annoying features. When the screen has gone into sleep mode, it wakes up to nearby motion, but shows the time rather than the actual temperature or temperature settings, which would be more useful. (I don't need another clock...). You have to physically manipulate the Nest thermostat to get to the actual temperature and current setting.  And, inexplicably, it lacks temperature alarms. I would like to be notified if the indoor temperature drops too low, indicating a heating system failure while I'm away.
title: Works reliably but the design still needs tweaking

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Isa
content: **Update: Put up with this expensive paperweight for about a year now just to see if I could make due with it. It's still absolute garbage. My energy bill has nearly doubled because it never actually turns off, and for some reason - even when you turn it off, decides to continue going. Good luck adjusting your home temperature, as it will likely re adjust itself even when all of it's "smart learning" settings are completely off. Their software is a nightmare, and for the price point this things a joke. a $100 rebate isn't going to be much help with the extra 600+ it's probably already cost me this year in utility bills. Nest is the purest form of trash ever put into a smart device. It seems really cool and convenient at first. Until you can't get the stupid thing to shut off and it's getting cold as ice in your house. Or perhaps when it turns itself on randomly even though you've turned off all the auto settings? Or maybe the most frustrating thing is that you can set the temperature, and within 30 seconds, it'll decide to change itself to another temperature. OR better yet, you set it to heat only, and it decides it's going to remain on cooling till the end of time. Do yourself a favor, get another device. Amazon also staggers reviews on this device so it can't get the ratings it deserves. A 1. If it had a 0, it would get that.
title: Hot Garbage and Dumpster fire had a baby. That's nest.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Allen Dobereiner
content: Wow this looks amazing on the wall. It was very easy to install and works great. It will learn you patterns and change the temp for you. It lowered our electric bill the first month of use and I think it will pay for itself in a few months. Great buy!
title: Looks great and easy to install and use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: NP
content: very easy hook up; looks beautiful and modern; love how it automatically lights up and tell you the temperature when you walk near it.  Easy to adjust temperature and nice to see outside temp; App for iphone/ipad not the best, but happy with product and would buy again.
title: cool modern thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Austin Jensen
content: Once I got used to it having to learn my schedule ito works great. Installed it in under 30 minutes. The instructions were very clear and didn't make you feel like you need to be an electric and or HVAC technician to figure it out. My only complaint is the Auto Away doesn't always seem to pick up that we are actually away. Sometimes I check on the app and it shows that it thinks I am still home.  I like that it tells me when I am saving energy. That's a huge plus in a 90 year old home. There's room for a lot of wasted heating in the winter
title: Really enjoy my Nest

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lisa Reyes
content: I wondered how the machine was going to figure out the different temperatures in each room and neutralize them when they're off temperature it doesn't work to keep up the whole house everywhere even though it's not cold in their rooms otherwise it's perfect
title: Confirmed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Owen A. Borwn
content: I do not use the Alexa integration that said this is awesome. It's already paid for itself based on the amount of money I've saved since I stalled it in November. Being able to adjust the temp when I'm away is a huge plus.
title: Money well spent

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kari Edwards
content: I'm horrible with anything electrical, so I had a professional install it.  The "find a professional" portion of the Nest website led me to a company that doesn't service the entire state I live in, so that was strange.  Their second choice worked out well, however.  The faceplate thing they include to cover a hole in your wall is hideous, and reminds me of a cheap Apple design.  But as for the product...  AWESOME.  I'm so incredibly happy with it, and it was worth the price paid by far.  I love the remote access, because if I'm leaving work a little earlier than the schedule (or learned schedule) would normally turn the heat on, I can get it going so that I still come home to a warm house.  The Auto-Away feature works really well.  The only programming request I have is a one-click (or at least much easier) "vacation" mode.  When I went on vacation recently, I ended up having to completely clear the schedule I had programmed so that the thermostat would stay set to 50 for 24/7.  The Auto-Away feature, in this case, wouldn't cut it, because I knew there would be people "dropping in" while I was gone to bring in the mail, and I didn't want the Auto-Away feature to turn off and waste energy heating the house until it realized again that no one was there.  So, in short, give me an easy one-fell-swoop way to set this.
title: Well worth the money

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sechy
content: The Nest Thermostat is one of the best purchases I've ever made.  A month after it was installed in a vacation rental in Colorado, I received a text, in the early morning, there was a problem with the furnace and temperature was 38 degrees INSIDE the house.  We called a heating repair company and the gas company immediately and luckily the pipes had not frozen and/or burst yet.  The Nest Thermostat saved us thousands of dollars in potential repairs, damage and lost business.  This thermostat is wonderful!
title: Amazing thermostat and it saved us thousands of dollars in potential damage to a vacation rental.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Overall Impression
content: This is a perfectly engineered and thought-out product.  From installation to superior functionality and design.  I can control from afar and control temp before I get home.  FYI, I chose not to use the automatic away functions since I like the manual control better without the required location tracking.
title: Would give TEN STARS if I could

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James A. Vermilyea
content: Easy to install. Nice to be able to control remotely.  I’m not sure how you can really be sure that it saves money. I have two, one at home and one at the office. It’s great to be able to change the thermostat if you forget to lower it (mostly see if it forgets to lower itself.)
title: Nice to be able to control remotely. Looks great. Easy to use.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lawrence
content: Great smart thermostat.  Very easy to use and nice to be able to see your house temperature from away from home.  Got this on ridiculous sale for Black Friday at $139.  Great purchase.
title: Gold standard for smart thermostats

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sarah Lantz
content: Please note that Nest can control a humidifier, but it CANNOT automatically adjust humidity levels as it should. This can result in frost on the inside of your windows and inside your walls. Possible effects include water damage to your home's structure and mold. It's good at its other functions and simple to setup. But if you have cold weather and a humidifier you need to be aware of this limitation. I don't feel this information is adequately portrayed in the product description.
title: Not good for humidifier control

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: TB12FAN
content: Despite the manufacturers website telling me otherwise, this product was not compatible with my system. Even went so far as to have both an electrician and HVAC company attempt to install. No luck. Very frustrating.
title: Disappointed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rob
content: Super easy installation and works without the “C” wire.  The online wire compatibility checker said to contact support which I thought odd since I had the basic wires except for the “C” wire. Maybe they want you to contact them to verify before purchase. After reading the support instructions online it does state that it does support systems with the RH, RC and C wires so as long as you have one of those you should be good. And it does work with Alexa!
title: Work without the “C” wire!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gurinder Sekhon
content: I'm loving the Nest. It allows me to turn on the A/C about an hour before I come home, which makes the house nice and cool when I get back. It also saves me when there are times that I forget to turn it off when I go out to work. Installation was easy. I ran into an issue where the Nest wouldn't turn on after I connected all the wires. I went to the nest website to troubleshoot and found the solution pretty quickly. My issue revolved around the "C" (Blue) wire not carrying a charge. They suggested that I disconnect it as it isn't necessary most of the time. I did and it worked flawlessly afterwards. In total I spent about 20 minutes installing the Nest and found it to be easy and the instructions were well written. This is the first thermostat I've ever installed as well. It also looks phenomenal.
title: Beautiful, easy to install, and great energy saver.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mikhail Lazarev
content: It has probably only half of the features of the thermostat you can get at Home Deport for 29 bucks, other than the ability to control it remotely. Mine is no longer able to be controlled remotely for and that is gone. Google doesn't have a tech support line. It has a chat line to chat with a bot. This product is an overhipped trash
title: LOOKS COOL. THAT IS IT. BAD THERMOSTAT POORLY BUILT

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tt
content: Bought this fancy therm for my husband. Best purchase! Our old therm used to run and run...this sets the temp just right...and remote control via phone is amazing when we go on spontaneous trips or what have you. The copper look is so beautiful! Love it!
title: Works beautifully

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ecu_reviews
content: If I can install this... Anyone can! So, when I first bought thing, I was nervous about getting it installed. I had an electrician lined up (even thought they wanted an arm and a leg to install it)... Well, I am not a patient person, so I decided to take my Nest out of the box and see if I could figure this whole installation thing out... OMG, EASY PEASY!!!!! I turned off my system at the breaker box, took off the face of the old thermostat, took a picture of the wires and continued to disassemble. OK, I was 1/3 of the way there - yay me! I start to unpack the Nest from the box and look at all the parts and felt confident I could do this. I have the instructions out and was following them step by step. The only time I had to go to The Google was when it came to hooking up the wires... I have no problem with the Red, Green or White... Yellow confused me, but The Google came through and explained that if I didn't have a multi-zoned system I needed to use Y1. All hooked up, face of my pretty, shiny, perfect Nest was on! Woohoo! Back to the breaker box, turn on my HVAC system and low and behold my perfect Nest was practically smiling at me! I followed the prompts on the screen - tentatively at first because I was worried she was fragile - and step by step I became more comfortable using the device. Even better than a pretty face - SHE WORKS! I set my temperature and BINGO, fan and heat kicked on! I was so excited, I called my neighbors over to come and see my handy work and called the guy I was seeing at the time to tell him that he was in fact incorrect - I didn't need a man to install and set this up for me (we're not talking anymore, btw)... Any questions I had, I went to the Nest twitter page, asked my questions via DM, and the replies have been prompt and polite. My questions have been answered satisfactorily and I was able to keep truckin'. Now, she knows when I am home, and syncs with my life - My Nest has given me one less thing to worry about... I can crawl into bed and set the temperature where I want it and be comfortable. Full disclosure, I had a digital programmable thermostat before. What I like most about my Nest is being able to have more control over my energy bill: I'm at work and I decide to meet the girls for a drink. The heat isn't running waiting for me to come home. Instead, when I get in the car (I work about 15 minutes from home), I open the app, set the temperature and when I get home the house feels cozy! If I stay up late and don't want the temperature to drop before I hit the sack, I can set it when I crawl into bed... Sleeping in late, when I get up, I open the app, set the temperature and in 10 minutes, I can hop out of bed and not freeze! She's learning how I live and makes adjustments based on my "schedule" and she knows based on my iPhone's location services if I have left the house for a quick minute, am running errands in the hood or am just going out to gossip with neighbors or if I am out of town... She doesn't turn on the heat or AC just because the house sitter came in to feed the manimals. I love seeing the hours (actual amount of time) that I am using the heat (or AC). When my HVAC guys came the other day for a plumbing issue (completely unrelated to my Nest) they took one look at her and couldn't stop telling me how "sleek" she looks and asking questions... Apparently the guy they had at their company to install smart devices had a very hard time installing them and explaining to residents how to use them... I was shocked! I couldn't speak for other devices - but told them that if I could install the Nest a trained professional should have no problem! They offered me a job - LOL. I can't say enough good things about my Nest. She's perfect. If she were a dude, I'd seriously try to find him on Bumble... ;)
title: My Nest is better than true love!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: H. Bell
content: First of all we bought the Nest Thermostat in August 2017 knowing that we would be replacing our  HVAC system in January 2018. During my investigating I was lead to believe the Nest Thermostat was compatible with 1, 2 & 3 stage & variable speed systems. It even says so on the outside of the box. I installed it on our old 1 stage system which it works as expected. We recently purchased a new Lennox variable speed HVAC system and guess what, the Nest is not compatible. The box really does say it's compatible, after answering website questions it should work, but low and behold the paper work inside the box says NO, NOT COMPATIBLE. I now have a $250 paper weight.
title: Buyer be ware!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jason zeimes
content: The app doesn't work very well. The home/away feature works intermittently. I have my settings set to allow the app to run in the background etc. Still just randomly doesn't recognize when we've left the house. Also when you occasionally set the temp up or down a degree to suit the moment, it saves it. Then that same time the following week it will mimic your adjustment. Making you enter the app and erase the "schedule" you set with your one time adjustment. Not worth the money. Imo.
title: Not really worth the money

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Karen S
content: Updated 6/20/16:  With the recent update of Farsight, letting you adjust the view and display current temp, This is working great and fitting the needs of both functionality and active management of the temps.  The ability to cool the house ahead of time when returning from a long weekend away is worth the price of admission. The colors and size of the display are a bit overwhelming in a small room/house.  I had to turn the display down to low to make it tolerable.  Very easy setup and configuration.  Once I ran the new thermostat wire, setup took less than 15 minutes.
title: Very easy setup and configuration

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andrew S. Pegram
content: If you are on the fence about buying one than this review is for you! I have wanted one for a couple years and finally got one. It has been in my house now for 6 months and it saved me money on my bills plus it is amazing to control the temp of your house. Save yourself money and buy now!
title: Wow

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: adam w
content: Looking for a smart thermostat I found a few options. I opted for the nest as I have a simple heating system with just two wires, red and white. The nest won me over as I didn’t need to run an additional 24v C wire to set it up. I installed it within minutes and it’s been a breeze to use both on the device itself and using the app. I recommend it to anyone looking for a smart thermostat!
title: Easy to set up and compatible with older systems

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jason Lavitt
content: What they do not tell you is that if your house is more than 10 years old the Nest thermostats probably will not work without rewiring your system.  I am now in a cold house a day after installing two Nests that did not communicate with my system.  Two electricians have told us that they will not work.  So we re-hooked up the old thermostats, and they are now not working either.  So DO NOT buy this product if you have a home older than 10 years, unless you consult your HVAC guy.
title: DOES NOT WORK WITH OLDER HOMES!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: SoBe
content: Love it - great for turning on heat before getting home. It also recognizes when you aren't home, so helps you become more efficient in your power usage. Plus you should be able to claim around $150 in rebates from electric and gas companies, depending on your provider.
title: Love it - great for turning on heat before getting ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: LGSnow
content: Easy set up.  Supprt is awesome.  Features are cool... or hot (depending on the temperature).  I can turn it on before going home, I can see from anywhere if it's on, I can tell Alexa to turn it up or down.  My wife likes that there's not a bunch of buttons to learn just to adjust it.  Easy as the volume control on her car radio.  So far, so good.  I've only had it abou 2 months, so we'll see how well it holds up.
title: Very Nice

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lisa Sorrells
content: Purchased for my mom that could no longer see well enough to read or set the thermostat.  Connected to Alexa and is a God send!
title: Works great!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: K-Gardner
content: I really like the nest, however I wish it would know the difference between away and asleep, having the Nest protect smoke detectors helps alittle but it gets cold here at night in Michigan, but besides that Its great I really notice the savings in my heating costs.  I did have(Ok Didn't have to but why not the wire is was cheap) to run new thermostat wire because I wanted to use the C-wire and I also wanted to take real advantage of my dual stage furnace.  much better than my old programmable thermostat
title: Still not Completely there yet! but I still love it..

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: johnathan hinesley
content: The thermostat works well with my oil-based system keeps the temperature consistent throughout the different sections of the house. The learning part of the thermostat needs to run for a couple of months to learn patterns in the home. I have two of the thermostats connected and did not use a C-Wire to complete the installation.
title: Works as advertised

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: CJ in Atlanta
content: this is a great Thermostat. Get one for sure. Unfortunately the one that was sent to me could not be installed because the battery that comes with it was not charged or had lost its charge. After spending some time with NEST tech support, these guys sent me a new one Next Day Delivery, then it was an easy install after that.  NEST Tech Support ROCKS!  Bad apples are in every barrel. No worries with great support to back up any problem here.  Feel like I made a great purchase of 3rd Gen NEST for sure.
title: this is a great Thermostat. Get one for sure

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Douglas Wallace
content: It is AWESOME. I regret not having bought it earlier. It is very easy to install. Just follow the instruction and tools provided. It took me less than 30 minutes to do it. It is easy to setup and work beautifully. After 10 years thanks to NEST I found out that I have heater on my A/C unit. Now my place has a comfortable temperature w/o waste.
title: Awesome to manage your A/C. Easy to install.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kourtney
content: I love the no guessing at what the temperature is anymore. This has lowered our bill and has some great features. I love that I can set it lower during the day and when I get home it’s alresdy heating up. Great for those that live in cold climates, I can’t wait to see how this works during the summer. So far very happy with one r purchase!
title: Love

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jacob
content: I could not believe the things it can do. I can change the temperature when I'm not home, it learns my schedule and auto controls to save me energy. Very east to install. Took about 5 min. When I say anyone can do it I mean ANYONE! Very user friendly and looks great! Very durable also
title: Amazing!!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: B. G.
content: If you own a home this is a must have.  I installed this about a week after I moved into my house.  Because of my location I was told my bills would probably be in the 400-600 dollar a month range.  I have yet to see a bill even half of that with the use of my Nest.  I am unsure of my savings, but in comparison to others, my bills are definitely lower.  In case you were wondering, I DO use my heat and a/c and like to have a comfortable house.
title: GET THIS!  The rumors are true about the Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: whin77
content: Great product! Easy to install, easy to set up and easy to use. Asthetically, it looks really nice in the wall (have it in the hallway). It doesn't stick out and out of place. Very modern looking and should be for a long time. Using the app is a breeze. Really straight forward. It learns your habits. And you can change it if you like as well.  Connecting other nest products (protect) is easy too. Customer support was excellent (online chat). Had some concerns and questions prior to purchase regarding set up as I had a very old furnace. Agent was easy to speak to and very helpful. So helpful that it made me decide on this product over the Ecobee.
title: Easy set up!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Robert Bravo
content: My Nest disconnects from my router all the time and is within 20 feet. Now it doesn’t see any WiFi to connect to. Tech support non existent...
title: Don’t buy

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Band Mom
content: Love being able to control the temperature from my phone. So nice if I wake up too cold or too warm I don't even have to get out of bed to change the temperature. Our daughter likes it much cooler than we do. She turns it cooler when she gets up getting ready for work in the morning. Then when she leaves I always turned it down so not so cool. Now the Nest knows that and after she leaves it turns itself up so I don't have to. Now I don't wake up too cold in the mornings.
title: Learning Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: dalton flory
content: I love this thermostat. The greatest feature is being able to control the temperature of our house anywhere we are as well as while inside the house.  The installation of the thermostat was very simple and well guided by Nest. They even have a video on their website instructing on how to install.  After a few weeks the thermostat will keep your house at a comfortable level that uses an average of temperatures you have set.  Overall satisfied with the Nest Learning Thermostat and the performance.
title: Perfect Learning

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Memphis GG
content: When it connects and works, it's great. However, these thermostat (we have six) work sporadically. We had to have one replaced per Nest support. The replacement worked great for about six months. Now it won't connect, and of course this happens when you are half way across the country. Restarted my router remotely; now neither thermostat is connecting, nor is camera connecting. Lovely! Needs a lot of improvement; I get so tired of calling support and troubleshooting their equipment!!!!!!!!!! while wasting my time. Update: the restart problem above had to do with our Ooma Telo, not the thermostats. The real problem with these is the schedule you set up. We returned from a trip today and the temperature outside was in the low 40's and in 20's last night, but the termperature inside was in the low 50's despite a Nest schedule which specified they should be set to 60. Took hours to get the radiant heat back up to warm the house! Checked the schedule and it was totally different from what I had set up. Temperatures of 51 degrees had been entered on several days in the middle of my original schedule. The power had gone off, so I don't know if that did anything to the schedule, but we have a generator that seconds later turned the power on if it was in fact anything other than a surge or momentary power loss. We have to have reliable heat in Maine in the winter; now I'll have to check the Nest schedule daily to make sure it hasn't changed itself. This is unacceptable!!!
title: Unfortunately, not ready for prime time due to software!!!!!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JZ
content: I just bought a home and I bought and installed my Nest to control the Central AC in my house. I like the app and how I can put my girlfriend as a 2ndary account. Note: Buy mollies!  You're going to be screwing this into dry wall and mollies will keep the dry wall screws from falling out.  I've had this happen to my 1st Nest and I've used mollies on my other 4.
title: A Great Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Patrick Puckett
content: I bought my Nest thermostat on Cyber Monday, 2015. Between Amazon's specials and the rebates my utility company offered, I got a great deal. Nest's website is full of great information that can help you find if your utility company is offering you a rebate for purchasing a smart thermostat, and they even have a great tool that helps you figure out if the system works in your home. This winter has been a lot warmer than last in Chicago, so the jury is still out whether or not we're saving any money. We travel home for the weekend occasionally, though, and it's great to have a product where you can check the temperature of your home and trigger your system to come in from wherever you have an internet connection.
title: Great product; provides peace of mind while you're away

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tiffany Jack
content: Stopped holding a charge after 5 months. Amazon won't do anything to help.
title: One Star

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Brandon and Sarah Gill
content: Product will not hold charge. I have tested another Nest to prove the specific device was the problem. Went through 3 hours of tests on the phone, then multiple days of service emails. False promises and non-responsiveness. No solution. The product is okay when functional , but the company support makes it not worth the purchase. There are many examples of this online. Strong recommendation not to buy from Nest.
title: Bad Battery, Not Replaced, Bad Customer Service

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rick Duncan
content: Man oh Man.  My daughter has an earlier version of this in her house and they love it.  I had an old Mercury Switch in mine and I had no idea what the temp was until I installed this NEST product.  Great pre ordering instructions to ensure your furnace works with this product.  Was easy to install and connect to my network.  Piece of cake.
title: NEST Install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Fernando
content: I chatted with Nest tech support and after asking me to recharge it over and over again they said "Yes, it might be a faulty unit because the display is not even turning on when connected to USB cable" (on my computer). "As you have purchased in third party it might be faulty, so I would request you return to Amazon and get a new one from our store."
title: Display doesn't work

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Elizabeth
content: Just installed my Nest two days ago, so I can't give a full review, but so far so good.  It was relatively easy to install and is working fine, I set it up myself in less than 30(probably more like 15) minutes.  It is still in the learning phase, but I can't wait to see it develop a schedule for my house without the endless button pushing required to program my last thermostat. We gave up on the old one and just turned the heat/AC up and down as needed.  We often forgot to adjust when we left the house, so we are hoping to save some money with Nest.
title: but so far so good. It was relatively easy to install and is ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: OCD
content: Love it! Works as advertised. Would love to see more IFTTT options. Would like to run attic fan only when outside air cooler than attic air and control economizer outside air damper. Remote sensors are only rated for 104F, my attic and outside air gets much hotter, and no one can tell me if they provide IFTTT trigger functions.
title: Would get a 5* with described functions

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gadgeteer
content: Took me a year to finally get around to installing it and it was so easy to install and configure. I will have to wait for the summer to really tell if it is intelligently controlling my HVAC for energy savings. Other than that, love the customization of your temperatures, scheduling and ability to control remotely via a computer or a smartphone app. Looks great on the wall and it is very well built.
title: One fine thermostat!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Cretella
content: Tech support walked me through the wiring issue I was having and it’s been working great ever since.  Very stylish and works awesome.  I’ve since bought the nest door lock too which is just as slick.
title: Awesome technology for the money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Arizona Sunshine
content: I have to say that this was so easy to install.  The only issue I had was that I flipped off the breakers for the A/C units but I forgot to flip off the breakers for the air handlers which caused me to blow fuses.  So I had to replace those blown fuses, after that I was able to easily walk through the set up.  My advice make sure you flip off all the correct breakers and set up will take 30 minutes.  I just love these thermostats so easy to use, you can not go wrong!
title: I have to say that this was so easy to install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mark Rosenthal
content: I like being able to control the temperature from anywhere. Even when Im not home. I think it has also lowered my power bill. It also keeps track of how long your system is running everyday.
title: This makes my life so much easier.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tobiath
content: The Nest experience has been great from the start. Their compatibility app/website was super easy and very informative. Their directions for installation were clear and easy. The Thermostat itself couldn't be any easier to use. It looks great and is obviously on a higher level than the competition when comparing them side by side at the local Home Depot. The Nest app is great. No glitches yet! The compatibility with Amazon's Alexa is another great feature.
title: Very surprised by the ease of use.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Flyboyyy
content: I replaced an older generation Nest with this 3rd generation - wow is it great!  The app finally seems about as bug free as they get, the interface is even cleaner and overall it's just better.  No reason for a lengthy review...do yourself a favor and buy one of these - you won't regret it. Lots of competitors in the marketplace compare themselves to a Nest...why...because it set the bar!
title: Lot's of competitors, still they are no Nest!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Erin
content: This was so easy to install and the instructions were so good that my mother was able to install it on her own in no time flat. It's easy to operate too. I'm a huge fan.
title: Easy to install

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: bettylou
content: Arrived earlier than expected. Both nest thermostats are still under warranty ( a problem the tech said is common buying from amazon). Install had a couple of hiccups. We bought nest because their customer service has always been awesome. This time we had to contact them twice. The first time they guy just kept repeating what my husband said. Hours wasted. The second guy was awesome and helped us figure out where the problems were. Both are working great now.
title: Good Product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Leonard S. Woody III
content: For $300, the thermostat should work for at least 10 years. Broke after 4!!! Not durable. My AC technician put in a Honeywell and it worked fine. He said they see a lot of problems with the Nest thermostat and therefore do not give a warranty on them. :(
title: Broke after 4 years!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JavaDragon
content: Easy to install.  Took me just minutes.  Setting this up in the Nest phone app was a cinch too.  It is going through the learning process right now and is already alerting me when I am being economical with my settings.  The home/away feature is helping me to save some money too.  I would have to try out one of the other touch screen/phone enabled thermostats to see if the extra cost is really getting you that much more.
title: Great upgrade from my previous thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S. Belton
content: Many of the reviews speak to how awesome the Nest Thermostat is, however what really sets this apart is the support I received from Nest during installation.  I live in an older house and was replacing a 1950's thermostat with the Nest.  There were some issues with my home's wiring which Nest was able to easily correct at no additional expense to me.  If you've used the Nest compatibility checker and it says the Nest is compatible, it seems like Nest will stand by that 100% and do whatever it takes to ensure your thermostat works perfectly.
title: Nest's customer service really sets them apart

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Modern Style
content: Update: I wanted to edit this review. I attempted one last time to contact Nest customer service and I was routed to a tech support, BECCA was extremely helpful and walked me through all possibilities as to why my thermostat was not connecting to my WiFi. After several attempts she had arranged to send me a new thermostat. She was extremely imformative and explained to me that it may be an issue with the WiFi chip. Since my system was under warranty she shipped a new one and all is well. The first rep I had spoken to obviously was not into customer satisfaction. People like Becca are an asset to the continuing success of a company. The customer service for Nest products is the worst! I purchased this via Amazon and had it installed through Amazon’s professional installation. Worked great for about 8 months or so. Then all of a sudden the thermostat stoped connecting to the WiFi network. And kept going on when it shouldn’t , I followed all the normal troubleshooting advice to no avail. I finally caved and called nest to get further help. A representative came on line and was obviously distracted and was speaking in the background to someone else and then kept asking me to repeat myself. She then said she would connect me to someone who can assist me but wanted my first and last name which I attempted to give and she kept saying repeat that please. After 4 attempts I asked her to just connect my call which she refused to do and she hung up. I waited for almost 20 minutes.  Never got I call back.
title: Customer service representative went above and beyond

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: renata
content: Purchased this newt in March, we installed it same month. June 15th the nest stopped the working, it asked for to be charged. We tried to charge it for few days then called the a/c company. They couldn’t fix it so we had installed  our original simple ac box. Both installations cost $190. We are $380 plus the cost of the nest in minus. This was very expensive experience!! DON’T buy this product.
title: Broke in 4months. Don’t waste your money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: SRT
content: Another great example of how technology is changing our lives.  This device is stellar. Easy to install, easy to use...very intuitive.  The phone app was equally easy to install and use and it truly convenient.  My wife is on the app too and loves it.  No more "oops"I left the A/C on; in So Cal that can be a very expensive mistake. I was out of the house, called my wife, used the Nest Android App and lowered the temp which engaged the A/C unit, my wife confirmed that the A/C turned on in under 2 seconds - extraordinary.  The look is terrific.  This is the way I see home automation going and Nest is certainly riding that wave, they did it right and first. Good for them.
title: Nest  nailed  it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ryan Checketts
content: Love it!  Just installed this in replace of a much much older thermostat. This thing is amazing! Love being able to set a schedule and have it adjusted automatically. Love being able to control from my phone pretty much anywhere I am. This is 100% worth the investment.
title: It just feels cool

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Stef
content: I’ve had this product nearly two months and it stopped connecting to any Wi-Fi signal after the return window closed with amazon.  So frustrating  it stopped connecting 10 days after the window.  My neat I’ve had for 6 months and bought from Costco has no issues connecting to Wi-Fi.  This one will not pick up any signal!  It worked great previously.
title: No longer connects to Wi-Fi

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Archana
content: If you don’t know if Nest is compatible with the wiring don’t buy it. I have spent all weekend fixing and it keeps losing charge and has to be taken out to charge and immediately drains charge. It has been awful. Update May 2020: we paid a Nest Pro to come and fix the issue and worked until yesterday and again have issues with the power wire. I’m so done and Google support says it is too late to return it and they won’t send a replacement. Money down the drain
title: Don’t buy it!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Scott Osborne
content: So far, so awesome. Love it. Debated this or ecobee and end up only going this one as local utility company has energy credit program with NEST right now. I'm guessing they are fairly similar.  I was leaning ecobee before the energy credit deal came along. But just having one in general and moving from old thermostat is awesome.
title: so awesome. Love it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S. Demirjian
content: The unit has a very modern look about it along with modern tech - can be set up at the unit, via cell or via computer using wi fi. It replaced an older Honeywell unit.  Even though I have it set to the same temperature, the heat cycles on and off much less than with the older unit.  The cost of heating is much lower than with the unit it replaced.  This thing will pay for itself in one season from what I am experiencing.
title: The unit has a very modern look about it along ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: james
content: I rarely give 5 stars for anything (like, never) but this is a great looking and, more importantly, great working thermostat. I love it! I generally make adjustments using Alexa voice commands but using the app is simple too. Or just walking up to it and making adjustments by hand isn't difficult either. Installation was a breeze with no special skills needed due to the very informative, easy to follow instructions. I had no need to waste my money on 'professional' installation.
title: Easy to install, joy to use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Christopher
content: It looks very sharp on the wall and is easy to use.  I have the app on my IPhone and I've connected it to my Amazon Echo.  It's nice to be able to just say "set hallway temperature to 72" to my Echo and have it happen just like that.  An installation back plate is included as well which is good because my old thermostat was covering up a pretty large hole in the dry wall.  They included self tapping screws that make it easy to install into the dry wall.
title: It looks very sharp on the wall and is easy to use

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jaida Tong
content: So I got this from sunny deals. Which must be a 3rd party seller for this product. But I revived it and the screen wouldn’t even power on, and they send stripped out screws. Someone else must have returned this and they didn’t even check to see if it worked properly. Very disappointed because this was a house warming gift to someone and they where really looking forward to it.
title: Bad 3rd party seller

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jamie D.
content: Worth the money spend! I installed it myself and switched up some wires not realizing what I did until it was time for the A/C to kick in and it only blew out hot air. Make sure to test the system before complete installation.
title: Good Deal

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Brad W.
content: Well documented problems about power cycling.  Heater turns off every 15 minutes. Nest says it’s the heater. But heater repair company claims it’s only the Nest thermostat. .
title: Problem with power cycling.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: karly jeanty
content: I had thermostat installed by professional lasted 3 months, and now  the Thermostat will not connect wifi and will only power up for 2 minutes. Of course seller say's its not their issue contact Nest.
title: I had thermostat installed by professional lasted 3 months, ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: M
content: I finally have this thermostat up and running, but it wasn't an easy process and I had to send the unit back to Nest for a replacement.  Their customer service, although ultimately responsive, is inefficient and enraging.  In retrospect I wish I bought a cheaper unit from another provider, especially one that wouldn't share my information with Google.  For something this expensive, the experience should be easier.
title: but it wasn't an easy process and I had to send the unit back ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Margarita  Rodriguez
content: I used to Love this product, When I bought it back in July of this year.  On this month I has to returned it today, because stopped working,  and not only that, they will refund $171.98 and I paid $214.98, and when I got to the UPS office they charge me$3.18 because they have to shipped in their own box.  I'm very upset.
title: Used to work perfect. But not anymore only good for 5 month.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: PJ Dogwood
content: I like that this thermostat can be controlled with my phone. If I’m away, I can set my thermostat to the temperature that I prefer and revise for when I return home.
title: Tech Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jason Armstrong
content: This product has the easiest directions, and who ever put the directions together was very smart.  Inside the directions are stickers that you put around your wires so you can match them up.  Very, very simple and I am not an electrical person.  I also added the app pretty easily as well.  Waited to do this review to see it work and it learns your patterns and lets you know when you are saving..........pretty cool.
title: Pretty Cool

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: adam
content: Love these thermostats but bought the 3rd gen for temperature sensor integration. My WiFi signal and connection are fine and the sensors aren't far from the thermostat. For some reason the app shows the sensors having weak or no connectivity. I read online that others are having the same issue. Ugghhh. C'mon Google!!!
title: Not perfect

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Parker Knight
content: It is easy to use and linked to wifi and get weather data from internet. It knows when I am around the house and turns on the furnace or AC  to comfortable temperature indoors.
title: Better over time

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Harry
content: I bought this to replace the thermostat in my apartment which is older and not great at retaining energy. Bottom line up front it's better than  what I had, looks good, and has a generally easy to use UI and app. I wish the app was a little better and the response to my temp changes were faster but not that disappointing. Pros: - Very easy to install - Looks good on the wall - Nice features not included in traditional thermostats such as app control Cons - app isn't the best
title: Overall a good purchase

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shannon Thomas
content: I heard so many great things about his thermostat and I will have to say that I am disappointed.  It really isn't that different from a standard thermostat that you set the time and preferred temperature to.  The only perk I like it the app and being able to change the setting from my phone.
title: Not too impressed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Hare2406
content: We Have been saving about $40/month on the electrical bill, within 3 months, it paid for itself. Installation: My sister and I installed it, it was quite easy for us (we have no electrical experience). We watched a video on YouTube and the one given by nest. And that's all you need. Cones with a manual screw driver.
title: Saved me some money

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: C. Hill
content: I was hoping to be able to take advantage of the power company's incentive program to get a Nest, but the building I live in doesn't work for the program. So I purchased the Nest myself and have already seen a $10 reduction of costs each month. I am certain the unit will pay for itself very soon. I love the app, and it is nice to be able to adjust the temp while on my way home and the unit is in an energy savings mode.
title: Best Nest... worth the money.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dem
content: I've been a Nest fan from the beginning. It's elegant, functional and it saves me money. This is my second Nest and I still have the first one. Both work great but the 3rd gen display is really beautiful; to the point that I'm considering upgrading my 2nd gen. I recommend you take a look at the finishes/colors around the area of your current thermostat and find a Nest and back plate that matches for a perfect blend of form and function.
title: Does what it's supposed to do and looks good doing it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Agnes Karmol
content: Had a problem with the setup . heat worked. cooling would not, called tech support no help. used it during heating season,when cooling season came put  old  Honeywell thermostat back on works better than Nest stat.
title: Save your money this stat is not worth it..

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: David T Hunt
content: The temperature reading is 4 degrees higher than the actual temperature.  I spent a couple hours working with Nest support and was not able to resolve the issue.  Their final recommendation was to disable wifi and wait a few days for the thermostat to calibrate.  I returned the thermostat at this point, a $200 thermostat should be able to read the proper temperature out of the box.  Nest support forums are full of lots of people reporting the same issue, Nest's response has been disappointing.
title: Temperature reading is 4 degrees high

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Theresa Charleston
content: I love this thing, genuinely. It looks clean and modern, took me about 5 mins to install, I LOVE the tracking data and seeing the Eco leaf option to know when I'm being more green, the ability to change temps from another room (laziness at its finest) or when I'm not home, and the interface is just beautiful. Plus I got it for around $100 total bc of my rebate. I'm thrilled and I'm rarely thrilled about technology bc I'm picky.
title: I'm thrilled. I'm rarely thrilled :)

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Anita
content: We love how we can manage our thermostat from our phone when we aren't even at home! It senses when someone walks by and reminds you of the current temperature, easy to work, let's you know when your settings are "eco-friendly"! We had been debating on purchasing the Nest for months now but so happy with our purchase!
title: Great product!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Elman
content: What not to love about this product? Since we all use our cell phones all day long, why not to control the temperature with it? The installation was very easy, it looks great on the wall and feels modern and cool. There is a child lock. The thermostat remembers how you set up the temperature depending on a time of day, and adjusts it automatically. The price may seem high, but I already received $100 rebate from ComEd and expecting another $50 from Nicor.
title: Control temperature from your cell phone. Don't forget rebates.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: It’sAgoodDay
content: I live with people who tend to make adjustments and forget to readjust before leaving the house.  I am able to check/adjust from work.  Love the ability to easily program it. My son is a Software Engineer and was initially concerned about security and he states the software in this product is very secure from tampering per all the research he has done.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rufus
content: I have two Nest thermostats (one 2nd gen, one 3rd gen). Wish I could get the second gen and save a little money but I couldn't find it for sale anywhere so I went with the 3rd gen. This has a little bigger screen, but the 2nd gen seems to work every bit as well as the 3rd. Honestly would have preferred another 2nd gen for less money but this is fine too.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Scott True
content: Honestly, if you're looking for a smart Thermostat, this is it.  If you buy anything else, you've missed out.  I didn't buy this for myself, but rather, my in-laws.  I tested it at my house first.... and I kept it, relax, I bought them another one.  Great product, you won't be disappointed, if you are.. I'll walk you through it.  No, I don't work for Nest, I just admire something that exceeds my expectations.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

I need to get used to setting the daily routine, evenings/mornings, in order for it to learn.  But it's nice to have a unit that will switch between heating and cooling on it's own, old unit (not Nest) had to manually be changed from heating to cooling before it would switch over.  Installation, otherwise, was simple.
title: But it's nice to have a unit that will switch between heating ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

content: Wish I would have gotten this sooner.  Since my house has a room that gets hotter than the others, the feature that can turn on the fan 15 minutes every hour makes the house feel much better with less temperature differences within the house.  I am certain this Nest thermostat will save us more money in a year than what we paid for it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joy Duan
content: Bought 2 units,  one of them stopped connecting to my wifi (showing error code W5)within 6 months.  The period for which the manufacture support is provided is only 3 months.  So the unit is not having software updates nor is it accessible on the app.  Not sure what my options are.  Very disappointed with the quality.
title: unit was defective less than six months of purchase.  Product support is only offered for 3 months.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: captain crunch
content: Installed this about a month ago and love it.  the installation was very easy with the Nest Web site providing personal wiring diagram.  It took 30 min. to remove my old thermostat, install this one and run it thru setup.  All very easy!  Looks great, self programs or you can easily program it to your specific needs. Be sure to check whether your energy company is offering rebates.  I got a $75 rebate on my unit.
title: Installed this about a month ago and love it. the installation was very easy with the ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

I'm looking forward to cooling the house prior to coming home this summer. Installed two of these and have no regrets. Here is my easy install video [...] Update: Looks like we can't link to you tube here. If you go and search for my user name johnny0723, you'll find a NEST video, posted about 4 months ago. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

Considering going back to my old thermostat. :(.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jade

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gregg Atkins
content: As claimed, a very easy install though I had to adjust for the hole of the old Thermostat and pull the wires a bit. But the walk through after the install was very easy. And with the 2nd Nest (upstairs) it was a breeze. One note, I am not the prime account with Amazon and our Alexa, and I created the Nest account and was as default the owner. However to link it to Alexa the owner on the Nest account needs to be the primary account on the Alexa. I am not trying figure out how to change the owner to my wife so we can link the Nest with our Alexa. There is no easy answer on Nest support and at this time of year, their support is very busy both, phone and chat.
title: a very easy install though I had to adjust for the hole ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: AlaButler
content: Highly recommend an HVAC technician to perform installation. Thermostat is very easy to set up and use once you understand the basic mechanics of the device. Especially like the energy saving features. The old programmable thermostat the Nest replaced was basically  like a toggle switch - turn compressor on. turn compressor off - whereas the Nest allows the fan to distribute cool air after running the compressor and learns to compensate for direct sunlight. My next step is to reinforce the attic insulation. Overall, the Nest is a very smart investment.
title: Smart energy saver

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: BobbyTommy
content: I like being able to change the temperature from my smartphone. (I use that feature a lot). I don't use the learning. I just setup a schedule that suits my needs. Pretty expensive because I had to buy two units(my house has two zones).  No way I would buy these if not for the $200 rebate from my utility. Also not sure how accurate they are. (I'm constantly adjusting them because it gets either too warm or too cool). They are a very cool looking product. These replaced my Honeywell TouchScreens that I had for 10 years. We'll see how these hold up over time.
title: Pretty cool if you're tech savvy & have $250 to waste.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ian Hewitt

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Siri
content: Nice product and easy installation ... I think software have a bug, after 2 days, App cannot see the Nest , although NEST says it is connected to wifi. Delete the Thermostat from the App but cannot get a code from NEST since it does nothing... Came back after 4 hrs and code id there and App is working again... Hope Nest fix this bug. Make sure to assign O/B wire as heat pump and if not cooling will not come on. Farsight is great and it is nice to see room temp in big digits followed by the thermo setting. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Amzon User

Great so far.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joshua W. Keyes
content: We've had it a week and so far so good. It is very easy to install by yourself and very easy to get going once it's installed. I'm excited to see how it tracks our energy usage and how it adjusts automatically once it's "learned" our routines. Hopefully I'll be impressed by that like I was the installation and the setup once it was installed.
title: Great so far.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James E Brinker
content: Being able to control it from your phone is I think the best feature. Got it because of it's ability to "learn" but since Covid we've been home so much it hasn't been able to do much.
