product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dan
content: I love technology and home automation stuff (other than the time sink of setting it all up). I knew I would get a Nest since it is really the only game in town. The surprise came in just how intuitively the device operates and how it is easy for both techies and non-techies to use. There are all sorts of settings you can dig into, but it just works also if you don't mess with any of them. Sort of like the best of an iPhone and Android phone put together. Overall couldn't be more pleased. Only thing I wish it did was have an option (not a default, but an option) to show the temp setting and time on the approach view. As sometimes I want the time and sometimes the temp but currently you have to pick either or. Overall awesome. Get one.
title: Incredible Thermostat - Really Awesome

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: SR
content: Being able to control the temperature from your phone is pretty cool, it gives you your humidity % as well as outdoor temperature. I wish you could set a schedule instead of having to tell it when you are away or enabling the location on your phone, ive forgotten many times and remember when I'm about to come home. Also a bit pricey, there are other products in the market for a lot less that perform the same...
title: Convenient

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: R. Cantrell
content: This is my second Nest.  I pass my last one to my mom.  I like the simplicity and functionality.  I like being able to control the Nest from the mobile app.  I can't really think of anything I don't like about the Nest.  Customer service has been great.  I had some of the earlier versions of the Nest Protect that were giving false alerts.  Called customer service and they swapped out the faulty ones with no questions asked.
title: Best of the best

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: LB222
content: I love this!  I am gone a lot, so it is awesome that it knows when I’m not home and adjusts the temp down automatically.  I can already see the savings!
title: So convenient

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Julia
content: Amazing how it’s work. You can control from anywhere. And my monthly bill became less. Also it’s has option cool to dry, which is great when you live by water.
title: Super easy!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: A R Platt
content: The Nest 3rd Generation Thermostat will not work with my five wire heating/cooling system.  I used the Nest compatibility checker online which assured me that I only needed five wires.  When it didn't work, I phoned Nest Support.  They said their compatibility checker was not 100% accurate, and that given the configuration I related to them I would need a sixth ground wire.  My furnace service people wanted a minimum of $300 per thermostat to run the grounds.  I have three zones in my house, which translates to $900 to run the three ground wires.  Nest refused to assist with the cost of this installation.  They also refused to accept the returns directly saying that since I purchased through Amazon, I would need to return them through Amazon. I find this whole  situation to be reprehensible.  First they advertise a Compatibility Checker to see if my wiring  was okay.  No where did I see on this website any qualifiers about not being accurate.  Then when it didn't work, they say I need to install ground wires that cost more than the thermostats themselves.  This, to me, smacks of the old "bait and switch" in order to maximize sales. One final rant and I'll be done.  When I phoned Nest, I was referred up the chain to a "Senior" customer service specialist who told me he would be emailing me his name, email, and direct phone line.  Silly me, I took him at his word.  No email has been forthcoming.  My conclusion, customer service is also shoddy.
title: Compatibility Checker is not reliable - A Sixth Ground Wire is REQUIRED

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Wezel
content: I started with a Gen1 almost 7 years ago and it absolutely saved me money on heating and cooling.  I've got a new home now and i got the Gen3 because i have a humidifier and an upstairs and downstairs unit.  I'm am always amazed at how easy these are to setup and program.
title: My 3rd purchase

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: T S
content: Love my Nest! I love being able to control it with my phone since our thermostat is downstairs and we sleep upstairs. The home/away feature is really handy as well since it will automatically adjust when it detects no one is home. I like being able to go back in the app and see how many hours my furnace has run each day and make adjustments to save energy and money! I'm sure it will pay for itself in no time!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

author: Shilpdawg

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

author: Thomas J.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: David R
content: The Nest Thermostat was so easy to install.  I just followed the instructions and called Nest support to verify my setup. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Charles F.
content: I do not know exactly what is different between the second and third generations, however the third is amazing. The auto away can create some problems if you have the thermostat in a place you don't walk by regularly. The auto schedule is decent. It makes you very conscious of what you are doing with heat and air. The safety high and lows are extremely helpful for longer trips.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rick Thomas

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: S.W.Johnson

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jack Aubert
content: It took me about a half hour to install.  Anybody who cannot install it easily by himself (or herself) must have a phobia about screwdrivers.  The hands-on adjustment interface is elegant and simple.  No more fiddling with non-responsive touch screens and elaborate time and temperature schedules.  If I want to do that at some point, I can easily do it from my computer or my IPhone.  I have no idea whether it actually will save me anything from my energy bill but I think it is worth it simply for the elegant design and ease of adjustment.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Patryk
content: I purchased this only because comed had a credit back and I am impressed. Installation was extremely easy and everything is working like a charm. The only issue is that I dont want to relocate to a high traffic location. Positives: filter reminder easy temp change of temp while in bed, Great bonus if you have an upstairs. humidity sensor already saved around $80 on my bill Negative: should be in a high traffic area(kind of obvious) the green leaf part is confusing as i would freeze in winter

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Farid B.
content: This thermostat, like all thermostats, adjusts the temperature to keep you comfortable. If you expect this to be good looking or save you energy, sorry, you can do the same in a $50 thermostat. The Nest 3rd Gen. thermostat only has a good design and a "leaf" to notify you if your saving energy. Who needs that? Pros- Sleek design Easy to use Cons- Too expensive Easy to fall off its base I reccomend buying a less-than-$50 thermostat. If you really need to have something stylish and would like to control your homes temp. from your smartphone, stick with a cheaper one like the H*neywell

content: Used Ecobee3 for years until they just stopped supporting it with updates. This device is on a whole other level. It’s beautiful to look at. Easy to setup. Works very well.
title: Ease of use.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Shaun Cassells
content: Great device, seriously does all the things says it does.  HOWEVER, it is only one fixed place in your house.  no remote sensors.  If yours is like mine in a hallway your hallway is a perfect temperature but the rest of your house is kind of screwed.  If they were to put thermostats in their smoke detectors and drop cams you might actually get a consistent temperature in your home.  Still the great design and open source software means it will always be able to add to your home automation.
title: Single point of failure awesomeness!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Doan
content: It was very easy to install, it has a bit of hefty weight to this thing. The app is very convenient to have my house cooled down as I head back home from work. The Android app could need some work in organizing the menus and make ease of scheduling daily heating/cooling.
title: Best thermostat on the market!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Matthew Collins
content: I've had them installed for about 2 weeks now. I love them. I like being able to turn the air down before I leave the office and have the house on it's way to coolness when I come home. I've yet to see my power bill, I will update when I do. But, given the hype, and the fact that I've just moved into a larger home with 2 AC units, I needed something to help control costs in the Texas summers. As a techie, it's pretty awesome. Super easy to install. I had to use the mounting plate for one room as the hole in the wall was too big for the nest to cover. But, the other one looks so nice and clean. When I repaint, I'll patch the hole and remove the plate. tips and hints: if it's in your bedroom, make sure to turn down the brightness. otherwise, it can blind you in the middle of the night when you walk near it. It woke me up even, so turn it down to avoid the rude awakening. It's learned our night time and morning routine, and the auto-away works fine, but it hasn't gotten the memo to start cooling the house before I get home from work. During Auto-Away, it let's the house get warmer but not too hot. So, I've taken to setting it to "Home" before I leave the office. I have about a 30 min commute so the heat has some time to dissipate before I arrive. All in all, a great invention. Glad I got it. Time will tell how much it saves me...
title: It's a thermostat... but so much more.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jenny Ding
content: 1) It's better to hire a pro to install it, self installation might need spend more time. 2) My unit stop working after an electric outage. I hired the pro who installed the unit for me to fixed it, but failed. 3)Since it past 30 day return period, I can not return it and can not get refund. (It is about 3 months after I receive the unit) 4) bad customer service: talked with 4 different associates, nobody can solve the issue. It's totally a waste of time and money.
title: Unstable Unit, bad customer service.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Randolph
content: Just what I expected.  Easy to install with the good instructions.  I use my with my Google Assistant.  Very easy to use.  I also received good rebate with my electric company.
title: Love my nest

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Steve Elwart
content: I installed the thermostat a few days ago.  Very easy installation.  Good step by step instructions.  I like being able to control the temperature from my iPhone.  Bought one for upstairs and getting ready to buy one for downstairs.  Great product! Update: Got my first utility bill since installing the thermostat.  Am seeing savings already. At current rates, the thermostat will pay for itself inside a year. (I expect it to be even faster than indicated now, since we haven't used the higher rate A/C right now.) Definitely buy one!
title: Great thermostat. Easy installation.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rachel
content: I installed many of these in several businesses. Good software. Software app limits each site to 10 users. I wish they had a schedule for the fan-on mode as flexibly as their temperature schedule. Software only allows the fan to run every day for same time every day or not at all.
title: So much better than the E version

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Wlliam Findlay
content: This is the second Nest thermostat I've recently purchased.  The first one works great.  The second one was defective.  After extensive troubleshooting with the Nest technicians, it was determined that the unit had a problem.  I have returned this device and have re-ordered a replacement.  Hopefully, this one will work as good as the first one I installed. BTW:  I was very impressed with the Nest telephone support process.  My call was promptly answered (on a Sunday afternoon) and a live person routed my call to a helpful technician!  amazing
title: Nest's technical support process was very helpful.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Hector E. Aguilar
content: The Nest Thermostat stop working: went to Settings and shows Intenet Disconected. On Nest Up indicate Low Battery. On Network shows: Not Cnnected Low Battery. I could not find a way to fix this problem, Please advise. Purchased it on December 30, 2019.  Don't know were is the battery, don't have a user manual. Call to find out about warranty and was told it expired in February 28. Please advise how can I make it work again. Thank You Hector Aguilar
title: Nest Thermostat Intelligent Third Generation

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: EddieKC135
content: Great thermostat.  Like the app to control settings from home anytime.  Only con is sometimes the temperature goes above the settings that I set and doesn't stay on that position.
title: Can't beat the Nest e learning thermostat above all other brands

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jacob Notermann
content: My nest has been working great until a couple days ago...when it just stopped working.  The temperature does not change and I keep getting an e7 series error.  This has never happened and now the thermostat has rendered itself useless. I even called up a local heating and air company to come and assess the thermostat and they informed me that it has quit working...  it's not even 2 years old.
title: Worked flawlessly until a couple days ago...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: M. Hogan
content: Update 2/17/17. My furnace would not come on and going through the normal troubleshooting and swapping the nest thermostats, it appeared to be a malfunction in the furnace so I called a repairman, same guy as before. As soon as he walked in, he pulled my thermostat and installed a cheap mechanical thermostat. Furnace worked perfectly. He said he remembered I had the Nest Thermostat and had seen the same problem at another house. $400 for the thermostats and 2 service calls at $200 (total), this is not looking like a good purchase and appears to be the same problem as before, the control board in the base that attaches to the wall had a malfunction. Original review follows: 3 weeks after buying two of these Nest Thermostats, I heard my air conditioner running even though the Nest was set to off. I pulled the thermostat out of the base and the AC was still running. I swapped the bases and it caused my other AC to run, the electronics in the base malfunctioned. I called tech support and they sent me a new base for my thermostat. That fixed the problem. I talked to an HVAC guy and he said he's seen a lot of problems with these. We'll see. Programming and setup is easy, it really does learn our schedule, and overall I'm happy with its performance, just not the reliability. I'll update in a month or two.
title: Programming and setup is easy, it really does learn our schedule

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: listmaster
content: Okay probably the best thing I bought all year it works great with my Google home flawless. No more telling the wife or kids to turn up the heat or turn it down. All I have to say to Google home is set my temperature to whatever and google talks to nest and nest will set the temperature to my desired setting. Awesome
title: Hands-free

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dave D
content: Like the thermostat.  Nest app for phone to control the thermostat remotely stopped working as you now need to log in with a Google account which we didn't have.  Not happy with that at all.
title: Works as expected

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: BRey
content: I had an initial unsatisfactory experience from a device that was ordered from Amazon and had previously been returned . This was no fault of Nest and after I received a replacement the Nest was easy to install. The replacement was quickly shipped. Apparently, I have an eccentric ac unit, however Nest Support was extremely helpful in diagnosing the issue and solved the problem. I personally have never experienced a customer support system that took care of a customer as well. I will gladly recommend a Nest to anyone.
title: Nest Support + Features Equal a Win

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lawrence Feuer
content: The product should include a manual to understand operation and settings.  I have to learn as I go.  I have used online support to learn but cumbersome.  The temperature is slow and never really at settings until 1-hour plus.  App losses connection.  Compared to old school Honeywell the jury is out.
title: Lacks Manual

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Rick L. Cross
content: So far, so good. Actually feels better in our home and the air conditioning is not set as low as our last smart thermostat. Used the wall plate and I'd add that whether or not I needed it. Impressive addition to home and could be great selling point. Will post more as time goes on, I just installed these (two) two days ago. I'm eager to view it's learning habits.
title: LOVE IT!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Andy B
content: Easy installation and setup. One you figure out the nest app, setting up a schedule is very simple too. Alexa controlled and cell phone managed, loving it.
title: Easy installation and setup

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Sabrina Helm
content: This thing has saved me so much money. I live in a smaller apartment, but it was VERY EASY to install. And I can take it with me when I move. (I kept the old one to replace when I move). Love that I can control it from my phone anytime anywhere.
title: Saved me so much money

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Marquis40
content: I really like this thermostat! It is not only very easy to install but programming is a snap, it walks you through all the steps. This is already saving me $$$ The more you use this the more it trailers itself to your daily life. I love that I can control my thermostat from anywhere in the world, I usually forget to turn it down and now I just simply put it on away mode and I'm good to go. Buy this Nest, you will not regret it
title: A must have

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Craig Bishop
content: Easy installation process...it took me about 45 minutes to install just because I have never attempted this and didn’t want to screw anything up.  Just follow the instructions and all will go well.  I now have control of the thermostat wherever I am.  We just returned from a trip yesterday and had to adjust the temp from the road an hour or so from home...walked in...the house was at or near the temperature I set.  Extremely happy with it.
title: Nest Thermostat Review...works great!!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: dccustomer
content: The heat would work but the AC would not.  I had to call an HVAC person.  They came and found that the Nest thermostat was only allowing the heat to run and that it was not allowing voltage through the Y1.  They said this was not the first time they had encountered this and were told by Nest support there were other defective thermostats reported.  Be sure to install ASAP and confirm it works within the return window.
title: Caution - defective thermostats exists - heat works, AC will not.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Liam
content: Very nice for a gadget lover (like myself) but for all that it does in the way of learning its still just a thermostat. I feel like I've ended up scheduling it much like I would any other because my schedule changes every few weeks so it 'learning' my schedule is basically impossible. It is very handy to be able to flip it on/off from work or on the road in case I've forgotten - that is if it is connected to the wifi, more than occasionally it's offline which defeats the whole purpose.
title: Great if you've got a set schedule it can learn, otherwise just a pretty/pricey thermostat doubling as wall art.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: MattW275
content: Like it a lot.  Very simple to install.  When my wiring wasn't one of the standards displayed in the installation instructions,  a quick email w/ a photo of the wires produced a custom how to email from customer service in just a couple hours time. After install,  it's set it and forget it.  It auto senses when people are home and when the house is vacated and sets Temps accordingly.  I haven't compared my electric bill yet,  but I'm sure this thing is saving me money.  Plus,  controlling all of this over WiFi and accessing from my smart phone at work is really nice. Lastly,  the thing just looks neat!
title: Like it a lot!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Larry Crager
content: Would not work with a high end Lennox furnace. I returned it. I might add a HVAC professional attempted the install.
title: If you have a Lennox system forget it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeny
content: It would be 5 stars but it came with a scratch on the front. Can’t really notice but for that price it should have come immaculate. It works and is easy to use. My old thermostat stopped working and decided to give this a try.
title: Works but was damaged

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: NQR4
content: Working fine after hiring an electrician. NEST customer service gave me contradictory info and I decided not to do it myself. Was told is wasn’t compatible then sent a wiring diagram then a second different one
title: Check compatibility before trusting service

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: JimP from MA
content: Since installing the NEST thermostat, I rarely have to adjust the temperature manually anymore. The unit has indeed been learning how cool and how warm I like my condominium, and at what time of day. I only installed the unit about a month ago, but I believe that my energy consumption has also gone down as a direct result. It took me about 15 minutes to install. Finally, it's incredibly contemporary and stylish to look at. It has definitely brought my condo into the 21st century.
title: The unit has indeed been learning how cool and how warm I like my condominium

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: W. Boucek
content: Nest is so much easier than our old, ugly thermostat. I installed it a few weeks ago and it’s learned our heating habits. It illuminates whenever you walk past, showing the current indoor (and out!) temperature and is simple to change. The iphone app is easy, too, so you can adjust the temp if you’re going to be gone from home longer than expected for example. All in all, a real improvement!
title: Easy & great looking.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Brian S. Moynihan
content: Great investment. I see this paying for itself very quickly. We always forget to adjust the temperature when we leave the house and now, we still can, and nest will take care of it for us. I also like that I can set the fan up to run at certain times.  This helps circulate warm air to other areas of the house when we use our fireplace!
title: Great investment. I see this paying for itself very ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Adriana Rivera
content: Super easy install! The app walks you through it! I can regulate it now from my bed  or work! I’m recovering from surgery so this is perfect because I’m too hot or too cold I can use my app instead of getting up!
title: So easy to install! What are you waiting for?

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jurgita
content: I'm very disappointed in Nest!!! Not working with Bryant Evolution system at all and  and not working without C wire. Waste of money and waste of time......
title: very disappointed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joshua Busey
content: This product works beautifully.  With no wiring or electrical knowledge it walked me through successfully changing my thermostat out and integrated in seconds.  House continues to grow more voice activated, and this is a beautiful addition and easily programmable.  Would recommend highly.
title: EXACTLY as advertised

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: jessi
content: Love having this in my house. I can control it from my phone in or out of my house. It's very easy to use and I recommend it for everyone
title: Thermostat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: robert duplaine
content: This is a fantastic product ... Super high quality and amazingly innovative. I was one of those peeps that had a wiring problem ... it took me two weeks to troubleshoot the problem. Nest Support was polite but no help at all ... My issue was beyond their scope . I had the Common Wire problem ... Of course ... Someone posted my solution on Google.
title: This is a fantastic product.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: James David Mullins
content: So far so good! I have no experience with electrical work until now. The Nest website made the verification process of if the thermostat would be compatible with my ac and furnace easy enough.  Installation wasn't difficult, if anything the wiring is much more organized than the old thermostat. After the first week the Nest thermostat gets a general idea of your schedule, the app is easy to use if you forget to set yourself as away, and user friendliness was a focus point for this product. So far after installing the thermostat electric bill is down $30 from last month even after the average temperature went up since last month. This will probably for itself within a year. Totally worth the investment.
title: So far so good! I have no experience with electrical work until ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Richard Ramm
content: An excellent investment pays for itself on the energy savings alone. Make sure you check with your utility provider as they might offer rebates for having a smart thermostat
title: Pays for its self

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Christine T.
content: Love our new nest thermometer! It was easy to install and we accomplished the task within an hour. I love that Alexa  can provide me the status of the thermostat and allowed me to adjust the thermostat. Because my husband and I work different shifts, there is always someone home – plus an African gray parrot! We don’t use the feature to adjust the temperature now we are home or away. I would highly recommend this product! We are completely satisfied!
title: Love our new nest thermometer

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: B. Turner
content: Love my new Nest, I replaced my Honeywell Smart Thermostat with Nest. I love the ability that it automatically sets the temp based on your schedule. Plus I really like knowing how much energy I am using daily through the history tab. Lastly I like the set away and not have to setup a Vacation schedule.
title: Nest is Awesome

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pistolero
content: Awesome product.  It's great to be able to check on things and make changes from the phone while away (or just to lazy to get up and walk over to it).  I like the reports it gives.  I got my mother one.  Not because of the normal reasons - it's just stupid easy to use and the display is bright and easy for her to read.
title: Awesome Product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Samera Shim
content: How cool is it to crank the heat 10 minutes before you're home? Very cool - or warm in this case! Plus it figures out your schedule pretty quickly - and it looks like the HAL 9000 - what's not to love! Only problem I've had was when I tried to raise the heat to 75ºF and it said, "I'm sorry Greg, I'm afraid I can't doooo that." The only thing that would make this better was if you could set the screen to look like the HAL 9000 and if it had a panel you could get to make the whole thing look like the HAL 9000 interface.
title: I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't give this anything less than 5 stars.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Vinnie
content: It's so good to know we can control the temperature from anywhere in the world. Plus it's saved us money by turning the AC on in order to keep the cool inside the home. Easy to work with.
title: Great product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ronee
content: I hate this stupid thing. It's supposed to "learn" how we like the temp, but instead I feel like I'm fighting with a ghost over the control. It will randomly set the AC down to 70, I'll either hear it kick on or feel cold, I'll change it to 75 via the app. And an hour later I'll hear it kick on again set to 70°. It always around the time we don't need it set that low (2pm on a Tuesday). I'll change it 3 times before it finally leaves it. I'm frustrated and I'm sure it's costing more money for our energy bill. I keep wanting to like it, but time after time it doesn't live up to expectations.
title: Temperature wars with a robot!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pinot Meow
content: This helps so much with my insomnia. I love being able to control the temperature from my bed. I love being able to customize the temperature to my sleep cycles. I bought the remote thermostat for the room I’m in and now it’s even better!
title: Love it!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: C Holdener
content: This was a gift to my daughter for Christmas 2019. It worked fine until this July and since then, it won’t connect to WiFi. My daughter has been in contact with their tech support online with no resolution!!  They have offered no resolution and continue to tell her that “their team is working on it!”  This unit was purchased to decrease utility bills and has done the exact opposite as it continues to set itself to a very low average cooling temperature.
title: Awful customer service.....beware

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: moonsspring
content: The Thermostat works great until its wifi part broke. In a normal morning during a hot summer I noticed a "low battery" warning on the thermostat, after several rounds of charging-restart-charging-research online .. I realized it is the wifi part stuck in the searching mode and drains the battery very quick. I followed the instruction and reset the wifi, it still stuck in the searching mode and can't pick up any wifi signal. (There are several, besides my wifi in the home) One note, I do have a C-wire in my system, although the instruction says you don't need one, but you do in most of cases.
title: Wifi stopped working after one year

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Mark E.
content: Love the wireless functionality and the install is very easy. One of the 3 we purchased had a low battery message a few months in and upon research, discovered Nest had issues with their internal batteries holding a charge.  I contacted them and they sent me a new one and returned the defective one.  Overall, the ability to control temps via an app is fantastic.
title: A smart home must!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ruby
content: Works great was a little difficult to learn how to program right away, but afterwards it works great.
title: Google Nest Thermastat

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: William C. Kennedy
content: Though a bit pricey, the Nest Thermostat has exceeded my expectations.  First, installation is easy and made even easier by the step by step video that anticipated and answered all of my wiring questions.  Second, connection to computer laptop and smart phone were automatic with the software. Third, it works,  We live in a hot climate where air conditioning is necessary most days.  We have already noticed a drop in our utility costs resulting from the Nest installation and its smart technology that knows when we are in the house and when we are away.  It adjusts the temperature without prompt.  It is also easy to connect with the unit remotely.  So far, I love it.  Let's see how it works in the winter when it gets cold.  I am expecting similar savings.
title: The 3rd Generation Nest Works.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: TO
content: Google keeps advertising that it works without the common cable but it does not work flawlessly. Our burner resets itself once a day since it uses "power stealing" as the running wires in the house lacks the common cable. Our electrician recommended using the older simple thermostat or run new cables which costs #385. Stay away from it if your wires does not have the common cable.
title: E72 Error - Requires Common Cable

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Craneman
content: Growing up, my parents' Honeywell lasted decades. This replaced a Honeywell from 1984. I just hate when products are designed to fail. Planned obsolescence.  I had to buy another.
title: Broke: right after warranty.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: chaosatwork
content: I did have a quite a problem installing these thermostats. I couldn’t get them to connect to my Linksys wireless router.  (NEST) customer service is one of the best, they were very helpful, but I still wasn’t getting anywhere. Turns out my older Linksys router was my problem; the nest thermostats just didn’t like it. If you have an older router you might want to upgrade it before trying these thermostats. I give them 5 stars just on their customer service. I would give them another 5 for the thermostats if I could they are user friendly easy to install and program with the right equipment.
title: (NEST) customer service is one of the best, they were very helpful

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jacob Grow
content: Easiest thermostat I've ever installed. This was my third installation, two other brands. NEST takes all the quess work out of the equation. Kudos to the engineers working on this product.
title: Easy installation, works great!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: HCO
content: Amazingly our new house came with a very basic thermostat that wasn't even programmable. I was sick of having to remember to adjust the thermostat every time I left the floor of a house (we got 1 Nest for upstairs, and 1 for downstairs.) I know the Nest is helping us save money with it's automatic programming. I also am able to control it remotely for the dogs when they are home alone. I like the intuitive app and the ease of adjusting it at any time from anywhere. Very simple to set up and would recommend!
title: Saving Time and $$$

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: emily
content: I think I'll save a ton of money on purchasing oil for my heat system. Can track how much time the heater is in use. Keeps the house a nice level temperature. I just love all these smart things available these days. I love being able to turn on the heater from anywhere. Would definitely recommend!
title: Love it! Big $$$ saver.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nathan G
content: Great product - and great tech support. I initially had an issue with the wiring and they helped walk me though figuring it out.  Since then it’s worked great.
title: Keeps me cool. Or warm.  But mostly cool

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Calidjone
content: Our home is 20 years old so we didnt have the "normal" amount of wires so tech needed to help install it properly. The setup took a bit of time to figure out.
title: Was difficult to set up

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Krucifried
content: Love this thermostat! Makes a world of difference over my old standard honeywell. Saw a significant drop in my power bill the first month. I really like that I can adjust the AC without having to get out of bed and go down stairs.
title: Glad I bought it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

After using it for two weeks I am actually blown away by how smart this thermostat really is On top of all of the intelligent features which truly make it “smart” I was surprised to see that when I went away for a few days it sensed that I was not home and switched the thermostat into eco-mode for away

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

title: Inaccurate Temperature and failed to turn furnace on.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Carl S
content: Been wanting this since gen 1 version finally got me one... easily programmable, the home/away still adjusting but can easily set when i leave and automatically adjust back once i walk in the house
title: Smart and sleek

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: brittney
content: I really like the Nest thermostat how ever make sure that your system has a common wire or referred to as a "C" wire. The Nest will not work with out this wire. I currently have a 4 wire set-up without the common and my AC company is needing to charge me 340.00 extra to run this wire. There is only one wifi capable unit on the market that will work without the common wire, that is the Emerson Sensi. Do your homework first before buying this unit.
title: "C" wire or common wire needed

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Williams
content: Absolutely love being able to control my AC/Heat from anywhere in the house with my phone. Also, for sure 100% saved me 100s of dollars each month this summer. My previous thermostat was mercury based and was constantly kicking on and would stay on for hours and hours. After I installed this my bill dropped by 60% for each subsequent month with similar temperatures and lifestyle in the house.
title: Absolutely love being able to control my AC/Heat from anywhere in ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ANGELA L.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Deborah

Replacing my old thermostat with the Nest was just about the easiest thing I ever did. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

Love remotely checking the system and temps when I'm away for extended times... Easy Install & Even the Packaging is amazing quality...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Pete Price
content: I just purchased the Nest thermostat Gen 3 and this is a great product.  So easy to install and operation is simple.  So far it has worked as advertised.  No need to hire anyone to install it just watch the video on the Nest website and it walks you through the entire install process.  I am not an electrical professional just a home owner. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Ashli
content: This was a cakewalk to install and the software is just amazing. Intuitive interface and setup and I love how easy the app is to use on your phone. We haven't used the learning function too much yet (turned it off after we installed it) but I imagine that would be a breeze to use too. Get the Nest. It's the most amazing thermostat ever. You won't regret it!
title: Best ever

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Janet French
content: Nest will not display the current temperature in a large font format. It shows the 'set' temperature. So you can't glance at the nest to see the current temp. This has been an issue for >2 years. Check out Nest's own support site: https://community.nest.com/thread/10366. The hardware and design are good. I have used the Filtrate Wi-Fi Thermostat (Model: 3M-50 SKU: 339052) for >3 years. Outside of 'learning' it does just about everything the Nest does and costs 50% less. It's not as pretty and the LCD buttons are clunky but their Android app rules. Super easy to use and program, it has a geo-location feature that can detect when you are close to home and desktop widgets.
title: Will Not Display Current Temperature

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: J. Carrington Smith
content: Nest has a very strong reputation, the reason I selected the Nest thermostat. I have three furnaces so I bought and installed them myself. Nest customer service was invaluable in assisting me. Our house was built in 1960, the wiring was beyond my comprehension.  Now I must admit I installed these three thermostats in late Spring therefore they have been off all Summer. All testing has shown excellent performance. Now they are installed I have an even stronger appreciation for their technology.
title: Appreciation of Nest thermostat.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Miguel Falcon
content: This is item is listed as New, but upon going thru the installation noticed missing stickers to label the wires, the labels to identity the cooling and power wires were missing, obviously this is a return

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Patrick Fiorentino
content: It has some limitations if you live in a multi-dwelling (house and guest house, etc) and multi-home (2 houses).  The auto-away function works by the thermostats talking to each other. You can not put the quest house in away mode without putting the house in away.  Only one Nest per user account, you can not give your quest remote access to their Nest without access to all the thermostats in a location.  Only 2 homes permitted per account so setting up the quest house as a separate home is not the fix if you have two homes. The multi-home view is limited can not see everything at once. That said not sure the ecobee3 provides a solution. But to late for me I have 7 Nest installed.
title: It has some limitations if you live in a multi-dwelling ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

For example, the screen comes on automatically as you approach it. I had a problem with the wiring on initial installation.  I had a problem with the wiring - a misinterpretation of the mapping from old thermostat to new.  My call to customer support was answered quickly and we resolved the issue in a single call. Very professional!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

content: The feature that seeks to determine when you are away and turn off the system is flawed in that it turns the heat off in the middle of the night when you are asleep because it doesn't sense anyone is home.  Who would have thought that was a good idea?  I kept waking up freezing having to turn the heat back on.  The only good thing I have found with the system is the ability to remote adjust.  Even then, it often drops off the network. Update 3/2017 - The one feature that I thought was its redeeming value has failed too.  Often setting the temperature remotely does not work.  I will change it on my phone or computer and it acts like it has accepted and acted on the changed value.  But when I look at the actual device, it has not changed at all.  I don't know what the point of this device is other than it looks pretty.
title: Who would have thought that was a good idea? I kept waking up freezing having to ...

This thermostat has it all and is simple enough to do it yourself if you have some basic understanding of your system. I have only been using it for a few days so far but looks very promising.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Bridget M. Todd
content: I like being able to control the Nest from my phone; however, I can't figure out how to program it like my other thermostat.  It automatically adjusts the temperature based on usage; however, that is crazy in my household.  I'm not sure I'm saving any money.
title: I like being able to control the Nest from my phone

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeffrey G. Condit
content: I replaced a first-generation Nest, which I also liked very much.  The 3rd generation has more features, a larger display, and a thinner profile.  Both versions are very easy to install and program yourself, particular with the very helpful video that can be accessed via the Nest website.  Other than that, the Nest works as advertised:  It quickly learns your routine, turns itself down when you are gone if you forget, and can be accessed via your phone or tablet so you can come home to a warm (or cool) house if you've been gone for a couple of days.  I also like the very simple and elegant design - It looks and works like an old-style dial thermostat rather than like an IPad-on-the-wall (as does most of the competition).  I have had zero mechanical or connectivity problems with either generation.
title: Excellent design, easy to install, and works as advertised.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: chaim kitchner
content: Stopped working after 2 months! Doesn't connect to WiFi. Doesn't even find a network and we have many many around besides our owns. Costumer support keeps repeating to try the same thing that we tried over and over. It's a cool product but too expensive for it to last only two months!
title: Stopped working after two months!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: ARreviews
content: Great product--very easy to instal and works perfectly.  Great integration with the phone application.  Highly recommend!
title: Great product!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Gregory V. DeBrun
content: Great product.  Easy Installation.  The price may seem high, and it is, but the savings you get in return should offset it's price.  Installation was very easy.  Use the Nest Compatibility website to review your current wiring diagram.  It'll display a report of how Nest should be wired for your home.  Once I connected the wires, Nest auto detected my HVAC systems and a simple 10 minute setup (wifi, zip code, basic info) and it was up and running.  The Nest mobile app is awesome for controlling the thermostat while you are away, especially if you've turned the heat down and are heading back home, you simply open the app, 'kick-up' the heat and your house is warm when you arrive.
title: Great product.  Easy Installation.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Cornelius Jones
content: I would have given it a five star had it come with an off setting, or programmed that feature in. Over all great product. I think my bill went down but i could not say for certain for it started getten cooler. I think it saves money by you knowing how much energy you are using.
title: Good product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Theresa H
content: A learning thermostat is a great product, and Nest is good quality, but I recommend you study up on it on the Nest website before buying it. I'm not an electrician, but I was able to install it myself based on the website's instructions.  I love being able to operate the thermostat from my phone - in bed or at work.  My only complaint is that it keeps setting itself to "Away" when I'm actually at home, which affects the temperature. Nest Learning Thermostat, 3rd Generation
title: Recommended, with research

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Val M.
content: Here is some advise that can help with the installation and save you calls to technical support and a lot of headache. If you're replacing an old thermostat, make sure to first clean the copper wires thoroughly before pushing them into the base. Copper tends to oxidize and the oxides are poor conductors. Once you attach the display, it will show the wiring diagram, double check to make sure it sees all wires where they're supposed to be. I didn't do that and it cost me a couple of hours of troubleshooting before I discovered the reason for the thermostat's weird behavior. Nest support wasn't helpful, they don't have this simple step in their troubleshooting manual, neither it is mentioned in the Installation Guide. Four starts because of that, Nest.
title: Save yourselves some trouble during installation

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Nici
content: Long time Nest user, upgraded my first generation for this newer model, not that it was necessary but do to a home remodel.  Still love it.
title: Great investment

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Poppy
content: It's super convenient until you need to charge the thing! I didn't even figure this out from the manual itself; i found out online after it had stopped working! regardless, once it was charged back up, it worked like a charm!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: M. A. Hudson
content: This is the real deal ... from the time you open the box to a half hour later when you're finished with the installation.  The instructions are clear and well designed and graphically illustrated.  Plus take advantage of the you tube video.  The Nest approach takes the nystery out of thermostats.  They make it hard to screw up.  And support is as great as everything else about this product.
title: Yep! No wonder people are talking about this product.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: geo
content: Love it. The customer service was great and made sure it would work on my unit and sent me a photo of how to hook it up. Some of the operating instructions and settings are a little confusing but overall I would recommend it and will purchase another one.
title: Planning on getting another one.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joseph Ty Brooks
content: As a smart thermostat, it does what it's supposed to, and the learning aspect is reasonably helpful. Basically, rather than having to manually set up a schedule, you just kind of turn it to the temperature you want it at manually for the first couple of days to a week, and the thermostat figures out your routine from there. That being said, I use Samsung SmartThings as my smart home hub, and the nest really doesn't integrate with SmartThings at all. It's really disappointing the Google folks over at Nest don't want to play nice with Samsung, and if I had a chance to redo my smart thermostat purchase I'd have opted for the ecobee4 instead.
title: Works ok, but doesn't integrate with SmartThings

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: barney
content: At first it worked well and seemed promising but then it stopped holding the charge and needs to be removed from wall to recharge its internal battery and then plugged into usb in wall outlet to charge and then after 6 hours it can be put back on wall and we can have heat again. The Nest support is pleasantly ineffectual and will send you a new one that does same thing after a few months and then when its charge starts fading, which means no heat or ac until you manually recharge, they will help you trouble shoot over the phone. Its disappointing since we have a very techn- savvy handy family member who worked for about a year to try to get it to charge on wall as thermostat but failed and it its getting cold to have no heat. There is no support if you cannot get it working with basic phone trouble shooting and no electrician or other service provider can help either. No returns either so while you patiently trouble shoot your Saturdays away the return period and warranty run out and then Google basically is moved away from its Nest product line by the new Google Home line.  [...]
title: Big waste of money and huge waste of time trying to keep Nest charged even with ineffectual Google Nest support.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Curt S
content: After spending over 3 hours on the phone with technical support, it wouldn’t let the heat get above 67 degrees with a target of 70. Reinstalled old thermostat and reached 70 in 10 minutes.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Marni Jo LaCorte

Also love that I can adjust the temperature right from my phone when I home so don't have to get out of bed at night. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Joan Marti Ruiz
content: Great product. Very easy to install and to configure. And it also provides a great set of features. It adjusted to my schedule very fast. It also warned me that the filter in my system might be too dirty because it detected that the heater was shutting down itself after 15 min. due to overheating. It is great that it monitors, not only the temperature, but also the overall system. I definitely recommend it.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Max Archila
content: Ok, took me a while to write a review, but here it is: We love it, easy to install (and take this from a person that will not deal with electricity at all) performance is stellar, learnt out schedule so knew within 2 weeks what was the temperature that we liked or wanted during the day, away, at night and early morning. schedule option makes it even better since it will self adjust (for your average temperatures) and then you can turn off (if you want to) the learning and just have a set schedule cycle on the thermostat. also, my nephew says it is the most sharp looking thing on our wall.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: A Reader from Illinois
content: There should be a warning that this device may not work with your router. There is mention of a list of working routers on the nest website, so the buyer may want to go to the nest website and look over the list. If you don't have a router from the nest list, then you might need to purchase a router from the list or you may have to adjust your advanced router settings to get the nest products to work. My router is running DD-WRT. The nest documentation from their website states that DD-WRT routers are not supported, however, I have found many DD-WRT owners that have gotten their Nest thermostat to work on their DD-WRT router by tweaking the router settings. If you are not up to the task of making adjustments to your router, then this product may not be for you. The thermometer installation was very easy and I got the basic thermostat working very quickly.  Right now the thermostat is running as a regular programmable thermostat, but I'm still working on my DD-WRT router to find the right settings that will work to allow the thermostat to maintain a connection to the network and allow all the functionality to work. Update: I was never able to get it to work with my DD-WRT router. I tried several settings recommended by other DD-WRT users, but just could not get the Nest thermostat to keep a connection to the nest servers, so I could never register the device with the nest services. The problem seems to be in the way the thermostat communicates with the Nest Servers. I called Nest support, but was told by Nest support that the security settings on my modem were too strict and that I would need to contact my Internet Service provider (Comcast) to have them open ports on my Cable modem. I believe the support person really meant my router instead of the cable modem.  From what I understood, I would need to open four ports on the router to allow outside internet traffic to be routed to the thermostat.  This is more than most home owners could do on their own.
title: Need to check nest website to see if your router will work with this product

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: TTYME
content: This very attractive device has a simple, clean interface.  I just moved into a home with two of those late 90's vintage "programable" thermostats.  What a pain to figure out - even with the well preserved instruction booklets left behind by the previous owners.  I swapped them both for Nest thermostats.  Very easy to hook up (just five wires, and, if you wish, your internet. Total of 30 - 40 minutes - for BOTH, only because it was harder to get them to screw to the wall than to hook up the wires and internet!). These are a plethora of information about your usage (over time), your actual system types and air filter conditions, internal and external temperature weather conditions (including humidity), as well as options that allow you to save energy or ensure good home air flow. I also love how i can walk within range of it and it lights up automatically to show me what I have programmed it to tell me (i.e., current room temperature/what the thermostat is set to (down stairs), or analog clock (upstairs)). I also love that you can control your home's temperature remotely.  If i have been gone and the away mode has shut my system down, I can, in advance of leaving my destination or in route,  start the system up again, from my phone or computer!  You can "override" your set temperature, but the next pre-scheduled temperature change will still kick in on time. One complaint is that, while it "learns you" over the course of a few days - I would give it a solid B on that aspect for effort.  After a month or so, I just went into the app and permanently set the temperatures to my schedule. I think your schedule has to be "to the minute" like clockwork.  Mine may vary by 30 minutes in the morning to a couple of hours at night. Another thing i don't like has to do with the energy saving function of Away Assist (now Eco Mode).  Great concept.  However, I could leave the house at 9 or 9:30am, taking ALL devices containing the Nest App (phone and iPod) with me,. out of range.  But, when i look at my usage on the app - it shows that the system did not go in to Eco mode for another 3 or 4 hours!!  I could understand if it waited an hour to be sure there was no movement in the house or just not "shock" the system, but more than that is wasted energy. If it were not for all of the bells and whistles and continuous improvements i know will come with software updates, I might only recommend this to gadget enthusiasts (which I happen to be, but am also practical - I am looking for energy savings!). I will leave with this - this is a good device, but try and catch it on sale or make sure your power company offers a rebate before sinking $250 into it.  The pro's out weight the cons, cons that i believe you can mostly work around or circumvent.
title: Very easy to hook up (just five wires

Some days I'll be at work and it has the A/C running thinking I'm home even though I use the Home/Away assist. It does look nice and was really very easy to connect though.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Tera
content: We love our nest. It was easy to hook up and easy to use
title: Easy

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Dennis Bourque
content: I really should have paid more attention to the poor reviews.  You tend to expect that if you have a relatively new AC system, new control tech should work just fine.  Don't you believe it.  Similar to other reviews here, I spent countless hours with tech support trying to get the Nest unit to work properly.  Numerous time-consuming wiring changes,  Having to start from square one each time I worked with customer support.  Parts swaps that didn't work.  Finally had to resort to hiring a "Nest Pro" to confirm the unit is bad.  Now that the "expert" has confirmed I'm not lying - I say this because Nest clearly assumes its customers have screwed up installation rather than entertaining the possibility that their product might just be at fault - they are silent.  More troubling is that the defective unit caused my compressor to run without the fan, a condition that can cause serious damage to cooling systems.  Of course, Nest is silent on this.  So, I am now contemplating running the Nest over to get at least some level of satisfaction for all of my frustration.  I could say a lot more but the best advice is to STAY THE HECK AWAY AT ALL COSTS!
title: DO NOT BUY THIS...YOU WILL BE VERY SORRY.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Kevin D
content: The product didn't work on my Honeywell dual zone system (only 5 years old).  I installed correctly...had it running and then found out after a weekend away it short cycled (turned on/off) all weekend and I came home to a freezing house. After multiple calls to nest support and having an hvac repairman nest acknowledged even with the install of a common wire (dedicated power supply) it wouldnt work. The reason for the 1 rating is the very frustrating time on calls with nest support.  I happened to call at night and was forwarded to what they call a 'senior tech'.  After that, whenever I had a problem the other senior techs said I had to go thru my previous tech which was extremely frustrating given that person's working hours.  Worse yet that tech remains unresponsive overall at answering or acknowledging what I'm sure will now be a much higher bill.  I found the customer support process to be one of the worst I've ever had to deal with. All of this could have been avoided if the website and customer service adequately reported these issues for certain models prior to purchasing.  I expect more from this company who is now owned by google. After talking with several hvac experts they have recommended an ecobee.  The support techs have ALL worked in the field compared to the high tech resources at nest who haven't gotten their hands dirty. I'm sure the product is good for the right system (likely a 4 or 5) but the product support is what gives this a 1 rating.
title: Worse yet that tech remains unresponsive overall at answering or ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jeff on Vashon Island
content: I bought a new house recently and the thermostat was very basic with no scheduling ability. I bought this both because I want to save energy and I'm a geek. While I am a geek and a good with computers I am not  knowledgeable about electronics or wiring so I was a little intimidated by the idea of wiring this myself. But, between the very clear printed instructions(whatever happened to those?) and the walk through steps on the device I was up and running in 30 minutes. It's early fall so I'm not using it as regularly or normally as I will during the winter so I'm not expecting it to train properly just yet. But I do like that it has the ability of setting or changing the scheduling if need be. So far it's been great at setting itself into "away" mode and turning back on when we're home. The geek in me loves being able to adjust the heat from the app while I'm at work. But the very best part is that my wife, who still has a hard time with my TV setup, has had absolutely no problem adjusting the heat when she's home during the day. Being geezers over 50, we both appreciate the big, bright display. I hate shelling out money for things like this, but this is well worth the price. Nest really does live up to it's reputation for quality and ease of use. ************************************************************************************************************************************************* UPDATE AFter about 2 months of use now I couldn't be more impressed. The learning ability is quite impressive. I initially scheduled it for my odd work schedule manually. One thing I usually do is turn the heat down a few degrees before I leave; within a week the thermostat had learned this and added it to my schedule. It's proven to be very accurate in terms of what we need the temperature to be in our house. There are also unexpected benefits that I hadn't even thought about. 1. The power where I live goes out frequently. I can try checking my thermostat with the app to see if it responds. If it doesn't I am fairly assured that the power is out. This happened this week during a big storm and I was able to stop off and pick up dinner rather than get home and not be able to cook. 2. I love being able to turn the heat back up when I'm within a few miles of home so I don't have to come home to a cold house. 3. The Nest is in our Hallway and is bright enough that it acts like a nightlight when we walk by it in the dark. My wife loves that unexpected feature.
title: Easy Peasy

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

author: Cat R.
content: Best of the best.  Easy to install and operate. App is easy to navigate. I really like how it tells me the humidity in the house among many more things. WORTH EVERY PENNY.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Michael Bishop
content: I previously owned the 2nd Generation thermostat but bought the new model after moving to a new house. The differences are minor, but it does offer some improvements. The thermostat is slightly thinner which, along with a better quality screen, gives it a nicer appearance. This is nice for something that really should blend into a house and not draw attention to itself. The real power of the Nest comes from the automatic learning. There are a lot of programmable thermostats out there, but I'm willing to bet that a vast majority of them are not setup very well. People using non-programmable thermostats will benefit even more. The nicest part of all this is that it requires minimal interaction. The thermostat will learn your habits and set the schedule. Being able to access the thermostat remotely via iPhone/Android apps is great for making temperature adjustments or to warm/cool the house before returning home. One drawback is if your thermostat is located in a low traffic area of your home then it may switch to Away incorrectly. You can improve this by using the Nest Protect smoke detectors, but it would be nice if they sold a stand-alone sensor since my house is already wired with smoke detectors and the Protects are somewhat expensive (plus, previous versions had numerous issues but those have been mostly fixed). If you already own the 2nd, then there isn't much need to upgrade. I would recommend it for everybody else.
title: along with a better quality screen

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Jon A
content: A little hard to operate when you first get it installed.  I use the phone app the most to change anything one it.  If you have kids and it is within their reach, set the pin code.  There was a few days I came home and my son set the house to 50 degrees while it was over 90 outside.  Not sure how long it was set like that..... but I am sure that electric bill is going to be horrible.
title: A little hard to work until you get used to it

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Chibi
content: Overpriced junk! Save yourself some money and frustration and get a Honeywell Wi-Fi Thermostat or another name brand. After only 6 months it keeps give BG a message that it has to shut down and recharge the battery, which apparently never charges. After investigating I learn that the betteri s in these are not easily replaceable and hard wired in. I actually bought 2 of these for our house that we were building. However had to return the one for the main level because I have a hybrid HVAC on the main level and has multiple levels of control needed that this Nest is not capable of controlling. They installed a Honeywell in its place and it has Wi-Fi fully programmable etc.. I kept the other for my upstairs mancave. It looks cool and easy to use and program. That said, I have had multiple issues with it, going out and losing control. It’s only been 8 months and now I am getting battery failure messages. It goes dead, tells me it has to shut down to recharge, now just a low Battery message so cannot connect to WiFi or my Echo or Nest app or anything (see photos). Apparently the battery in these things is hard wired in so it’s not like popping a cover open and replacing the battery. They may have the software programming down but the hardware is crap. If you’re going to spend this much money on a Thermostat it should be reliable and last a long time. Save yourself some money and for a fraction of the cost buy something from a company that has made Thermostats for decades and reliable!
title: Looks Cool but Unreliable Junk!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

author: supalaser
content: Please tape up (cover) all wires, especially "C" and "R" wires during uninstall of old thermostat otherwise you may inadvertently blow up a low voltage fuse (3A) in the attic unit like I did and that is a pain to troubleshoot and change especially in hot weather. product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: Lonnie Moon
content: Installation of product was simple.  However, product detects what type of system you have, and it incorrectly assumed that I had a heat pump, when in fact I have an a/c unit and gas furnace.  There is no way to change this - it assumes what it detects that you have is what you have, and there is no setting or way to change it.  When thermostat was trying to cool my home, it turned on the furnace, and when trying to heat my home, it turned on the a/c.  I checked several times and it was wired correctly (the same as my Honeywell that it replaced).  Contacted Nest support but did not hear back from the for 3 days, so I am returning the thermostat.
title: Product didn't work for me.

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
author: skn70056
content: Got this when we were installing a new HVAC unit.  Install and setup was easy.  Have some elderly people living with us so making the occasional adjustments is easy right form the smartphone, don't even have to get up from the chair.  Once the initial settings were configured it learns and programs itself.  Also get history reports on how much the unit is running.  Gives a nice greenleaf when we set it to save enegy, sort of like a gold star on our homework.
title: Install and setup was easy. Have some elderly people living with us so ...

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1

So far, the performance of the thermostat has been exactly what I expected!

product: Google T3007ES Nest Learning Thermostat 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel, Works with Amazon Alexa, 1
